The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 50 - 41 in the first half alone . They were the superior shooters in this game as well , going 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks also forced the Magic into 17 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Nikola Vucevic and Victor Oladipo . Vucevic shot 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also recording 15 rebounds . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Al Horford had a strong showing , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 0 - of - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from deep . Channing Frye chipped in 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three rebounds as well . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Tuesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Bucks got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 22 - 21 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 46 percent from the field , while the Knicks went just 41 percent . The Bucks also out - rebounded the Knicks 48 - 36 , giving them even more of an advantage and helping push them further to the victory . As has been the case all season , Giannis Antetokounmpo and Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for the Bucks . Antetokounmpo went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Hardaway , who also had three rebounds , five assists and two blocked shots . Tim Hardaway Jr was dialed in with his shot , going 6 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding four assists . He shot a combined 6 - for - 14 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Kendall Marshall chipped in with 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds in 24 minutes . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 ) ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Suns were able to use a strong second - half where they out - scored the Suns 53 - 45 , to coast to a 13 - point victory on the road in Phoenix . The Grizzlies shot 50 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns shot 46 percent from the field and only 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were led by the duo of Mike Bledsoe and Markieff Morris . Gasol shot 6 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 64 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Zach Randolph , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and six rebounds before fouling out . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Suns will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 26 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Raptors shot 53 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 46 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Raptors forced the Pistons into 26 turnovers , while committing just eight of their own . The Raptors were led by D.J . Augustin in this one , going 12 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 35 points , while also adding eight assists over 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 29 points and 20 rebounds on the season . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope gave the frontcourt some help as well and recorded 25 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and six rebounds . Like Valanciunas , he 's playing at a very high rate , averaging 29 points over his last three games . Both Kyle Lowry and Amir Johnson reached double figures in points as well with 13 and 12 points respectively . The Pistons ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 49 percent from the floor and 58 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were led by the duo of Khris Middleton and Marcus Morris . Drummond went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 15 points , while also adding 17 rebounds and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 25 points and 21 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 25 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Jackson came one assist shy of a double - double , as he posted 22 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , eight assists and two steals . He 's now averaging 10 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Greg Monroe had 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
Giannis Antetokounmpo has been a model of consistency for the Bucks all season long and Monday night was his most impressive performance of the season , as he posted 34 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and five steals . The 34 points was a season - high , while the 12 rebounds was his second highest total of the season . Tuesday also marked the second time this year Antetokounmpo recorded 20 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and five steals as he continues to stuff the stat sheet as well as any player in the NBA . However , it was the play of Michael Beasley that may have been just as , if not more , important for Milwaukee 's upset victory . Beasley 's 17 points Tuesday night were his second highest total of the season and the seventh time he has reach double - digit scoring . In those seven games , the Bucks are 6 - 1 , as Beasley 's contributions off the bench have had a positive effect on Milwaukee 's offensive attack . Milwaukee will look to build on their eighth - straight playoff game when they take on the Nets in the second half of a back - to - back on Monday . The Cavaliers fell to 13 - 17 on the season and have a tough task ahead of the Toronto Raptors in the loss column . They are now 3 - 3 on the road , with their second loss coming in the season . They take on the struggling Nuggets in the second portion of a back - to - back set on Sunday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics built a strong lead early in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 29 - 19 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 40 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 39 percent from the floor and 13 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Celtics into 32 turnovers , while only committing eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who nearly recorded his triple - double . In just his third game of the season , James finished with 27 points ( 10 - 24 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and eight assists . The 21 points were a season - high for him , while the double - double was his third in the last four games . Avery Bradley had a solid showing , posting 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and a team - high nine assists . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 114 - 101 on Thursday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Oklahoma City . The Thunder was the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 41 percent from the floor and just 19 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Russell Westbrook backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 28 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 12 - 15 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and three rebounds . Durant came just shy of a triple - double , as he finished with 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and seven assists . The 23 points matched a season - high for him , while the only other player to reach double figures was Jabari Parker . He had 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and one assists , while Jerryd Bayless came off the bench for 11 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) . The Bucks will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday night , while the Bucks will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the New York Knicks in quadruple overtime , 142 - 139 , at Phillips Arena on Sunday . A game that started off with very little defense being played over the first two quarters ended up becoming much tighter over the third and fourth periods . After the Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) held a 65 - 61 lead going into halftime , the two teams combined for just 84 points in the second half . With five overtimes , there were plenty of opportunities for heroics , and Carmelo Anthony and Courtney Lee capitalized on three of them . Anthony 's driving layup with two seconds left in regulation and 18 - footer with five ticks in the first overtime helped Atlanta stay alive , while Lee 's 30 - foot three - point jumper with one second on the clock in the second overtime sent matters into a third extra period . Dennis Schroder then turned the tables , draining a driving layup with three seconds remaining in the third overtime . Finally , it was Paul Millsap who put an end to the Knicks ' first three - overtime tilt since 1951 , pouring in a shot with 27 seconds remaining that gave Atlanta ( 28 - 20 ) a 141 - 139 lead they would n't relinquish . In all , four Knicks players , including Anthony , fouled out , while Millsap played a whopping 60 minutes . Anthony led the way for Atlanta with a season - high 45 points , along with six rebounds , four assists and one block over 46 minutes , taking a whopping 36 shots in the process . Brandon Jennings , starting for Derrick Rose ( ankle ) , totaled 18 points , 11 assists , three rebounds and one steal . Lee had a near double - double with 17 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Kristaps Porzingis managed 15 points , five boards , one assist and three blocks . Justin Holiday stepped up with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . Mindaugas Kuzminskas posted 13 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block in a reserve role as well . Kyle O'Quinn hauled in 12 boards off the bench , and Joakim Noah had a modest six points but added 14 rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocks . Millsap paced Atlanta with a 37 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , one steal and one block . Kent Bazemore managed 24 points and nine rebounds . Schroder posted a 23 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , while Dwight Howard posted a 19 - point , 13 - rebound effort of his own . Tim Hardaway , Jr. matched Howard 's point total while dishing out eight assists , hauling in five rebounds and recording a steal . Mike Dunleavy led the reserves with 12 points . The Hawks visit the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday night , while the Hawks visit the New York Knicks on Wednesday night as well .
The visiting Golden State Warriors took down the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , 133 - 120 . The Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) saw stellar top - down play even despite the absence of All-Star Draymond Green . The reigning conference Player of the Month duo , Steph Curry and Kevin Durant , recorded a pair of double - doubles . Curry led the team with 29 points and dished out 11 assists , while Durant scored 26 to go with 10 assists and eight rebounds . It was a typically dominant game for the loaded superteam , as the Warriors shot over 52 percent from the field and poured in 14 three - pointers . Seven players scored in double - digits and the team dished out a whopping 38 assists . Golden State was able to quickly get ahead of the Clippers with a 33 - 22 advantage in the first quarter . The Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) remain without injured superstar Chris Paul , and could have used him in Thursday 's double - digit loss . Star forward Blake Griffin took the reigns on offense in Paul 's stead , scoring a game - high 31 points . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal Crawford scored 21 and hit five three - pointers . However , not even 50 percent shooting as a team and ten three - pointers was enough for LA to best the stacked Warriors ' squad . 15 team turnovers did little to help the Clippers ' case . The Warriors will travel to Sacramento on Saturday , while the Clippers will play in Boston on Sunday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 90 - 87 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday . These are two teams who will likely compete for a playoff spot in the east and this game had a playoff atmosphere to it . New York really turned it on late to pull out the comeback , as they outscored Los Angeles , 58 - 42 in the second half . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with the Knicks recording 19 assists to 10 turnovers , while the Lakers committed 9 turnovers to 14 assists . Carmelo Anthony led the team in scoring , as he tallied 26 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . Lou Williams was the only other starter with more than 11 points , as he dropped 15 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting off the bench . Robin Lopez led the starters , as he provided 16 points and eight rebounds . Robin Lopez and Jordan Clarkson tied the team - lead in scoring , dropping 12 points a piece . Jordan Clarkson was the only bench player in double figures , as he amassed 12 points , three assists and three steals . The Knicks ( 28 - 40 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . Carmelo Anthony did all he could to keep the Lakers hanging around , as he accumulated 26 points , 12 rebounds and four assists in the defeat . Robin Lopez was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and eight rebounds . Lou Williams was a huge spark off the bench , providing 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . New York will be in Denver on Saturday for their next game .

The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 47 percent from the floor and a meager 17 percent from beyond the arc . It was a sloppy game all - around though , as both teams turned the ball over more than 28 times . Despite out - rebounding the Bucks 37 - 37 , they turned the ball over 11 times , which allowed them to finish with the victory . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way , finishing with a game - high of 30 points ( 13 - 23 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , while also adding nine rebounds and five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 14 points and 9 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 18 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven assists , while Lowry had 18 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven assists . Ross was able to get to the free throw line 6 times , and converted on 4 - of - 6 attempts from the free throw line . The Wizards came out and got a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 24 - 27 right away in the first quarter . Along with the fast start , the Wizards also shot very well , going 54 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 25 percent from beyond the arc . John Wall did all he could to keep the Lakers in this game , going 9 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding three assists and three steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . The Cavaliers were able to force the Wizards into 13 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 46 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 13 points and 12 rebounds on the year . He had failed to reach double figures in five straight games prior to Sunday , so it was good to see him get back on track . The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 23 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 5 - 23 ) 107 - 111 at Staples Center on Sunday . Kobe Bryant made sure to save enough in the tank to give the Lakers long time rivals a run for their money . Fresh off their thrilling upset against the Golden State Warriors , the Nuggets rallied behind Jordan Barton and Nikola Jokic . Barton started the game with a game - high 25 points and added eight rebounds , two assists and a block . Harris scored 25 points , including a perfect 2 - of - 2 tally from the free throw line . Jordan Clarkson was the only other Los Angeles starter to score in double figures , putting up 11 points in 31 minutes . Up next , the Nuggets host the Clippers on Sunday . Denver is on a three - game losing streak , securing only one win over their last six games as they 've been traversing a particularly difficult stretch of their schedule . Kenneth Faried was moved back into the starting lineup , and he put up 15 points and 10 rebounds in 30 minutes . Denver has lost three straight games , and in their last two games , they were playing without Derrick Favors , whom remains sidelined with a sprained ankle . Julius Randle has filled in as the starting center in Favors ' absence , and on Wednesday , Randle scored a double - double with 15 points and 10 rebounds . D'Angelo Russell scored a team - high 17 points . The Lakers will return to action Friday when they host the banged up Bulls .
It was a big night for the Mavericks behind the arc , as the team shot a whopping 17 - of - 31 from three - point range . Nine of these threes came from D-League call - up Yogi Ferrell , who led the team with a career - high 32 points . Sharpshooter Wesley Matthews , meanwhile , scored 27 points and splashed in three three - pointers on the night . The Mavs also shot a respectable 82 percent from the free - throw line and 46 percent from the field in what was a stellar night on the offensive end for the team . For Portland , star point guard Damian Lillard delivered what was possibly his worst statistical night of the season . The All-Star went just 4 - of - 20 from the field and turned the ball over three times . His fellow guards , Evan Turner and C.J . McCollum , picked up the slack , however , as they combined for 52 points on the night . Both teams will enjoy three days of rest before taking the court on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers will visit Utah on Wednesday , while the Trail Blazers will host the Blazers on that of the second half of a back - to - back . The Trail Blazers ( 22 - 29 ) have now won nine of their last 14 games , as they continue to fall down the standings . Yogi McCollum was the player of the game , as he scored a game - high 32 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Damian Lillard was second on the team , as he accumulated 13 points , nine rebounds and six assists . Damian Lillard finished with 13 points , nine rebounds and six assists .
The Miami Heat ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 1 ) 107 - 102 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Arena in Miami Florida . The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , out - scoring the Celitcs 52 - 28 . They were able to finish the game shooting 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors shot 47 percent from the floor and only 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were led by the duo of DeMar DeRozan and DeMar DeRozan . DeRozan went 11 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also adding three rebounds and four steals . He 's now averaging 18 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The other two starters to reach double figures in points was Luol Deng , who went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 18 points . The only other member of the starting five to reach double figures in points was Mario Chalmers , who scored 12 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) in 24 minutes . Coming off the bench , Mario Chalmers had arguably his best game of the season , scoring 12 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and dishing out six assists . The Heat 's next game will be at home against the Orlando Magic on Wednesday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday . Both teams were shorthanded in the contest , however . The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , Jrue Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun Moore ( toe ) , making the game very one sided from the gate . The New Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just six points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter . The second half was a different story , as Los Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter . Chris Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first three quarters of action . Paul added five rebounds and three steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake Griffin 's ( knee ) absence . DeAndre Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and nine rebounds rather easily . Jamal Crawford and Marreese Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively . Tim Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Buddy Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 88 - 69 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) were n't sure that they 'd have Paul George ( ankle ) available to help try to break a two - game losing streak until late in the afternoon , but he ultimately was able to suit up and share the co - lead in scoring among the starting five . He also helped spearhead a defensive effort that saw Indiana limit the Magic ( 4 - 7 ) to a 32 percent success rate from the field and a 20 percent tally from three - point range , while also holding them to a season - low point total . They also elicited a total of 14 turnovers from Orlando while turning the ball over just nine times in their own right . The key for the Pacers was their play in the two middle quarters , as they outscored the visitors by a 55 - 38 margin over the second and third periods . Orlando was paced by Evan Fournier , who supplied 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Elfrid Payton managed 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Nikola Vucevic struggled through an uncharacteristic 1 - of - 10 effort from the field , an unsightly performance that he nevertheless managed to somewhat compensate for with 12 rebounds . Aaron Gordon was the only other Magic player to hit double digits in the scoring column , pacing the bench with 11 points , three boards and an assist . George and Monta Ellis each turned in 13 - point efforts , with the former posting six rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block , while the latter had a pair of rebounds and assists , to go along with a block . Thaddeus Young provided a solid complementary effort with 11 points , five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Jeff Teague filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , eight rebounds , five assists , a steal and three blocks . C.J . Miles led the reserves with 16 points , four rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks . The Magic head back home to await the New Orleans Pelicans for a Wednesday visit , while the Pacers have their own Wednesday home date with the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 110 - 96 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . The Grizzlies have been dominant at home this season and this wire - to - wire win just adds to the resume . It was as one - sided as it could be , with the Grizzlies holding a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . While Dallas did n't dominate any statistic , it won nearly every one . In fact , Memphis ended up winning the shooting , assisting , turnovers , steals , fastbreak points and points in the paint differentials . The Grizzlies starters really took control , as they outscored the Mavericks starters , 84 - 63 . The Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) were expected to win this game rather easily , but it took a huge comeback effort to pull it out . Mike Conley was the player of the game , as he accumulated 21 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , totaling 15 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Matt Barnes was huge off the bench , providing 14 points , seven rebounds and three assists . On deck for Dallas is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday . The Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 8 tries . Mike Conley led Dallas in scoring , as he accumulated 21 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , collecting 15 points , 10 rebounds , four assists and three blocks . JaMychal Green totaled 13 points and 10 rebounds en route to a double - double .
The Houston Rockets ( 24 - 9 ) defeated the Eric Gordon ( 13 - 40 ) 123 - 100 on Tuesday night at American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the 44 - 44 first half by the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Rockets also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 53 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the 9 - team line 35 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . They also shot a meager 53 percent from the field , while the Mavericks shot just 44 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc . Already wrought with injuries , the Mavericks caught even more bad news during this game . Dirk Nowitzki and Dirk Nowitzki were the only players to reach double figures in points . Harden finished with a game - high of 34 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 12 - 12 FT ) , while also adding five assists and five rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 35 points and 16 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Wesley Matthews finished with 19 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , a rebound and an assist . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 22 rebounds over his last two games . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Justin Anderson , who came off the bench to score 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 22 minutes . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Eric Gordon will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday as well .
The Denver Nuggets ( 15 - 20 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 5 - 28 ) 110 - 101 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Despite a fierce comeback by the Timberwolves , who out - scored the Timberwolves 58 - 48 in the second half , the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Timberwolves were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 41 - 42 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Timberwolves were led by Arron Afflalo in this one , as he went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 34 points , while adding two rebounds , two assists and one steal . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , JJ Reddick had a strong showing . He went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 4 rebounds on the year . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Thaddeus Young , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds in 30 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 34 - 33 ) defeated the visiting New Orleans Pelicans ( 37 - 30 ) 84 - 85 , Thursday evening at BMO Harris Bradley Center . Anthony Davis notched his first triple - double of the season with 20 points ( 6 - 18 FG ) , 12 rebounds and 4 assists . Anthony Davis turned in another strong performance with 20 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and nine rebounds , and Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and added nine rebounds and five assists . John Henson added 14 points ( 5 - 18 FG ) and eight rebounds in 37 minutes off the bench . Jerryd Bayless came off the bench to score 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 3PT , 6 - 6 FT ) in 34 minutes . Michael Carter-Williams scored only six points ( 2 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , but he did have four assists and two rebounds in 25 minutes . Michael Carter-Williams ( knee ) returned to the starting lineup after a four - game absence and finished with six points ( 2 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds , four assists and one steal in 37 minutes . Anthony Davis led the Bucks in scoring with 20 points ( 6 - 18 FG ) , to go with 12 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 42 minutes . Giannis Antetokounmpo contributed 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) , nine rebounds , five assists , three blocks and one steal in 36 minutes . Quincy Pondexter came up big off the bench with 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt ) , eight rebounds and five assists . John Carter-Williams was the Spurs’ leading scorer with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG ) , nine rebounds and five assists in 36 minutes . Jerryd Bayless came off the bench and scored 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt ) , along with five rebounds and five assists , in 34 minutes . Eric Gordon finished with nine points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , along with seven assists , one rebound and one steal , in 35 minutes . Anthony Davis finished with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 0 FT ) , nine rebounds , five assists , three blocked shots and one steal , while Tyreke Evans chipped in 18 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 5 - 10 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , seven rebounds and two assists , in 42 minutes . No other player scored in double figures for the Pelicans , who struggled on both ends of the floor . The series now heads back to New Orleans for Game 37 on Sunday . The winner will go on to face the Cleveland Cavaliers in the Eastern Conference Finals .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 14 - 5 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 8 - 10 ) 120 - 100 on Sunday . In a battle between two potent offenses , the defenses were on display . Los Angeles absolutely stifled the Pelicans , as they held them to 48 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Clippers recorded 34 assists and seven turnovers , while the Pelicans committed 11 turnovers to 34 assists . The Clippers came into this game as a huge underdog , but held their own to keep it close throughout . This was one of the best offensive performances that the Pelicans have had all season and it 's a shame they couldn’t keep the Clippers off the free - throw line . Blake Griffin was the star of the show though , as he tallied 26 points and three rebounds in the win . Chris Paul also played well , as he amassed 18 points , 16 assists and six rebounds . The Clippers have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next matchup . The Clippers continue to surprise and these sort of wins are a credit to their resiliency and grittiness . Anthony Davis played one of his best games of the season , as he accumulated 30 points , seven rebounds and five assists in the win . Chris Paul had one of the best games of his career , as he accumulated 18 points , 16 assists and six rebounds in the win . DeAndre Jordan destroyed the Pelicans in the paint , as he snatched down 18 rebounds and swatted away five shots in the victory . On deck for Los Angeles is a matchup with the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 118 - 104 , at Verizon Center on Saturday . The Wizards were expected to win this game rather easily and they took care of business after the first quarter . Indiana actually led for the majority of the game , as the Pacers never led by more than two points . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Wizards going 14 - of - 19 and the Pacers hitting just 2 - of - 27 from long distance . Washington also dominated the steal differential , winning that battle , 5 - 2 . The Pacers ( 22 - 18 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . John Wall carried the load , as he tallied 28 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Monta Ellis was second on the team , with 17 points , three assists and two steals . Lavoy Allen led the bench with 15 points and three rebounds . The Pacers ( 19 - 19 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . John Wall did all he could for Indiana , as he accumulated 28 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Monta Ellis was n't far behind , tallying 22 points and three assists . Monta Ellis was a nice spark off the bench , providing 17 points , three rebounds and three assists . The Pacers will be in action again on Saturday against the Miami Heat .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 37 - 24 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 28 - 33 ) 94 - 88 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Grizzlies got out quickly in this game , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 28 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Grizzlies shot the ball well , going 46 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 43 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were also able to force the Jazz into 17 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Zach Randolph had his way with the Jazz . He went 9 - for - 18 from the field and 6 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding eight rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 8 rebounds per game . Gordon Hayward did n't have his best shooting performance , going 7 - for - 12 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line , but he still finished with 18 points , six rebounds and two assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Lance Stephenson had an efficient 16 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) in 25 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 19 - 25 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 19 - 21 ) 108 - 98 on Tuesday at the Verizon Center in Washington . The Wizards came out and got a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 32 - 17 right away in the first quarter . The Wizards did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Wizards were also the superior shooters . They finished at 51 percent from the field and 55 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 48 percent from the floor and 43 percent from deep . With Brandon Knight still sidelined with an ankle injury , Damian Lillard again did everything he could to keep the Wizards in this game . He went 9 - for - 16 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding two assists in 34 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Damian Lillard also had a solid all - around game . He went 7 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding six assists as well . He was able to get to the line 34 times and converted on 1 - of - 1 attempts from beyond the arc . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Bradley Beal was able to notch his first double - double of the year , as he finished with 16 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and five assists in 24 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in four out of his last five games . Bradley Beal did n't have the best night offensively , as he went 4 - for - 8 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 16 points . He also chipped in three rebounds , six assists and one steal as well . Allen Crabbe came off the bench to score 14 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) , four rebounds and three assists in 31 minutes . The only other Buck reaching double figures in points was Jared Dudley , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and one rebound in 37 minutes . The Wizards ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Wizards will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the New York Knicks , 116 - 105 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Wire-to-wire wins in the NBA usually indicate a blowout , but that was far from the case here . In fact , the Thunder never led by more than 13 , as this was a single - digit game for well over 53 minutes . Oklahoma City did most of their damage in the first half , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 52 - plus minutes . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with Oklahoma City recording 21 assists to just 12 turnovers , while New York committed 15 turnovers to just 19 assists . The Thunder ( 32 - 34 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Carmelo Westbrook carried the load , as he collected 38 points , 14 rebounds , 12 assists and three steals . Derrick Rose finished second on the team , totaling 25 points and seven assists . Steven Adams was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 11 points and eight rebounds . Jerami Grant was the only bench player in double figures , providing 13 points and five rebounds . The Knicks will host the New York Knicks on Tuesday for their next game . The Thunder ( 32 - 25 ) have been dominant at home this season , as this marks their 18th win in 52 games at home . Derrick Rose was the player of the game , as he accumulated 25 points , four rebounds and seven assists on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Kristaps Porzingis finished second on the team , totaling 25 points , four rebounds , seven assists and two steals . Kristaps Porzingis amassed 11 points and seven rebounds en route to a double - double .
The Utah Jazz ( 18 - 33 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 17 - 32 ) 102 - 90 on Friday . A thoroughly dominating performance by Utah was perhaps to be expected , considering that the Jazz came into the contest surrendering the second - lowest amount of points per game ( 97 ) , while the Kings checked in with the second - highest turnover rate ( 9 ) on a nightly basis . Both figures proved to be prophetic Thursday , as the Jazz held Sacramento to a season - low scoring total , and also limiting them to a 39 percent success rate from the field . The Kings were led by Derrick Favors 's 20 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors was next with 20 points , nine rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Ben McLemore was next on the second unit with 15 points , two rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . Omri Casspi and Ben McLemore contributed a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and five assists , and the latter supplying two rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . Ramon Sessions paced the bench with 11 points , four rebounds and five assists . The Kings remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head home to face the Toronto Raptors on Sunday . Utah was led by DeMarcus Cousins 's 27 points , which he supplemented with 10 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a block . Derrick Favors managed 20 points , nine rebounds , five assists , three blocks and a block . Ben McLemore was next in line , supplying a 15 - point , two - rebound double - double that also included two steals and a block . Ramon Sessions was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points , four assists and four rebounds . The Kings remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday night .

He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 29 points , 17 rebounds and 18 assists over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday .

After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Jeff Green backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 18 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with one rebound and an assist . The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Dallas Mavericks 94 - 87 Tuesday at the AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and Kawhi Leonard shining from start to finish . Leonard finished with a game - high 26 points on top of seven rebounds and two assists , while Wesley Matthews added 26 points of his own , shooting 8 - of - 19 from the field and 5 - of - 11 from behind the arc . Kawhi Leonard added 21 points and seven assists of his own , while Harrison Barnes had a double - double of his own with 17 points and 2 - of - 15 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge scored a team - high 17 points in 40 minutes , and Seth Williams had 14 points of his own . As a team , the Mavericks shot a scorching 50 percent from the field and 58 percent from behind the arc . In the end , it was a forgettable night for Dallas , as they shot just 43 percent from the field and committed 11 turnovers . Up next , the Spurs will look to continue their winning ways against the Raptors on Friday , while the Mavericks will look to turn things around Friday against the Pacers .

Chris Harden recorded the NBA 's first triple - double of the 2014 - 27 season , putting up 21 points , nine rebounds , and 3 assists in 31 minutes . He also threw in two steals and a blocked shot for good measure . Teammate Dwight Howard helped into the starting lineup in place of Dwight Howard , contributing 26 points , five rebounds , and five assists in a team - high 40 minutes . The Heat are trying to fend off the San Antonio Spurs , Portland Trail Blazers , Los Angeles Clippers , and Houston Rockets for the second seed in the Western Conference . Their three games left are against the Los Angeles Clippers , Golden State Warriors and Indiana Pacers . Shawne Williams played well in his second game back from a shoulder injury to keep the Heat in the game . Ariza finished with 26 points , five rebounds and five assists in 40 minutes . Patrick Beverley made his season debut after being sidelined since training camp with a hamstring injury . He put up 15 points and four rebounds in 30 minutes off the bench . A lot of the Heat ' troubles are due to their attempt to change the culture their this season , but they 've also been hindered by all the injuries they 've had to deal with . J.R. Cole ( heel ) returned to the court , playing 16 minutes off the bench in this game , and he did score six points and five assists in 16 minutes of action . The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 114 - 102 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Wire-to-wire wins in the NBA usually indicate a blowout , but that was far from the case here . In fact , the Thunder never led by more than 6 points , as this was a single - digit game for well over 0 - 89 . Defense was key for the Thunder , as they held the Grizzlies to 48 percent from the field and 16 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed Memphis as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Thunder hanging around , as they committed 20 turnovers to 21 assists , while the Grizzlies committed 20 turnovers to 21 assists . The Thunder ( 29 - 22 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Russell Westbrook carried the load , as he tallied 38 points , 13 rebounds , 12 assists and three steals . Steven Adams finished second on the team with 16 points and 12 rebounds . Steven Adams amassed 16 points and 12 rebounds .
The Sacramento Kings ( 3 - 5 ) nipped the Toronto Raptors ( 4 - 2 ) 96 - 91 on Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . While both teams have already been eliminated from playoff contention , it was still another hard fought game Sunday . Both teams shot very similar percentages , with the Kings going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went just 36 percent from the floor and a meager 23 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Kings also secured a 47 - 43 rebounding advantage , while committing just nine of their own . The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who went 9 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding five rebounds and a steal . He 's now averaging 23 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Lowry on the other hand went 5 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 15 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 27 rebounds over his last two games . Arron Afflalo was the other player to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 12 . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Raptors will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .

The Suns had just two leads in this game that lasted less than a minute and the final one at the end of the second quarter was followed up by a 67 - 45 margin by the end of the third quarter . Shooting was the difference in the game , with Brooklyn hitting 45 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range , while Phoenix went 37 percent from the field and 28 percent from three - point range on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as the Nets recorded more assists than the Suns , while committing less turnovers . The Nets ( 15 - 56 ) have now lost three of their last five games , as they continue to fall deeper out of the playoffs . The Phoenix Suns defeated the Sacramento Kings , 105 - 103 , at Golden 2 Center on Sunday . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . DeMarcus Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 22 points , 11 rebounds , a pair of assists and a steal . The host Los Angeles Lakers handily defeated the Golden State Warriors on Friday , 117 - 97 . It was Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) coach Luke Walton 's first game against the Warriors since leaving the organization over the offseason . Walton coached the Warriors for the beginning of their historic 2015 - 16 regular season in place of an injured Steve Kerr , but later left to pursue the head coaching job in Los Angeles . Walton certainly got the best of his former team , as the Lakers were able to maintain their hefty halftime lead down the stretch . The team successfully capitalized on their size advantage , holding a 51 - 40 advantage in the rebounding column . Third-year forward Julius Randle led the team with 20 points and was a monster on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds . The Lakers also saw success from the line , hitting over 90 percent of their free - throws . For the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) , it was a tough night from beyond the arc . After showing dominant offensive flow on Thursday in a rout of the Thunder , the Warriors shot just 5 - for - 32 from three in Friday 's contest . This included 0 - for - 10 for Steph Curry , whose NBA-record streak of 157 games with a three - point make finally came to an end . The results were n't much better for Klay Thompson , who went just 2 - for - 10 . Kevin Durant , meanwhile , continued to perform with his new team , leading the game with 27 points . The Lakers will host the Suns on Sunday , while the Warriors will host the still - winless Pelicans on Monday .

The Orlando Magic defeated the Chicago Bulls , 97 - 98 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic ( 16 - 38 ) may sport the worst record in the league , but they may be one of the feistiest cellar dwellers in the history of the NBA . Orlando has kept their competitive spirit thriving despite the disappointing season , and has often played as if they 're capable of beating virtually any team in the NBA on the right night . The Magic ( 32 - 20 ) were the latest unit to learn that lesson the hard way , as they first saw the Magic storm back from a 16 - 16 first quarter deficit to forge a 63 - 71 halftime with 1:52 to play to tie the game at both 94 and 98 in the closing seconds . Taking the ball for a final possession with two seconds remaining , the Magic saw Jimmy Butler basket with a driving layup with just over two seconds remaining to seal the win . Butler 's aforementioned 25 - point , 15 - rebound double - double led the way for the visitors , and he added five assists , a steal and a block . Gasol was next with a 25 - point , 15 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , a steal and a block . Evan Fournier was next with 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and a steal . Derrick Rose was right behind him with 10 points , a rebound and an assist . Elfrid Payton managed a near double - double with 10 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two steals . Evan Fournier paced the Bulls with 18 points , three rebounds , three assists and a steal . Derrick Rose was next with 10 points , 11 assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Channing Frye led the second unit with 12 points , one rebound , two assists and one steal . The Magic head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Bulls remain home and await the Toronto Raptors for a Friday night showdown as well .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday night . The Bulls ( 14 - 15 ) checked in to Friday night on a downturn , as they 'd lost four of their last five . They were able to get off to a fast start , however , outscoring the host Hornets ( 17 - 13 ) by a 26 - 22 margin in the first quarter . Charlotte turned the table quickly in the second period , however , almost doubling up the visitors with a 26 - 14 advantage . Although the Bulls bounced back in the third , the Hornets were able to keep pace every step of the way throughout the second half , which resulted in their tenth home win of the season . While Chicago failed to find much scoring from their starting five outside of Jimmy Butler , Charlotte benefited from a balanced effort across their first unit . As customary , the effective backcourt duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum led the way , as they supplied matching 20 - point contributions . Butler 's 24 points led the Bulls , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and a block . Dwyane Wade was second , registering 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Taj Gibson supplied 10 points , three rebounds and a pair of blocks . Rajon Rondo mustered a modest seven points but also provided 10 assists , nine rebounds and two steals . Doug McDermott led the second unit with 15 points , while Nikola Mirotic managed an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double that also included a steal and a block in just 19 minutes off the bench . Walker added five rebounds , four assists and a steal to his co - leading point total , while Batum 's performance was a triple - double that also consisted of 11 rebounds , 10 assists , a steal and a block . Cody Zeller went for 13 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two blocks and a steal . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist had a near double - double with 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists , a steal and four blocks . Frank Kaminsky III paced the bench with 13 points , five boards , an assist and a block . The Bulls are in San Antonio on Christmas Day to take on the Spurs , while the Hornets visit the Brooklyn Nets on Monday evening .
It took a lot of big shots to get to overtime , as there were 10 ties in this OT thriller . Devin Booker tied the game twice in the final 32 seconds , as his 34 points were a career - high . Many of the statistics were lopsided , but the biggest differential was in the blocks department , as the Hawks swatted away 13 shots to the Suns two . Atlanta also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 50 - 51 . The Suns ( 20 - 58 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as they continue to fall deeper out of the playoffs . Devin Booker led the team in scoring , as he tallied 34 points , five rebounds and two assists . Paul Millsap went just 3 - of - 8 from the field , but finished with 13 points , 17 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Mirza Teletovic was the only other player in double figures , accruing 17 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Kyle Korver and Mirza Teletovic led the Suns in scoring , dropping 11 points a piece . Phoenix will host the New York Knicks on Saturday for their next game . The Hawks ( 46 - 32 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 13 tries . Devin Booker led the way for Atlanta , as he tallied 34 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals on 12 - of - 25 shooting . Jeff Teague finished second on the team , totaling 20 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 129 - 109 at Target Center on Saturday evening . Karl-Anthony Towns imposed his will on this one , as he poured in a game - high 37 points to help the Timberwolves dominate , as they won every quarter on their way to the 20 - point win over the struggling Nets . The Timberwolves ( 18 - 29 ) shot 51 percent from the field , as all five starters scored in double digits to lead the way . Karl-Anthony Towns grabbed 13 rebounds and recorded four blocked shots , to go along with his game - high 37 points . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 23 points , while Zach LaVine chipped in 20 . Shabazz Muhammad came up big off the bench for Minnesota , as he finished with 18 points and seven rebounds . The Timberwolves will look to keep rolling , as they play host to the Magic on Monday . The Nets ( 9 - 27 ) outscored the T-Wolves 58 - 48 in the paint and 23 - 12 in fast - break points but were not able to compete as efficiently , as they shot 48 percent from the field , and 27 percent from deep , compared to the 45 percent the T-Wolves hit from deep . Brook Lopez was the high - point man for the Nets , with 25 points , to go along with seven rebounds . Three other players scored in double digits for Brooklyn , including Sean Kilpatrick , who added 14 points , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Nets will look to bounce back , as they visit Miami on Monday .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Houston Rockets , 121 - 94 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Houston leading for the majority of the first quarter , Golden State held Houston to just 50 points in the second half . Defense was key , as they held Houston to 42 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range , 50 percent from three - point range and 50 percent from three - point range . Golden State also dominated down low , as they won the rebounding battle , 43 - 44 and the points in the paint differential 56 - 44 . The Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . James Harden continued his great form , as he tallied 18 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists in the win . Klay Thompson was second on the team , as he scored 23 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting . Draymond Green did commit six turnovers , but he accumulated 18 points , eight rebounds and six assists on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Stephen Curry was the only other starter with more than 12 , as he tallied 23 points , seven rebounds and five assists . More importantly , those three players combined to go 31 - of - 51 from the field . Houston will look to bounce back on Sunday in a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 3 - 4 ) 101 - 97 on Saturday . Cleveland has won seven straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 7 - 1 . Monta Ellis led the way for the Pacers in the losing effort , recording 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , three assists , five rebounds , and one steal in 34 minutes . His running - mate in the backcourt , George Hill , was not far behind , scoring 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) to go with five assists , five rebounds and one steal in 34 minutes . Kevin Love contributed 22 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , 19 rebounds , three assists and three blocks in 39 minutes . Monta Ellis had 25 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , five rebounds , three assists and one steal in 34 minutes . George Williams ( 14 ) was the only other starter to score in double figures , while Matthew Dellavedova managed 5 points ( 4 - 3 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) and eight assists in 24 minutes . Richard Jefferson was the only other player to score in double figures , finishing with a team - high 25 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt ) , to go with eight rebounds , one assist and one steal in 4 minutes . The Cavaliers are off until Wednesday , when they take on the Charlotte Hornets at the Staples Center .
The Houston Rockets notched their ninth straight win as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 100 , at Toyota Center on Friday night . The Rockets made history in a couple of different ways in this contest , beginning with their nine - game win streak , which is their longest win streak in eight years . They also sank an NBA-record 24 three - pointers , while James Harden passed Hakeem Olajuwon , to become the Rockets ' all time triple - double leader , as he notched his second straight triple - double , for the fifteenth of his career . Harden finished with 29 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , along with 13 assists and 11 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Meanwhile , Eric Gordon notched a season - high 29 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , including 7 - of - 12 from deep , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) shot 24 - of - 61 from long distance and tallied 27 assists in the game . They moved to 10 - 2 at home and will head out to Minnesota to take - on the Timberwolves on Saturday , for their second game in as many nights . The Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) fell short on the second night of a back - to - back as they struggled shooting , going 41 percent from the field , 33 percent from long range and only 55 percent from the foul line . Anthony Davis scored 19 points before he was forced to leave the game in the third quarter with a leg contusion , and did not return . No player tallied more than 20 points for the Pelicans but five players scored in double figures , including Cheick Diallo who went 4 - of - 5 from the field , for 10 points , along with seven rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans fell to 3 - 10 on the road and will look to bounce back as they visit San Antonio on Sunday .
The Sacramento Spurs ( 5 - 4 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 6 - 4 ) 91 - 94 on Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Kings 47 - 38 , to coast to a nine - point victory on the road . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were also able to force the Kings into 14 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Spurs were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who went 10 - for - 19 from the floor and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . The only other King in double figures was Danny Green , who posted 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 34 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The visiting San Antonio Spurs beat the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday , 97 - 90 . The Spurs ( 55 - 16 ) look poised for a second straight 60 - win season as they continue to roll as the season draws to a close . San Antonio remains two games back from first place in the Western Conference , but still has plenty of time to overtake Golden State for the league 's top record . On Thursday , All-Star forward LaMarcus Aldridge found his groove and helped lead the Spurs offense past the tough grit - and - grind Grizzlies . Aldridge led the team with 23 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting . Superstar Kawhi Leonard had a bit of an off night despite still pouring in 19 points . Leonard shot under 50 percent from the field and went a sub - par 4 - of - 7 from the free - throw line . Memphis ( 40 - 32 ) has now dropped two straight after a four - game win streak earlier in the month . The Grizzlies have fallen to seventh place in the Western Conference , allowing themselves to be eclipsed by the Thunder for sixth . Memphis struggled against the Spurs ' top - ranked defense , shooting just 43 percent from the field on the night . Only two Grizzlies scored in double digits , with only Mike Conley eclipsing 20 points . Conley scored 22 , while All-Star center Marc Gasol added 13 points and 10 rebounds . San Antonio will host the Knicks on Saturday , while the Grizzlies visit Golden State on Sunday .

Davis finished with 28 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 12 - 14 FT ) , 16 rebounds and two blocked shots , while Matthews finished with 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , two rebounds and two steals in 36 minutes . Both teams came into this game with a lengthy lay - off and it was evident by their play . The two teams combined for just 76 points in the first half on 29 percent shooting . In fact , the 34 - point first half for the Heat was their lowest - scoring half of the season . It was the rebounding that won the game for the Clippers , as they snatched down 51 boards to the Heat 50 . Los Angeles hasn’t been playing their best ball recently and this may be their worst loss in that stretch . Goran Dragic did all he could though , as he tallied 24 points , six rebounds and five assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , dropping 15 points and 13 rebounds . James Johnson was the only other player in double figures , tallying 12 points , six rebounds and three assists . Los Angeles wo n't play again until Sunday against the Washington Wizards and Blake Griffin is expected to make his return for that matchup . The Heat were a 17 - point favorite in this game and narrowly had one of their worst losses of the year . Chris Paul flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 19 points , six rebounds and 18 assists . Los Angeles will return to action on Saturday in a home matchup against the Chicago Bulls .

Beal did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 108 - 94 Tuesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge shining from start to finish . Leonard finished with a game - high 36 points on top of eight rebounds and four assists , while LaMarcus Aldridge shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 25 points and grabbing six rebounds of his own . With the pair accounting for over half of the Spurs ' points Tuesday night , no other San Antonio players managed to score in double figures , but six managed to score at least six points . For the Thunder , they could n't overcome a slow start to the game and one of their poorest shooting performances of the season . Overall as a team , Oklahoma City shot just 35 percent from the field and 25 percent from beyond the arc . Russell Westbrook managed to lead the way with a team - high 27 points on top of 14 assists and six rebounds , while the starting frontcourt of Steven Adams and Domantas Sabonis each recorded their own double - doubles , combining for 29 points and 22 rebounds . The Thunder have now dropped two straight against two of the NBA 's best teams by a combined 30 points . Up next , the Spurs will remain home Thursday to take on the 76ers , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Bulls .
The Golden State Warriors ( 11 - 2 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 5 - 21 ) 124 - 121 on Tuesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Golden State . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 52 percent from the floor and just 50 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were able to force the Warriors into 34 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Durant had 33 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , six rebounds and two steals , while Durant had a game - high of 33 points ( 10 - 17 FG , 8 - 11 FT ) , to go along with six rebounds and five assists . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 13 rebounds . Curry , on the other hand , finished with 20 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 1 - 11 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) of his own , to go along with five assists and three blocked shots . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 5 points and seven rebounds on the year . Also playing a big factor in the win was Stephen Curry . Curry went 7 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding five assists as well . He had shot 57 percent from the three - point line in his last two games , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Matthew Dellavedova added 10 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and five assists in 34 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Bucks will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
