The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 100 - 93 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . More often than not , the trio of LeBron James , Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving are essentially enough to overcome most opponents . It was a different story Sunday , however , as veteran Channing Frye actually led the way with a season - high 20 - point effort in 25 minutes off the bench . The aforementioned starters were n't necessarily underwhelming , as they combined for 55 points , including four total three - pointers from Love and James . Defense was also undeniably a factor , as Cleveland ( 8 - 1 ) held the Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) to 38 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 21 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Marvin Williams posted 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum managed a near double - double with 15 points , nine boards , seven assists , two steals and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist did get there , supplying 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Frye added three rebounds and three blocks to his team - high scoring total . A pair of 19 - point efforts from James and Irving paced the starting five , with the former also filling out the stat sheet with eight rebounds , eight assists , a steal and a block and the latter dishing out four assists , posting three rebounds and recording a steal . Love was strong as well , pouring in 17 points and bringing in 11 rebounds , four assists and a steal . Tristan Thompson mustered a modest four points , but did bring in 12 rebounds . The Hornets move on to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Tuesday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to take on the Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Charlotte Hornets 105 - 90 at Spectrum Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) pulled out their fifth straight win behind a strong effort from Mike Conley . The floor general for the Grizzlies was an all around force from end - to - end , especially after losing James Ennis ( calf ) . The calf injury flared up after returning to the lineup on Monday , and is another blow to the front court for Memphis given Chandler Parsons ( bruised left knee ) inability to play for roughly two more weeks . Memphis controlled the pace of the game from start to finish and never let the Hornets ( 8 - 5 ) get close enough to make it a game . The game got blow fully open after Conley buried a 27 - foot three point shot to take a 69 - 45 lead with just a few seconds left in the third quarter . The Grizzlies point guard finished with 31 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals on 11 - of - 21 shooting . JaMychal Green had a great performance in the starting lineup with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist on 4 - of - 4 shooting in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker led the starting lineup in scoring for the Hornets , but failed to provide enough to get his team back in the game after contributing 17 points and two assists . Charlotte got strong productivity from the bench , where Frank Kaminsky dropped 23 points on 11 shots in 20 minutes , while Spencer Hawes added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Both teams play on Saturday , as the Hornets host the San Antonio Spurs , while the Grizzlies head to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 23 - 16 ) 88 - 79 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Grizzlies got out quickly in this game , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 18 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Grizzlies shot the ball well , going 44 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 39 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were also able to force the Jazz into 17 turnovers , while only committing 13 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Grizzlies were led by the duo of Marc Gasol and Mike Conley . Gasol had a team - high of 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , while also adding four rebounds , an assist and three steals , while Gasol recorded 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and three assists . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 39 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 16 rebounds on the season . George Hill was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) . The Grizzlies ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat ( 14 - 16 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 17 - 11 ) 101 - 91 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Miami . The Heat got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 30 - 27 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Heat were also the superior shooters . They finished at 48 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 44 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 30 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 10 - 18 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and eight assists . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 56 points and 16 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Danny Granger , who recorded nine points ( 4 - 5 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and seven rebounds off the bench . The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 28 - 36 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 39 ) 107 - 100 at Sleep Train Arena on Wednesday . Rajon Rondo ( ankle ) returned to the lineup after missing Friday’s game against the Memphis Grizzlies with knee soreness , but it did n't come without his return . Too much should n't be read into the correlation , but it 's worth mentioning , because if the team does n't like the direction they 're heading with Rondo this season , he could end up on the trade block with his contract set to expire . The Kings were up 50 points from the rest of the game , with Victor Oladipo leading the way with 18 points and five assists . Evan Fournier added 16 points and seven rebounds , and Willie Cauley-Stein had an efficient outing off the bench with 19 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting from the field , and seven rebounds in 24 minutes off the bench . The Kings were led by Aaron Gordon , who put up 20 points , seven rebounds and an assist in 27 minutes . Victor Oladipo struggled with his shot , going just 6 - of - 14 from the field and 0 - of - 4 from the three - point line , but still managed 16 points , six assists and seven rebounds in 38 minutes . Rajon Rondo struggled with his shot , finishing with 16 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , 14 rebounds and 14 assists in 39 minutes . Rudy Gay and Rajon Rondo each added five points , rounding out the five Orlando players who scored in double figures . The Kings will look to bounce back when they host the Phoenix Suns ( 18 - 37 ) on Friday .

The Phoenix Suns ( 7 - 5 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 9 ) 88 - 86 on Friday . Phoenix has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Suns right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Brandon Jennings returned from a one - game absence with a calf injury to come off the bench and score five points in 22 minutes . The Pistons will go on the road to face the Denver Nuggets on Saturday . Detroit has lost their last two games , tying their longest losing streak of the season . As a team , they shot just 38 percent from the field , 28 percent from beyond the arc and 77 percent from the free throw line . However , as has been the case all season for the Sixers , they coughed up too many turnovers , giving up 34 easy points off of 14 turnovers . Coach Brett Brown opted to use a 13 - man rotation that gave every player on Detroit at least 16 minutes of action . Alexey Shved was traded to the Houston Rockets on Friday as part of a three - team trade with the Minnesota Timberwolves . The Pistons received back on the court after starting center Jonas Jerebko , who was questionable to miss the month of the season with a knee injury . The Pistons will return to action Friday against the Magic .

The Denver Nuggets defeated the host New York Knicks , 131 - 123 , at Madison Square Garden on Friday . Defense has been optional for these teams all season and the 254 combined points in this game show just where their priorities are . Denver really took control in the third quarter , outscoring New York , 36 - 22 , and never relinquishing the lead from there . Both offenses were scoring at ease , with both teams shooting over 55 percent from the field . The Nuggets feasted down low , as they won the rebounding differential , 44 - 33 , and outscored the Knicks , 68 - 52 , in the paint . The Nuggets ( 24 - 29 ) have been one of the best offenses in the league this season and this 131 - point outing shows just how efficient they can be . Nikola Jokic was the player of the game , as he dropped a career - high 40 points on 17 - of - 23 shooting , adding nine rebounds , five assists and two rebounds to his tally . Wilson Chandler finished second on the team , collecting 19 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Jameer Nelson started for Emmanuel Mudiay and accrued 16 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Will Barton was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 15 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . The Knicks ( 22 - 33 ) have had a ton of drama surrounding their team and losses like this show just why . Carmelo Anthony did all he could to carry New York , as he accumulated 33 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals on 13 - of - 20 from the field . Kristaps Porzingis was second on the team , finishing with 17 points , four rebounds and two assists . Brandon Rose started for Emmanuel Mudiay and accrued 16 points , seven rebounds and two assists .

In fact , the Nuggets led for nearly every minute of this game , with the Nuggets having their only lead in the first quarter . Both offenses were on point , as they each shot over 53 percent from the field . The Nuggets made their presence felt down low , outrebounding the Bucks , 48 - 38 , and outscoring them in the paint , 62 - 46 . Kenneth Faried recorded a double - double , totaling 19 points and 11 rebounds . John Henson was the only other starter in double figures , as he amassed 14 points and four rebounds . Denver 's next game will be on Wednesday , when they take on the Washington Wizards at home . The Nuggets ( 22 - 27 ) have been a different team over recent weeks and blowout wins like this show just how good they can be . Jabari Parker had one of the best games of his career , as he led the Nuggets with 23 points , eight rebounds , five assists and two steals on 9 - of - 13 shooting . The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 93 - 91 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday night . The Sixers ( 9 - 24 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Timberwolves ( 11 - 24 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing LaVine 's ridiculous output . The Sixers ( 11 - 24 ) , on the other hand , managed to have an even worse night shooting than Philadelphia en route to their eighth straight victory , as Philadelphia shot just 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range while eliciting 17 turnovers . Zach LaVine led the way for the visitors with 28 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was next with 19 points and five boards , while Robert Covington produced 13 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , four steals and a block . Shabazz Muhammad led the second unit with 10 points , five boards and one block . Zach LaVine paced the Timberwolves with 28 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Ersan Ilyasova was productive off the bench as well with 19 points , five rebounds and one assist . Robert Covington totaled 13 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , four steals and one block . Wiggins submitted a full line of eight points , seven rebounds , three assists and a steal . Nerlens Noel led the bench with 10 points , eight rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal . The Pacers shot 48 percent from the field and only 60 percent from the three - point line , while the 24 percent from beyond the arc . They were led by 34 points ( 11 - 15 FG , 5 - 7 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) from Goran Bledsoe , as well as seven assists and four steals . Roy Hibbert had 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , 10 rebounds , one assist , and two steals , while Hibbert scored 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) with six rebounds and one assist off the bench . The Pacers had six players reach double figures in points . Roy Hibbert led all scorers with 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , five blocks , two steals and one assist , in 31 minutes . C.J . Miles chipped in 17 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . C.J . Miles followed up with 17 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) of his own , along with seven assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 21 minutes . Markieff Morris was solid as he finished with 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , six rebounds and one assist , in 30 minutes . The Chris Copeland had a double - double as well , with 27 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 3 assists . Roy Hibbert led the Pacers in scoring with 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , along with 10 rebounds , in 31 minutes . The Pacers will move on to Devner for the fifth game of their current six - game road trip , on Friday . The Suns will look to extend their win streak when they host the Kings on Sunday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 2 - 4 ) 97 - 85 on Tuesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . With the score at 91 - 86 in favor of the Thunder going into the fourth quarter , it looked like a close finish was destined to be on its way . Instead , the Thunder were able to out - score the Heat 14 - 24 in the final quarter to secure the six - point victory on the road . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 37 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Russell Westbrook backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 14 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and 0 blocked shots . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 18 points and 12 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , Russell Westbrook came just shy of another triple - double . In 27 minutes , he finished with 14 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , five rebounds and 11 assists . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get back on track offensively Monday . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Heat will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 42 - 39 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 40 - 41 ) 101 - 92 on Sunday at the American Airlines Center in Utah . The Mavericks got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Jazz 22 - 20 in the first quarter alone . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 34 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 46 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were also able to force the Jazz into 10 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Gordon Parson . Nowitzki shot 7 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 22 points , while also adding 11 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games as he continues to be one of the most consistent scorers in this team . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Shelvin Mack , who recorded 18 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt ) , two assists and and two steals . He 's now averaging 10 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Raymond Felton chipped in with 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , four rebounds and three steals . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 20 - 32 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 16 - 36 ) 111 - 106 on Saturday . The form of these two teams would have indicated a different result , but the Pelicans got a much needed win to keep slim hopes alive for the playoffs . The Pelicans outscored the Suns 30 - 32 in the fourth quarter for a comeback win . The turnovers were the key difference , as Phoenix committed 16 turnovers to the Suns 16 . This loss cracked a five - game winning streak for the Suns , so losing in the second end of a back - to - back is nothing to be upset about . Anthony Davis was fantastic , as he amassed 34 points and nine rebounds on 12 - of - 21 shooting . T.J. Warren was the only other Suns player in double figures , as he amassed 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . The Suns will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . This sort of game is a microcosm of the Suns season . The talent discrepancy on paper in this game was truly unfair , yet this game was close throughout and they trailed for the entirety of the second half . The sloppy play really killed this team , as they shot well but committed 16 turnovers . Jrue Holiday was one of the lone bright spots , as he tallied 14 points while four rebounds and five assists off the bench . The Suns will look to play better on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 48 - 9 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 24 - 32 ) 108 - 92 on Friday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Spurs also shot much better , going 52 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 41 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were also able to force the Kings into 14 turnovers , while committing only 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . DeMarcus Cousins had his best game of the year . He went 8 - for - 23 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the free throw line to score 22 points , while also nearing a triple - double with 10 rebounds and two assists . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Danny Green , who went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 16 points in 29 minutes . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only five points on Friday against the Cavaliers . Quincy Acy chipped in with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds as well . Kyle Collison had a relatively quiet game as well , going 7 - for - 8 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 23 points . He also chipped in three rebounds and six assists , coming just shy of a triple - double . Danny Green had a double - double of his own with 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt ) and seven rebounds . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other King to reach double figures in points was Kyle Anderson , who came off the bench to score 14 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) in 29 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 11 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 11 - 9 ) 103 - 101 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Clippers did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 30 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 30 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Clippers did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 13 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Blake Griffin had a big game as well . He went 11 - for - 22 from the field and 6 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 28 points , while also adding 13 rebounds and seven assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points and 13 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 11 points and 9 rebounds on the year . Elfrid Payton also had a solid all - around game . He recorded 21 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , eight assists and four steals in 37 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording three or more steals in five out of his last five games . Wesley Johnson was the other player to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 21 . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Magic will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 33 - 19 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 20 - 33 ) 95 - 93 on Friday . The form of these two teams would have indicated a different result , but the Pacers put in a great effort to pick up a needed road win . Defense was key , as the Spurs held the Pacers to 41 percent shooting and forced them to commit 12 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with San Antonio recording 18 assists to the Pacers 24 . Indiana only dominated the boards , as they snatched down 42 boards to the Pacers 50 . San Antonio has been throttling teams , but this was easily their worst offensive performance of the year . No player scored more than 18 points and no player recorded double - digits in rebounds or assists . The Pacers had four players score 11 or more points and that’s indicative of this teams nature , as they play team - ball in an individualized sport . The Pacers will look to rebound when they take on the disappointing New Orleans Pelicans on Monday . The Spurs did not have a single player who scored more than 10 points , but that 's not a huge surprise with this San Antonio team . The bench was spectacular , as they combined for 54 points , 17 rebounds and 10 assists in the win . The high - scorer for the Spurs on this evening was Tim Duncan , who collected 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two blocks in the defeat . The Pacers will look to keep up this good form against the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday .

They remain without David Lee ( hamstring ) , but Draymond Green has been more than a capable fill - in . Everyone on their roster that was on the team last season is experiencing a new level of success under new coach Steve Kerr and his offensive system that stresses ball movement . Both Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson finished with double - doubles . Curry had 24 points and five assists on 8 - of - 17 shooting from the field to go along with five assists and five rebounds . Draymond Green pitched in with 12 points , eight rebounds , four assists and three steals in 26 minutes , while Nance Jr. finished with 11 points and eight rebounds in 20 minutes . The Lakers shot 52 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , decimating a Lakers defense that has found it 's way of late and that should n't be looked at as an easy puzzle to crack . Golden State will have a couple days off before hosting the Toronto Raptors on Friday . Los Angeles has lost two straight games . They shot a woeful 36 percent from the field and 23 percent from beyond the arc Sunday . The Detroit Pistons defeated the Denver Nuggets , 103 - 86 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Saturday . In a battle between two middling Eastern Conference teams , the Pistons were able to prevail , thanks to a big fourth quarter . Detroit outscored Denver 26 - 19 in the fourth quarter and held them to just 14 points through the first nine minutes of that period . The Pistons offense was on point all evening , as they shot 48 percent from the field , 73 percent from the free - throw line and 28 percent from three - point range . The rebounding differential was huge as well , with the Pistons recording 22 assists to nine turnovers , while the Nuggets committed 16 turnovers to just 15 assists . Andre Drummond recorded another triple - double , as he led the team with 19 points , 19 rebounds and three blocks . Marcus Morris had one of his best games of the year , totaling 21 points and nine rebounds . Danilo Gallinari led the starters in scoring , dropping 21 points and nine rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 10 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Jon Leuer led the bench in scoring , as he dropped 15 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting . The Pistons will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday for their next game . The Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) have been one of the biggest disappointments this season and it 's a wonder when they 'll pull out of this hole . Emmanuel Mudiay did all he could though , as he tallied 11 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Danilo Gallinari was the only starter in double figures , as he accumulated 16 points , three rebounds and two assists . Stanley Johnson led the bench with 12 points and three rebounds , while Ish Smith provided 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists of his own .

The Lakers ( 13 - 25 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Lakers ( 22 - 15 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Memphis forced the same two - ball 35 percent from the field and 52 percent from three - point range . Four Lakers tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Los Angeles shot a stellar 51 percent from the field . The Grizzlies ( 22 - 15 ) were led by Mike Conley 's 21 points , which he supplemented with four assists and one rebound . Nick Young supplied 16 points , two assists and one block . Jordan Clarkson matched Clarkson 's point total and supplemented it with two rebounds and two assists . Timofey Mozgov produced 11 points , while Zach Randolph led the bench with 11 points , nine rebounds and one assist . Lou Williams paced the second unit with 14 points , one rebound , two assists and one block . Timofey Mozgov posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included one assist , one steal and one block . Lou Williams paced the second unit with 14 points , one rebound , two assists and one steal . Nick Young was productive as a reserve as well with 10 points , nine rebounds and one assist . Nick Young was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points and one rebound . Chandler Parsons paced the second unit with 16 points , seven rebounds and three assists , while Lou Williams and D.J . Williams were also productive on the second unit , supplying matching eight - point efforts .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 92 - 91 Monday at American Airlines Center . With just over three minutes remaining in Monday 's contest , the Thunder ( 42 - 31 ) looked dead in the water , as they were down 13 and the Mavericks ( 31 - 42 ) had control for majority of the game . Russell Westbrook , however , had other plans , as he led the team on a 140 run to end the game that was topped off by a game - winning jumper from the free throw line . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 37 points ( 16 of which came in the final quarter ) , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes , and he did so while shooting an efficient 15 - of - 30 from the field . And the MVP-candidate carried the load for Oklahoma City , as Victor Oladipo ( 15 ) and Taj Gibson ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Thunder . As for Dallas , they played a strong 45 minutes before collapsing down the stretch and missing their final six shots from the field . Six different Mavericks players managed to score in double figures , but overall , it ended up being a subpar offensive performance from the team , as they shot just 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from behind the arc . Up next , the Thunder will stay home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Mavericks will look to get back on the right track in Milwaukee on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 125 - 124 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets shot 51 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range , while Houston shot 51 percent from the field and 45 percent from long distance . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Houston winning that battle , 35 - 27 . James Harden added another triple - double to his tally , collecting 39 points , seven rebounds and 11 assists . Will Barton was huge off the bench , collecting 24 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Will Barton was huge off the bench , providing 24 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . James Harden was the player of the game , as he accumulated 39 points , seven rebounds , 11 assists and four steals . Will Barton was second on the team , providing 24 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Nikola Jokic amassed 12 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Trevor Ariza was the only other starter in double figures , tallying 14 points , four rebounds and three assists . Will Barton was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 24 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . The Rockets will look to get out of this slide on Monday in a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Chicago Bulls ( 29 - 16 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 30 - 14 ) 102 - 98 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Chicago . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 45 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were able to force the Mavericks into 12 turnovers , while committing only 21 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Bulls were led by Dirk Nowitzki in this one . Nowitzki went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding seven rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 67 points in the last three games . The only other Maverick to reach double figures in points was Taj Gibson , who finished with 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds . Taj Gibson had a solid game off the bench , as he scored 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds before fouling out . The bench had a strong showing from Chandler Parsons and Monta Ellis . Ellis finished with 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and four assists , while Gibson had 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and three assists . Rajon Rondo really struggled with his shot Wednesday , as he went just 3 - for - 9 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line , but still finished with a team - high of 20 points . Jimmy Butler was the only other player to score in double figures for the Mavericks . He finished with 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and six assists , while Gasol had 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , 16 rebounds and two blocked shots . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , while the Mavs will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 29 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 59 percent from the field , while the Bucks went just 52 percent from the floor . The Bucks also out - rebounded the Bucks 34 - 25 , even furthering their advantage in a 27 - point victory . Leading the charge was Giannis Antetokounmpo , who posted a game - high of 43 points ( 17 - 23 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 9 - 11 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , six assists and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 29 points and 17 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 20 points and 17 rebounds on the year . Michael Carter-Williams was the only other player in double figures for the Bucks . He finished with 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) , three rebounds and six assists , as he was a force on the glass . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Dallas to play the Mavericks on Wednesday .

Shooting was the glaring difference in the game , with the Heat hitting 53 percent of their shots , while Milwaukee went just 42 percent from the field . Miami did most of their damage in the first half , as they led 53 - 43 , headed into the locker room . Three-point shooting was decisive as well , with Miami going 13 - of - 30 , with Milwaukee hitting just 6 - of - 18 from long range . The Bucks ( 20 - 23 ) played this game with Jabari Parker and Malcolm Brogdon coming off the bench for disciplinary issues and that clearly put them too far behind the eight - ball to overcome . Parker came off the bench to provide 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Brogdon did n't have as much success off the bench , scoring four points on 2 - of - 10 from the field . Matthew Dellavedova started at point guard and tallied 15 points and seven assists . The Chicago Bulls ( 14 - 8 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 17 - 6 ) 115 - 106 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Derrick Rose returned to action Monday against the Raptors , and in his two games back , he 's put up 45 points and 35 points . The early - season rust seems to be breaking off , and if Rose can stay healthy , a great performance on Christmas Day could be on tap for Thursday 's game against the Lakers . Portland has lost five straight games , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Trail Blazers will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Bulls have the right guys to build a winning team around . Damian Lillard continues to struggle with his shot , as he finished with 11 points , one assist and one rebound in 44 minutes . He had been bothered by a toe injury and had n't played since Feb. 4 . Aaron Brooks stepped up big time in the starting lineup and put up 17 points and three rebounds in 17 minutes . Portland will host the New York Knicks on Saturday .

The Orlando Magic ( 4 - 5 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 1 - 7 ) 101 - 99 on Sunday . In a battle of winless teams , the Magic took down the Lakers in a poorly played game . The two teams battled turnover problems and defensive struggles all game long , with poor offensive execution hurting both teams . Rim protection killed Dallas as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Celtics hanging around , as they committed 29 turnovers to 16 assists , while the Celtics committed 19 turnovers to just 18 assists . Harrison Barnes led the team in scoring , as he dropped 28 points on 12 - of - 24 shooting . The Washington Wizards ( 19 - 18 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 19 - 20 ) 101 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Wizards road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Wizards had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 6 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , Washington had managed a paltry three wins in 21 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 100 points over the first 22 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for Washington , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Wizards roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed to find a 51 percent success rate from the field overall , and an equally impressive 50 percent tally from beyond the arc . Chicago was led by Bradley Beal 's game - high 26 points , and he supplemented the game - high scoring total with 14 assists and six rebounds . Morris supplied a 19 - point , 5 - rebound double - double , and added two assists , three steals and a block . Michael Carter-Williams was next with 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Rajon Rondo pitched in with 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals in 27 minutes , his most extensive game action in some time .

The current losing streak makes Detroit 's playoff chances tenable at best as Indiana , Brooklyn , and Boston are all ahead of the Pistons . The Pistons will look to snap their losing skid Friday in Houston .
The Golden State Warriors ( 30 - 7 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 36 - 7 ) 111 - 111 on Saturday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a different result , but the Bulls played with some serious desperation . The big difference in the game were the benches , as Chicago got 59 points from their bench , while the Warriors got just 14 points off their bench . The rebounding is what won the game for Golden State though , as they brought down 58 boards to the Warriors 45 . This has been a scary trend for the Warriors this season , as their five losses have been by a combined 109 points . This is one of the worst offensive teams in the league right now and they 'll have to figure something out on that end of the floor if they want to dig out of this hole . Chicago will have another tough matchup in their next game on Monday against the Los Angeles Clippers . The Warriors defense has been a different team over recent weeks , but this sort of win can be encouraging . Stephen Curry was once again the best player , as he tallied 21 points , nine assists and four rebounds in the win . Stephen Curry also flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 21 points , four rebounds and nine assists in the victory . Taj Mirotic also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed 10 points and eight rebounds . The Warriors ' next game is on Monday against the Sacramento Kings .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 21 - 21 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 44 - 45 ) 96 - 99 on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Minnesota . The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 57 - 49 in the first half alone . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 43 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves were also able to force the Timberwolves into 12 turnovers , while committing just 5 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Kevin Durant led the way , going 11 - for - 20 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 28 points , while also adding six rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his fourth double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 23 points and 9 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Kanter was very effective with 25 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 11 - 11 FT ) , nine rebounds and three steals . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Enes Kanter , who posted 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 21 minutes . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 3 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 3 - 3 ) 104 - 84 on Tuesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . Despite out - scoring the Grizzlies 22 - 15 in the final quarter , the Thunder were able to hold off the late comeback , and secure a victory in front of their home fans . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 37 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . The Thunder also did a solid job of the ball though , as they forced the Grizzlies into 10 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who nearly recorded a triple - double with 36 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 14 - 15 FT ) , 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Tony Allen , who came off the bench to score 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , James Johnson continued his strong play with 15 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds and two steals in 18 minutes . The Thunder ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

Despite a fierce comeback by the Timberwolves , who out - scored the Timberwolves 58 - 48 in the second half , the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Timberwolves were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 40 - 45 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Blazers were led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who posted a double - double of his own with 27 points ( 13 - 21 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and 12 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 32 points and 11 rebounds over the last two games . The 17 assists matched a season - high , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . Andrew Wiggins had a strong showing as well , posting 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and five rebounds . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 17 points and 9 rebounds . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Kevin Martin , who scored 11 points and grabbed two rebounds . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Washington Wizards , 126 - 115 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Wire-to-wire wins in the NBA usually indicate a blowout , but that was far from the case here . In fact , the Thunder never led by more than 16 , as this was a single - digit game for well over 48 minutes . Oklahoma City did most of their damage in the first half , as they took an 19 - point lead into the locker room . Washington struggled with their shots all night , as they went 48 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range . The Wizards also took care of the glass , winning the rebounding differential , 47 - 48 . Russell Westbrook added another triple - double to his tally , accumulating 35 points , 14 rebounds and 11 assists in the win . Victor Oladipo made his return from a wrist injury to accrue 25 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Bradley Beal led the team in scoring , as he amassed 19 points , seven rebounds and two assists off the bench . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , totaling 12 points and 11 rebounds . John Wall accumulated 15 points , six rebounds and 15 assists . Russell Westbrook was the player of the game , as he accumulated 35 points , 14 rebounds and 11 assists . Markieff Morris recorded a double - double , totaling 19 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Enes Kanter led the bench with 14 points and three rebounds , while Marcus Thornton provided 12 points , three rebounds and three assists .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Denver Nuggets , 91 - 80 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Spurs led for the final 42 minutes and held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The Nuggets shot 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while the Nuggets shot just 40 percent from the field and 35 percent from long distance . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with San Antonio winning that battle , 42 - 37 . The Spurs ( 13 - 10 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Nuggets is just what the doctor ordered . Kawhi Leonard was the player of the game , as he collected 25 points , seven rebounds , six assists and four steals on 11 - of - 18 shooting . Danilo Gallinari finished second on the team , totaling 16 points and 10 rebounds . LaMarcus Aldridge was the only other starter with more than four points , as he tallied 16 points and 10 rebounds . Danilo Gallinari led the team in scoring off the bench , providing 12 points and nine rebounds . Kawhi Leonard did all he could to keep Denver hanging around , as he accumulated 25 points , seven rebounds and six assists in the defeat . Danilo Gallinari recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points and 10 rebounds .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 113 - 95 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Mavericks ( 19 - 30 ) steamrolled their way to a fourth straight victory as they continue to be much - improved since the start of the new year . They have now won five of their last six games and boast a 9 - 6 record in 2017 . A major part of this run has been the play of Seth Curry , who scored a game - high 22 points Wednesday on top of six assists , four steals and three rebounds . It was his ninth game since the start of the new year with at least 15 points . The surprise performance of the night , however , came off the bench from Salah Mejri , who played just 21 minutes as a reserve but recorded 16 points and a game - high 17 rebounds in that time . Devin Harris also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 14 points in just 19 minutes . As for the 76ers ( 18 - 30 ) , they 've cooled off a bit since their hot start to January , as they have now lost three of their last four games after Wednesday 's defeat . Jahlil Okafor put together a solid offensive performance in the loss , scoring 16 points in 24 minutes , but it 's clear that Philadelphia is missing the inside presence of Joel Embiid , who has now missed five of the last six games with a knee contusion . Ersan Ilyasova added a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds , but overall for the 76ers , it was a forgettable night offensively . The team ended up shooting just 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from behind the arc while committing 21 total turnovers . Up next , the Mavericks will look to continue their winning ways against Portland on Friday , while the 76ers will travel Thursday to San Antonio .
The Phoenix Suns ( 27 - 20 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 31 - 16 ) 106 - 98 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington . The Wizards came out and got a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Wizards 29 - 17 right away in the first quarter . Along with the strong start , the Suns also secured the victory on the road . Phoenix shot 46 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards finished at 42 percent from the floor and just 44 percent from deep . It was a team - effort win for the Suns , who had six players reach double figures in points . Goran Dragic led the way , going 8 - for - 15 from the floor and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 20 points . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Markieff Morris was dialed in with his shot , going 7 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Thomas on the other hand shot 4 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 11 points , which led all scorers , but he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 20 points and 11 assists . Kris Humphries did n't have his best game from the field , as he shot only 4 - for - 8 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to finish with five points . The Suns ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday , while the Wizards will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

Philadelphia were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , while holding a double - digit lead for the majority of it . Defense was key , as they held Philadelphia to 39 percent from the field and 22 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed Philadelphia as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Pacers hanging around , as they committed 25 turnovers to 15 assists , while the Pacers committed 15 turnovers to their 18 assists . The Pacers ( 37 - 33 ) have now lost five - straight games , as they continue to fall down the standings . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 115 - 111 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Friday afternoon . The Thunder ( 7 - 7 ) have a reputation for being just slightly less prolific on the road , but they had no trouble generating offense against the lowest - ranked defensive unit in the league Thursday , even without Draymond Green , who missed the contest for the birth of his child . Russell Westbrook led the way with a near triple - double with 31 points , 15 assists and 11 rebounds . Jeff Teague was next with 14 points , six assists , five rebounds and two steals . Myles Turner turned in a typically stellar outing , led the way with 20 points , 11 rebounds , one assist and two steals . Victor Oladipo posted 14 points , five rebounds , six assists and two steals . Glenn Robinson III and Aaron Brooks combined for another pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and three assists , and the latter posting four rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Monta Ellis ( eight points , seven rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block ) and Domantas Sabonis ( seven points , six rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks ) rounded out the bench 's stellar night . The Thunder 's attack was spearheaded by Jeff Teague 's 30 points , which he supplemented with nine assists , five rebounds and six steals . Glenn Robinson III and Glenn Robinson III was next with a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former also supplying 11 rebounds , two assists and a block , and the latter tallying nine rebounds , two assists and two steals . Monta Ellis registered 12 points , seven assists , four rebounds and two steals . Steven Adams posted eight points and eight rebounds in 34 minutes .
The Golden State Warriors ( 58 - 14 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 45 ) 114 - 100 on Wednesday at the Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Warriors also shot much better , going 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 48 percent from the floor and 48 percent from deep . The Warriors also dominated the rebounding in this one , as they forced the Kings into 19 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Ty Lawson . Curry went 9 - for - 18 from the field and 5 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding 12 assists . It was his second 22 - point outing in a row for the team , as he 's now combined for 63 points over his last two games . The Warriors also received a nice contribution from their bench with both Ben McLemore and Buddy Hield reaching double figures . Lawson recorded 20 points ( 8 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and two assists over 24 minutes , while Labissiere had 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 33 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Utah Jazz , 85 - 94 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Bucks ( 30 - 40 ) came into Saturday 's contest trying to keep the pressure on eighth - seeded Denver , which they could come within one game of catching with a win against the Jazz ( 34 - 40 ) . Milwaukee was able to pull away in the third quarter after a pair of standout performances from Jabari Parker and Jabari Parker , while the latter led the way with 19 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Mack was a distant second with 13 points , 12 assists , four rebounds and a steal . Derrick Favors turned in a 12 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , two steals and two blocks . Trey Lyles was a distant second on Milwaukee with 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . Rodney Hood matched Hood 's point total and added four boards , two assists , two steals and one block . Rodney Hood provided 10 points , five boards , two assists , two steals and one block . Trey Lyles supplied 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . Joe Bayless led the bench with 12 points , and Joe Bayless led the second unit with 12 points , four rebounds and one assist . The Bucks continue their swing through the Northeast with a trip to the nation 's capital to face off with the Miami Heat on Thursday night , while the Bucks remain home and await the Sacramento Kings on Friday night .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 110 - 108 Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena . Monday 's game came with no shortage of drama , as after plenty of back and forth in the final period , Paul Millsap sit a short jumper that put the Hawks ( 14 - 12 ) up by two with just 12 seconds remaining . The Thunder ( 16 - 12 ) , with one last opportunity remaining went to their star guard Russell Westbrook , who missed a jumper , got the rebound and got his shot blocked before Oklahoma City was able to call one last timeout . The Thunder inbounded it to Westbrook again , who missed a potential game - winning 3 - pointer , and while Steven Adams was able to get the rebound for Oklahoma City , his dunk at buzzer was ruled no good . In the end , it was a battle between the team 's two starting point guards , with Dennis Schroder and Westbrook putting together two of their very best performances of the season . Schroder scored 31 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting from the field - - his second 30 - point game of the season - - on top of eight assists and five rebounds . Meanwhile , Westbrook posted 46 points - - his second highest total this season - - seven assists and 11 rebounds in 35 minutes . Ultimately , the deciding factor Monday was that Schroder got help from his teammates , while the rest of the Thunder players struggled . Atlanta 's Millsap recorded 30 points and 11 rebounds in 39 minutes , while the next highest scorer for Oklahoma City was Jerami Grant with 15 off the bench . Up next , the Thunder will travel to Minnesota on Friday to take on the Timberwolves , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Heat .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 39 - 21 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 37 - 23 ) 96 - 86 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 26 - 18 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 31 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were also able to force the Bulls into 11 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Mirotic had a big showing for the Bulls . He went 11 - for - 23 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 29 points , while also grabbing nine rebounds . The nine rebounds matched a season - high for Nikola Mirotic , while DeAndre Gasol was the only other player to score in double figures for the Bulls . Noah finished with 13 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 9 - 14 FT ) , 26 rebounds and four blocked shots , while Noah added four points ( 2 - 13 FG , 9 - 14 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Paul Paul had the most success for the Bulls . He went 12 - for - 19 from the floor and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also adding 12 assists . He 's now averaging 15 points per game on the year . Despite struggling with his shot , Jimmy Butler had a huge game , scoring 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and handing out two assists , while recording 0 - for - 9 from the three - point line over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction . Getting the start at shooting guard , Spencer Hawes also posted a double - double of his own , finishing with 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and nine rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 31 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Bull to reach double figures in points was JJ Redick , who scored 12 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 0 FT ) in 22 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Bulls will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 15 - 5 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 10 - 10 ) 107 - 105 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 52 percent from the floor and a meager 64 percent from deep . The Bucks also forced the Bucks into 18 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Tyson Chandler and Brandon Knight . Chandler went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also adding 20 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 10 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Buck reaching double - digits in points was Al-Farouq Aminu , who recorded 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and five rebounds in 28 minutes as a starter . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday as well .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 18 - 44 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 24 - 38 ) 121 - 120 on Sunday at the Pepsi Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got out to an extremely quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 31 - 25 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 51 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 48 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . Free throws were also a big difference as the Nets converted on 18 - of - 32 while the Nuggets only made 13 - of - 24 . Despite questions on whether or not he would make his way back into the starting lineup , Brook Lopez eased those concerns in a big way , going 6 - for - 13 from the field to score a team - high of 21 points . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Gary Harris was dialed in with his shot as well , going 8 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 21 points . Gary Harris scored 21 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , while D.J . Augustin had 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three assists as well . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets ' lead to two points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter . Matthews ' heads up defense forced a turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season . Matthews continued to put the team on his shoulders after draining a 27 - foot three pointer to tie the game at 92 with four seconds left in the game , but he also committed a shooting foul on James Harden’s ensuing drive to the hoop with just one - tenth of a second left to play . Harden missed the first free throw but sank the second and that was all that needed to ice the game for Houston . Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . Eric Gordon and Ryan Anderson joined Harden in double figures with 14 points each , while Clint Capela was strong on the glass , totaling 10 rebounds . Wes Matthews struggled from behind - the - arc , but not when it mattered most for Dallas . Matthews finished with 25 points , five boards and three assists on 9 - of - 25 shooting ( 3 - of - 15 from three ) . Harrison Barnes started 3 - of - 5 from the field but ended up missing his next six attempts on his way to a lowly 10 points in 38 minutes of action . The Mavericks will head to Cleveland to visit the reigning champion Cavaliers on Tuesday , while the Rockets will visit the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .

The Pacers jumped out to an early lead and never looked back , as they out - scored the Clippers 15 - 12 in the first quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Pacers used a strong second half , where they out - scored the Clippers 50 - 17 , to coast to a 10 - point victory on the road . Blake Griffin was the high - point man for the Pacers , with 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , along with nine rebounds , three assists and one block , in 34 minutes . Chris Paul tallied a double - double with 13 points and 4 assists , along with four rebounds and two steals , in 32 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Pacers was Thaddeus Young , who finished with 11 points , six rebounds and two blocked shots , in 32 minutes . Jeff Teague struggled shooting but finished with 13 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , four assists , four rebounds and two steals , in 24 minutes . No other player scored in double digits for the Clippers , who struggled on both ends of the floor . The series now heads back to LA for Game 5 on Sunday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 1 - 1 ) 106 - 90 on Tuesday at the Verizon Center in Washington , D.C . It was a matchup of two teams failing to live up to expectations , and both relied heavily on their star power to get through the matchup . After the Hawks jumped out to a 20 - point lead at the end of the first quarter , the Wizards bounced back with two impressive quarters of their own and entered the final period with a one - point edge . However , Paul Millsap proved to be too much in the end for Atlanta . Millsap finished with a game - high 22 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) , to go with six rebounds , four assists and one steal in 38 minutes . DeMarre Carroll had 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) , six rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 34 minutes . Paul Pierce had 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt ) , five rebounds and one steal in 35 minutes . The Wizards ' next game will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Wizards will travel to New Orleans to play the Pelicans on Wednesday . For the East , it 's a sigh of relief getting to put one in the win column . They had a well - rounded team effort in this game , with four players scoring in double figures , but nine players scored at least nine points . Ramon Sessions led the team in scoring with 21 points off the bench , going 8 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from behind the three - point line . Paul Pierce and Kyle Korver combined for 15 points off the bench and were the only other Washington players to score in double figures . For the Wizards , it was Ramon Sessions who led the way off the bench , scoring 21 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) to go with four assists , three rebounds and one steal . The Wizards are off until Sunday , when they take on the Milwaukee Bucks at the Staples Center .

The Pacers dominated in nearly every category , as they recorded more rebounds , assists , blocks and steals than the Sixers . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 39 combined turnovers between both teams . It was a much closer game than expected and the credit has to go to this winless Pistons team to put in a strong effort night - after - night despite losing every single game . Luckily for Detroit , this will be the only time they 'll have to face the Pacers in Indiana this season . This gives the Pacers their seventh loss in their last eight games and they continue to lose bodies as well . The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 91 - 78 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . In this potential playoff preview , Memphis showed Portland just how hard it is to win in FedEx Forum . The first 34 minutes were tight , as there were six ties and 21 lead changes in total . The Grizzlies took control from there , as they led for the final 32 minutes . Three-point shooting was the only true advantage for Memphis , as they went 15 - of - 22 from long range , while Portland struggled at 15 - of - 28 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Memphis recording two more assists than Portland , while committing five less turnovers . The Trail Blazers ( 15 - 22 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Trail Blazers is just what they need to get going . Damian Lillard did all he could for Portland , as he led the team with 17 points , three rebounds and seven assists . CJ McCollum was second on the team , as he accrued 16 points , three rebounds , three assists and two steals off the bench . Courtney Lee collected 16 points , three rebounds and three assists . Marc Gasol did all he could for Portland , leading the team with 26 points and 18 rebounds . Mike Conley was second on the team , finishing with 17 points , three rebounds and seven assists . The bench combined for just 22 points , six rebounds and three assists .

The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 22 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 15 ) 104 - 79 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Cavaliers were able to bounce back with a convincing 10 - point victory in game two . The Cavaliers got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Magic 29 - 13 right away in the first quarter . The Magic did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 42 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 38 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , three assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 4 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding five assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Irving had just nine field goal attempts Wednesday , although he was able to consistently force his way to the free throw line . Irving was able to take a backseat to James , who readily took this game over from the start . So far this postseason , Irving is averaging 24 points and 1 assists over six games . Tristan Thompson added 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 8 FT ) and 12 rebounds as well , while Aaron Gordon finished with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and seven rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .
