The Memphis Grizzlies ( 31 - 22 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 14 - 40 ) 109 - 90 on Monday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 22 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 47 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Grizzlies forced the Nets into 20 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own . Offensively , the Brook Lopez led the way in this one , as he went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 20 points . It was a nice surprise for the Nets , as he 's averaging only 7 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Zach Randolph finished with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , three rebounds and six assists . The only other Hornet to reach double - digit points was Thaddeus Young , who finished with 10 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) and nine rebounds . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Nets will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards ( 11 - 5 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 9 - 8 ) 107 - 86 on Friday . Washington is on a three - game win streak , which included wins against the Indiana Pacers , Detroit Pistons , and Miami . While their 8 - 5 record is impressive , and everyone expects the Wizards to be a force to be reckoned with in the playoffs next summer , they have had an easy schedule to start the season . In fact , their two losses came against the only two teams they 've played this season who are considered locks to make the playoffs ( Miami Heat , Toronto Raptors ) . Bradley Beal has been out since the preseason with a broken wrist , but he is expected to make his debut next Friday . The Wizards have three days off before they 'll host the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday . Miami welcomed John Bosh back - to - back injury , and Marcin Whiteside left the game with a hyperextended knee . He was one of the lone bright spots for Miami , as he finished with a game - high 23 points and three rebounds in 33 minutes . Coach Flip Saunders wanted to compete for a playoff spot this season , but the team 's injuries and place in the standings has caused him to consider the possibility of changing the team 's focus toward the development of their younger players . That could mean the team looks at moving some of their veteran players later this season . The Wizards will continue their seven - game road trip in Utah on Saturday . The Wizards will take on the 76ers Friday in Miami .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 114 - 80 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 14 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but their thorough domination of the Thunder ( 20 - 13 ) was significantly helped by the ejection of Russell Westbrook for back - to - back technical fouls after 23 minutes for arguing a referee 's call . However , Memphis did earn the victory through their own strong offensive play as well , as they tallied superb 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Meanwhile , without their MVP , the Thunder 's offense was largely neutered , as only two reserves , Enes Kanter and Alex Abrines , managed to get into double digits in the scoring column . Westbrook led OKC in scoring despite the early exit , supplying 21 points to go along with five rebounds and two steals , although he notably did not record any assists . Kanter totaled 19 points and five rebounds , while Abrines managed 10 points and three boards . Steven Adams mustered only six points but did haul in 15 rebounds and added two assists and two blocks . However , Andre Roberson , Domantas Sabonis and Anthony Morrow could only register two points apiece . The Grizzlies were paced by Marc Gasol , who compiled 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists , a steal and five blocks . The next two highest point totals came from the bench , as Troy Daniels posted 22 points , along with three rebounds and two assists , and Zach Randolph went for 21 points , eight boards and two assists . JaMychal Green produced 17 points , four rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , and Andrew Harrison , drawing another start for Mike Conley , tallied 10 points . Chandler Parsons returned after taking off the last game for rest purposes and produced two points , three assists and two steals over 15 minutes . The Thunder return home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on New Year 's Eve , while the Grizzlies are at Sacramento on Saturday afternoon as well .
The Houston Pacers ( 39 - 34 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 36 - 38 ) 104 - 101 on Friday . A game that was expected to be a grind - it - out defensive battle largely fulfilled that prophecy , with Indiana finally able to pull away on the strength of a pair of standout efforts from their two best players , and an injury to one of their opponent 's key pieces . James Harden led the way with a game - high 34 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , eight assists and a steal . However , he also committed a game - high seven turnovers . Monta Ellis followed with 23 points , seven assists , six rebounds , three steals and a block . Dwight Howard followed with a 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and a block . Trevor Ariza was next with 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . George Hill was right behind with 23 points , seven rebounds , seven assists , three steals and a block . Trevor Ariza followed with 14 points , two assists , two rebounds and a steal . George Hill pitched in with a trio of three - point efforts , which he complemented with three rebounds , seven assists , three steals and a block . Dwight Howard rounded things out for the first unit with a 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of assists . C.J . Miles ( 10 points , three rebounds ) and CJ Miles ( 10 points , two rebounds , two assists ) were productive in reserve roles as well . Harden added 11 rebounds , eight assists and a steal to his scoring haul , while Mahinmi also hauled in 11 boards , dished out four assists and recorded a block . Ian Mahinmi was right behind him with a 19 - point , two - rebound outing that also included two assists and a block . C.J . Miles was also productive in a reserve role , tallying 10 points , two assists and a rebound . The Rockets remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They 're home again on Wednesday versus the Charlotte Hornets .
The Orlando Magic ( 26 - 45 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 26 - 44 ) 112 - 109 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 27 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 27 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 16 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Vucevic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 11 - of - 19 from the field to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding 14 rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 23 points and 13 rebounds on the year . Evan Fournier was able to record a double - double of his own with 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 43 points and 30 rebounds over his last two games . Terrence Ross was dialed in with his shot as well . He went 6 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from beyond the arc to score 15 points . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Sixers will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 2 - 1 ) 106 - 101 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 23 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 16 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 16 turnovers between them , but the Timberwolves managed to stay a step ahead of the Timberwolves on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 34 points paced Minnesota , and he added two rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Aminu was next in line with 16 points , nine rebounds and an assist . Gorgui Dieng contributed a 12 - point 12 - rebound double - double , and added an assist and a block . Ricky Rubio rounded things out for the starting five with 12 points , nine assists , nine rebounds and three steals . C.J . McCollum paced the reserves with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the Rockets on Monday . Minnesota was paced by Damian Lillard 's 34 points , which he supplemented with seven assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Andrew Wiggins followed with 16 points , six rebounds and three assists . Andrew Wiggins was next with 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and a steal . Ricky Rubio rounded out the starting five 's productive night with 12 points , nine assists , nine rebounds and three steals . Zach LaVine paced the Minnesota bench with 17 points , nine rebounds , an assist and a block . Minnesota remains in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home again on Friday night .
The Sacramento Kings ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 0 - 1 ) 113 - 94 on Wednesday at the US Airways Center in Phoenix . Despite being down 51 - 51 at half , the Kings came out strong in the third quarter and out - scored the Suns 59 - 42 to finish the second half and steal the victory on the road . The Kings were able to out - rebound the Suns 41 - 41 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also grabbing three rebounds . The three blocked shots were a season - high for him , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . Rudy Gay notched a double - double of his own , finishing with 22 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and three rebounds . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . C.J . Temple had 12 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and two rebounds , while Matt Barnes chipped in with 14 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 35 - 18 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 32 - 23 ) 134 - 139 at TD Garden on Wednesday . Chris Paul scored a game - high 36 points to go with five rebounds , 11 assists and three steals in the win . He went 13 - of - 21 from the field and finished with 13 assists , five rebounds , three steals and one block . Rookie DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double with 21 points and 11 rebounds to go with three assists and two blocks . Jae Crowder added 19 points and eight rebounds , and Lance Stephenson had 12 points off the bench . Paul Pierce returned from a one - game absence with a toe injury to post nine points , three rebounds and an assist in 22 minutes . DeAndre Jordan led the Celtics in scoring with 21 points , 16 rebounds and two blocks , while Avery Bradley added 18 points . Jae Crowder was tremendous on the defensive end of the floor and a needed piece in Brad Stevens’ rotations , especially with the Clippers closing in on the 4 - seed for the Eastern Conference . Turner exited the game with under one minute to play in the fourth quarter after what appeared to be an unintentional hit to the face/eye , but still added 14 points , six boards and four dimes in 31 minutes . DeAndre Jordan led the Celtics in scoring with 21 points , 16 rebounds and two blocked shots , while Avery Bradley added 18 points . The Celtics will look to bounce back when they visit the Phoenix Suns ( 21 - 44 ) on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 25 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 30 - 10 ) 110 - 96 on Wednesday . The Blazers have now lost four straight games , with the last pair of defeats coming with Damian Lillard sidelined with plantar fasciitis . Backcourt mate C.J . McCollum valiantly returned from his own ailment ( two sprained ankles ) on Wednesday to attempt to provide some offensive punch in the All-Star point guard 's absence , but Portland fell woefully short overall , despite facing a Spurs defense that came in yielding a league - worst 108 points per game . The Blazers have now failed to hit the century mark scoring - wise in both contests that Lillard has missed , underscoring how much the offensively - challenged team misses his 17 points and 9 assists per game . Lillard 's 23 points paced the Spurs , and he added five assists and a pair of rebounds . Aldridge managed a 24 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , a steal and a block . Tony Parker provided 17 points , seven assists and two rebounds . Tim Duncan was next with a solid line of 11 points , 12 rebounds , six assists , two blocks and a steal . Meyers Leonard led the bench with 12 points , three rebounds , an assist and a block . The Blazers are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Philadelphia to face off against the Blazers on Wednesday night .
The Chicago Bulls ( 21 - 12 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 14 - 23 ) 117 - 106 on Monday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Chicago . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 45 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls had seven players reach double figures in points . Pau Gasol led the way , going 10 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 26 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Gasol , who was also able to convert 10 - of - 4 attempts at the free throw line . Giannis Antetokounmpo continued his strong start to the season , recording 18 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) , seven rebounds and two steals . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 71 points and 31 rebounds in his last two games . The only other Buck in double figures in points was Jabari Parker , who posted 11 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds in 34 minutes . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday , while the Bucks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 125 - 120 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 14 ) may have looked like somewhat easy prey to the hometown Hornets , considering they came in with a 5 - 14 record despite their solid talent . The first quarter did nothing to dissuade those beliefs , as Charlotte ( 11 - 9 ) jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , Minnesota clawed back to trail by only three , 52 - 49 by intermission . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Hornets ' way in the closing seconds , until an Andrew Wiggins 31 - foot three - point jumper with eight seconds remaining knotted the score at 106 . He then sunk a pair of clutch free throws with 11 seconds remaining in overtime to give Minnesota some crucial breathing room at 123 - 118 . That five - point margin was the final separation between the two teams , as the Timberwolves secured only their third road win of the season . Wiggins totaled 29 points overall while leading the visitors , and he added four assists , a rebound and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with 27 points , 15 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine supplied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest nine points but did dish out 12 assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts , and also totaled eight rebounds between them . The Timberwolves were paced by Kemba Walker , who posted 22 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Frank Kaminsky III got another start at power forward in place of Marvin Williams and tallied 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Zach LaVine followed with 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio rounded things out for the starting five with nine points , 12 assists , seven rebounds , a steal and a block . Shabazz Muhammad paced the reserves with 12 points , six boards and an assist . Charlotte remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to New Orleans to face the Pelicans on Friday night .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 13 - 9 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 3 - 16 ) 100 - 87 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Hawks were able to out - score the Lakers 20 - 21 in the first quarter to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this one , going 50 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went just 37 percent from the floor and a meager 48 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were led by the duo of Paul Millsap and D'Angelo Russell . Horford finished with a team - high of 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , while also adding nine rebounds and a blocked shot , while Williams finished with 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 0 FT ) and three steals . Russell Bryant shot just 4 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 10 from beyond the arc to score 14 points , to go along with three rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Jordan Clarkson finished with 13 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt ) and three rebounds . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 6 - 9 ) 102 - 84 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Derrick Rose returned to action Monday against the Raptors , and in his two games back , he 's put up 27 points and 25 points . The early - season rust seems to be breaking off , and if Rose can stay healthy , a great performance on Christmas Day could be on tap for Thursday 's game against the Lakers . Brooklyn has lost five straight games , and while their prospects this season look dire at the moment , the team has faced off against plenty of formidable teams in the early part of their schedule , leaving the door open to hope for more wins going forward . Just as a team like the Cleveland Cavaliers is sturggling to find consistency due to having so many new additions , the roster turnover for the Nets can be pointed to as the source of their struggles thus far . Bojan Jack scored a game - high 26 points , and Jimmy Butler added 26 points , five assists and four rebounds . The Bulls ' next game is at home Monday against the Boston Celtics . The Bulls ' next game is on the road Saturday against the Atlanta Hawks .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 133 - 102 , at Toyota Center on Friday . This was a matchup full of stars and none of them disappointed . There was an NBA record tied in this game , as there were 88 combined three - point attempts . There were nine ties and 10 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 40 points . Houston actually led for the majority of the game , as Phoenix 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . The Suns offense was on point , as they shot 49 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Houston winning that battle , 55 - 42 . The Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Rockets . James Harden carried the load , as he collected 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Patrick Beverley was second on the team , finishing with 18 points and four rebounds . Alex Len started for Tyson Chandler once again , amassing 13 points and nine rebounds en route to a double - double . James Harden led the way for Houston , as he accrued 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Patrick Beverley finished second on the team , amassing 19 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Alex Len started for Tyson Chandler once again , amassing 13 points and nine rebounds en route to a double - double .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 122 - 109 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . This looked like an easy win for Memphis on paper , but Brooklyn had other ideas with this shocking win . The Nets really took it to the Grizzlies in the fourth quarter , winning it , 34 - 18 . Shooting was key , with Brooklyn hitting 53 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . Memphis only shot 44 percent from the field and 40 percent from three . The 12 steals and five blocks from Brooklyn was huge as well , as Memphis could only muster up seven steals and two blocks . The Nets ( 11 - 51 ) have easily turned into the worst team in the league and this win over a gritty Grizzlies bunch is a shocking one to say the least . Sean Kilpatrick led Brooklyn , as he provided 23 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench . Jeremy Lin led the starters with 18 points and four rebounds . Caris LeVert and Randy Foye scored 14 points apiece in starting roles , while Brook Lopez totaled just eight points and four rebounds . On deck for the Nets is a road matchup with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 36 - 28 ) are now below .500 across their last 11 games , with this loss being the worst of the season . Mike Conley did all he could for Memphis , as he accumulated 32 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , collecting 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Zach Randolph was the only bench player in double figures , accruing 10 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Memphis will look to play better in their next game on Thursday against the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 137 - 101 Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena . It did n't take long for the Suns to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 8 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 17 points , Phoenix continued to pile it on and effectively ended the game by halftime . The Suns ' backcourt was efficient and dominant offensively in the victory , with Eric Bledsoe leading the way with a triple - double of 25 points , 13 assists and 10 rebounds . Devin Booker added 23 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting from the field and 4 - of - 7 shooting from behind the arc . In the end , all 13 Phoenix players managed to score against a struggling Lakers ( 19 - 39 ) defense . Those Lakers have now dropped two games in a row and three of their last four following Wednesday 's embarrassing defeat that ended with the team shooting just 38 percent from the field . Lou Williams was one of the lone bright spots for Los Angeles , as he increased his trade value yet again with 21 points off the bench on 7 - of - 13 shooting from the field . D'Angelo Russell added 21 points of his own , but he shot a subpar 7 - of - 20 from the field Wednesday . With the loss , the Lakers sit just a half - game behind the Suns for the worst record in the West but remain nine games behind the Nets for the worst record in the NBA . The teams will now both head into the All-Star break , with both resuming play on Friday , Feb. 24 .

He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 27 points and 11 rebounds on the season . Despite the loss , the Suns had six players reach double figures in points . Mirza Teletovic led the way , going 5 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while adding nine rebounds in 27 minutes . It was the most points he 's had in the last four games . In Knight 's fourth game with the team , he finished with 10 points ( 2 - 9 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds . The Miami Heat defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 115 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday . Even though Miami trailed by 19 at times in the second quarter , they rallied to pull out a much needed win . The third and fourth quarters is when Miami did their damage , as they outscored Los Angeles . 62 - 47 in that stretch . The Heat 's offense was efficient as ever , as they shot 54 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding and assists were lopsided as well , as Miami won the rebounding , 47 - 40 and the assist differential , 25 - 18 . The Heat 's first lead did not come until there was a minute left in the third quarter . Los Angeles ( 11 - 21 ) is in their worst stretch of the season right now and they continue to falter against bad teams . Lou Williams was once again the best player for the Lakers , as he dropped 27 points off the bench . Nick Young led the starters in scoring , as he scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . D'Angelo Russell had his bets game in weeks , accumulating 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday . Miami ( 10 - 20 ) have been playing better than results would show , so a win here is just what the doctor ordered . Justise Winslow was the Heat 's most valuable player , as he accrued 23 points , 13 rebounds and four steals in 42 minutes of action . Hassan Whiteside matched Winslow , as he provided 23 points and 13 rebounds of his own . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 21 points and seven assists . Nick Young led all bench scorers with 20 points .

The Golden State Warriors defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 105 - 100 , at Phillips Arena on Saturday evening . The Hawks ( 10 - 8 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Hawks ( 10 - 8 ) , managing a 44 percent success rate from the floor and 24 percent from three - point range . They also forced 18 turnovers from the Hawks , and held them to a 42 percent success rate from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . They also forced 18 turnovers , outrebounded the Hawks by a 41 - 50 margin , posted 14 points . Tim Hardaway , Jr. led the second unit with 10 points , one rebound and one block .
The Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 6 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 7 ) 96 - 89 on Sunday . The Thunder were letting the Thunder hang around in the first half , but pulled away after that , out - scoring the Thunder 64 - 49 in the second half . This was a domination in every fashion for the Pistons , as they recorded more assists , rebounds , blocks and steals than the Thunder . It was a relatively clean game played all - around though , as there were only 41 combined turnovers between both teams . It was a much closer game than expected and the credit has to go to this winless Thunder team to put in a strong effort night - after - night despite losing every single game . Luckily for Oklahoma City , this will be the only time they 'll have to face the Pistons in Detroit in their next game . The Pistons have been playing poorly lately and that continued on Sunday . The team shot just 17 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Andre Drummond was a force on the boards , as he grabbed 15 rebounds to go along with nine points . On deck for the Pistons is a matchup against the Boston Celtics on Wednesday . It 's not too often that an NBA team can win with five payers combining for four points , but no starter scored more than 18 points . Serge Ibaka was especially good , as he tallied 19 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks in the defeat . In contrast to the Pistons bench , the Thunder had six players combine for just 10 rebounds and two assists . Oklahoma City will look to bounce back in their next game against the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 10 - 1 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 4 - 6 ) 127 - 95 on Saturday . Brooklyn stopped their two - game losing streak with the win . They were wading through one of the more difficult stretches of their schedule , so the prolonged losing streak was n't entirely surprising , and neither was the fact that they were able to snap their losing streak against the Nets . LA 's shooting was dominant , as they shot 53 percent from the floor and 56 percent from beyond the arc . They were out - rebounded by the Nets 43 - 37 , but they were able to overcome their deficiencies on the boards to grab the win . The Clippers begin a four - game road trip in Boston on Sunday against the Celtics . Brooklyn was playing its second game in as many nights after grinding out an overtime victory in Los Angeles against the Clippers on Wednesday . Blake Griffin struggled with his shot , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from beyond the arc to finish with 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Coming off the bench , Jamal Crawford had a solid game off the bench , shooting 5 - of - 5 from the field and 3 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to scoring 14 points in 22 minutes . Brooklyn will go to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Sunday , as the Clippers will host the Orlando Magic on Wednesday .

The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went just 40 percent from the floor and a meager 21 percent from beyond the arc . The Bucks also out - rebounded the 76ers 39 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 9 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 63 rebounds over his last two games . Coming off the bench , O.J . Mayo was the fourth member to reach the 27 - point plateau , scoring 13 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 36 minutes . The Memphis Grizzlies ( 16 - 4 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 9 - 11 ) 103 - 87 on Sunday . The Heat bounced back from a devastating loss to the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday , where Khris Middleton 's buzzer beating three - pointer stopped them from being down just a half a game to the Bucks in the Eastern Conference standings . With Dwyane Wade ( knee ) and breakout center Hassan Whiteside ( hand ) out with injuries , Dwyane Wade took over on the fun , scoring 18 points ( 8 - 8 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) , to go along with two rebounds and six assists . Zach Leuer continued his strong start to the season , scoring 20 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) to go with six rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block in 24 minutes . The Heat had a strong showing from their starters as well , with six players scoring in double figures . Jon Leuer led the way , scoring 20 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , to go with 12 rebounds , one assist and one steal in 24 minutes . Josh Allen had 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) , five rebounds , two assists and two blocks in 22 minutes . Tony Allen , who 's been hobbled by a hamstring injury , started and played 22 minutes , recording 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) , five rebounds , two assists and one steal in 22 minutes . Memphis now head back home to take on the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday night .

The Boston Celtics ( 33 - 18 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 31 - 20 ) 107 - 102 at Staples Center on Saturday . On the second game of a back - to - back , the Celtics bounced back following a big fourth quarter effort . They jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead and never looked back , as the lead reached as many as 25 points in the third quarter . The Clippers mounted a mini - comeback midway through the fourth , cutting the lead to 13 at one point , but a pair of Al Jordan free throws trimmed the deficit to just nine with 2:39 remaining , which ultimately put the Celtics out of reach . The Clippers , meanwhile , wouldn’t relinquish the lead , and a Al Horford three - pointer with 1:40 to go proved to be the dagger . Griffin finished with 23 points , eight rebounds and four assists , while Felton added 16 points on 3 - of - 5 shooting from deep . As for the Clippers , the game was out of reach from midway through the second quarter , and the defensive effort and game play focuses on Thomas and Griffin . Blake Griffin led the way with 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one steal on 9 - of - 19 shooting , including 0 - of - 11 from behind the arc . Al Horford added 13 points , six rebounds , six assists , two blocks and one steal on 4 - of - 13 shooting . Next up , the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Clippers stay at home the same day to face the Oklahoma City Thunder .

Many have tossed around the term `` unicorn '' to describe Los Angeles forward Giannis Antetokounmpo , and on Wednesday , he made it obvious why . The 20 - year - old athletic marvel scored a team - high 41 points to go along with 14 rebounds , six assists , two steals , a block , and most impressively , zero turnovers . Antetokounmpo shot an efficient 11 - of - 20 from the field and went to the free - throw line ten times . Moreover , he was the cornerstone of an excellent offensive night for the Lakers as a whole . The surging team shot over 54 percent from the field and a stellar 11 - of - 34 from three - point range . Los Angeles also recorded 25 assists on the night , relying heavily on transition offense and ISO ball to lead to scoring . On the defensive end , the team was able to limit scoring on the interior fairly effectively . This was largely due to strong play from All-Star center Julius Randle , who led the team with 41 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting and added eight rebounds . Shooting guard Malcolm Williams , meanwhile , scored 21 points off the bench . As a team , the Bucks shot a highly impressive 52 percent from the floor and knocked down 11 threes . For Milwaukee , meanwhile , forward Julius Randle had a career - high 41 points . Antetokounmpo shot 11 - of - 20 on the night and went 18 - of - 21 at the free - throw line . The rest of the Bucks did not fair as well , as the team shot just 53 percent on the night .

The Utah Jazz defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 28 points , along with five rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 14 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . George Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 23 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Rodney Hood was right behind with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing eight rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal , and the latter supplying six boards . Joe Johnson , who headed to the bench with Hayward 's return , tallied 10 points to pace the bench . The Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) were co - led by a pair of 28 - point outputs for Carmelo Anthony and Kristaps Porzingis . Anthony also registered nine rebounds and three assists , while Porzingis supplied eight boards , an assist and two blocks . Derrick Rose continued his strong stretch of play to open his tenure in the Big Apple , totaling 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Courtney Lee was the fourth member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting 10 points , six boards and three steals . The Knicks head back home to face off with the Denver Nuggets on Monday night , while the Knicks remain home to face the Denver Nuggets on Monday evening as well .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 127 - 107 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . It was n't lopsided throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in the first half . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Detroit , 67 - 49 , in the second half . The Warriors offense was on point , shooting 56 percent from the field , 51 percent from three - point range and recording 39 assists . Three-point shooting really killed Detroit , as they went just 6 - of - 28 from long distance . The Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) have struggled on the road all season and a matchup against Golden State is the last thing they wanted to see . Marcus Morris was Detroit 's best player , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Andre Drummond recorded another double - double , totaling 12 points and 10 rebounds . Tobias Harris got the start and amassed 18 points and four rebounds . Boban Marjanovic was the only bench player in double figures , amassing 13 points and 11 rebounds on 5 - of - 7 from the field . The Warriors ( 34 - 6 ) have been taking it to teams all season and this blowout win was no different . The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as Dallas took a six - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 37 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 44 - 23 . The big men of New Orleans dominated in the paint , outscoring the Pelicans , 46 - 26 . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 30 points and 13 rebounds on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Harrison Barnes also had one of his best games of the season , totaling 19 points and eight rebounds . Jrue Holiday was the only other Pelican in double figures , as he collected 18 points , five rebounds and seven assists . The only other starter in double figures was Wesley Matthews , who dropped 10 points to accompany three rebounds and to assists . The Pelicans will host the Boston Celtics on Sunday for their next game . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 15 tries . The Phoenix Suns defeated the Toronto Raptors , 125 - 109 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . Phoenix appeared to be the heavy favorite on paper , but Phoenix has been a much better team over recent weeks . The fourth quarter was especially tight , as there were five ties and seven lead changes alone in the fourth quarter . It was a hectic last 16 seconds , as Phoenix hit a lay - up with 6 seconds left to tie and then recorded a steal to eventually win on a game - winning three at the buzzer by Jonas Valanciunas . Jonas Valanciunas was a monster off the line , as he led the team with 21 points and 10 rebounds on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Jonas Valanciunas went just 9 - of - 14 from the field , but finished with 10 points and four rebounds on 5 - of - 6 shooting . Terrence Ross led the team , dropping 17 points , seven rebounds and two steals off the bench . James Johnson led the starters in scoring , as he accrued 17 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . James Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 17 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Lou Williams was the best player off the bench , as he accrued 17 points , three rebounds and three assists . James Johnson led the team in scoring off the bench , collecting 17 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Alex Len amassed 10 points , four rebounds and three blocks .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 42 - 19 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 40 - 20 ) 98 - 103 on Friday . The Clippers found out earlier in the day that superstar forward Blake Griffin will be sidelined for much longer than originally anticipated , but his problematic quadriceps tendon is n't the cause . Instead , it 's a broken right hand allegedly suffered during an altercation with a team employee in Toronto that will apparently keep him out 1 - 12 additional weeks . His continued absence keeps the spotlight squarely on Chris Paul , who has more often than not already served as the team 's scoring leader during the time Griffin has already missed . The All-Star point guard did not disappoint in that role Thursday , scoring a team - high 21 points and adding a season - high 12 assists , four rebounds , a steal and a block . DeAndre Jordan was right behind him with 20 points , 18 boards and a steal . J.J. Redick was next with 16 points , three assists , a rebound and a steal . DeAndre Jordan posted a 20 - point , 18 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , a steal and a block . Serge Ibaka overcame a questionable designation due to a shoulder injury to take the floor and tally 11 points , 11 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Jamal Crawford paced the reserves with 12 points , two rebounds and two assists in a reserve role as well . The Clippers remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference . They head to Los Angeles to face off against the Lakers on Wednesday night . The Clippers were led by a pair of 21 - point efforts from the duo of J.J. Redick and JJ Redick . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Miami Heat , 91 - 82 , at Spectrum Center on Thursday . The refrain is a familiar one for the Hornets ( 19 - 14 ) , but does n't seem to get old : The dynamic duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum supply a significant portion of the offense , and the complementary pieces around them step up in support as needed . That formula equaled another home victory for Charlotte on Thursday , their 11th of the season in 17 home games . Walker scored a game - high 22 points , while Batum provided 16 . The hosts also played superior team defense , holding the Heat ( 10 - 23 ) to 40 percent shooting overall and inducing 16 turnovers . Miami was paced by Josh Richardson , who followed up a 22 - point outing against the Thunder on Tuesday with another 20 points on Thursday , along with four rebounds , two assists , a block and a steal . Wayne Ellington provided 12 points , two boards and an assist in a reserve role as well . Hassan Whiteside went for eight points , 10 rebounds and two blocks , notably taking only seven shots on the night . Walker complemented his aforementioned scoring total with seven rebounds , four assists and a steal . Batum filled out the stat sheet with 13 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and a block . Marvin Williams registered 13 points , two assists , a rebound and a steal . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , but he still finished with 18 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 45 points and nine assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 14 rebounds on the year . The Utah Jazz ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 28 - 9 ) 100 - 92 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Utah . The Jazz got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Jazz also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 48 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 37 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with five assists , four rebounds and four steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Jazz should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding four assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Irving had just nine field goal attempts Wednesday , although he was able to consistently force his way to the free throw line . Irving was able to take a backseat to James , who readily took this game over from the start . So far this postseason , Irving is averaging 24 points and 2 assists over six games . Rodney Hood added 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt ) , five rebounds and three assists as well . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 116 - 96 , at United Center on Wednesday . The dynamic duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Jabari Parker were at it again for the Bucks ( 16 - 16 ) , as they posted over half of the team 's scoring total while each played at least 40 minutes . Their combined 23 - of - 34 effort from the field spearheaded a red - hot Milwaukee offense that drained their buckets at a 57 percent clip , and that also was successful on 60 percent of their 15 attempts from behind the arc . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 16 - 18 ) could only get one such standout effort , which came from Jimmy Butler . The offensive imbalance ultimately left them unable to keep pace as the game wore on , and accordingly , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin in the second half . Antetokounmpo tallied a game - high 35 points , and added nine rebounds , eight assists , seven blocks and two steals in a remarkable performance . Parker followed with 27 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Malcolm Brogdon continued his rapid development , as he managed 15 points , 12 assists and 11 rebounds , his first career triple - double . Greg Monroe led the bench with 15 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Butler 's 26 points paved the way for Chicago , and he complemented them with eight assists , seven boards and two steals . Robin Lopez provided a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Taj Gibson contributed 11 points , five rebounds , an assist and a block . Michael Carter-Williams , who drew the start for the struggling Rajon Rondo , and Dwyane Wade both struggled , as they only turned in eight apiece .

The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 101 - 93 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Miami blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 17 - 3 run in the third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Pacers into a 10 - point lead for the Heat . Despite there being just five ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 13 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 100 minutes . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Miami going 21 - of - 40 from long distance , while Indiana went just 9 - of - 40 . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 66 - 45 . Goran Dragic led the way for Miami , as he collected 24 points , five rebounds and five assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 13 points and 18 rebounds . Dwyane Wade was the only other Pacer in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and three assists . Goran Dragic led the way for Miami , as he tallied 24 points and five assists . Dwyane Wade contributed 16 points , five rebounds and three assists . Justise Winslow provided 13 points and eight rebounds of his own . Justise Winslow provided 13 points and seven rebounds of his own . The Heat next game will be on Friday , as they travel to play the Orlando Magic .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a four - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony Towns . After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 37 minutes . The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of five rebounds and five steals . The two helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field . As for the Mavericks , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . Harrison Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , five rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 10 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points . And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 46 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 7 - of - 9 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home Wednesday to play the Rockets , while the Mavericks will head home to take on the Suns on Thursday .

He went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 8 - for - 10 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also nearing a triple - double with 14 rebounds and five assists . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 3 points and seven rebounds on the season . Also playing a big factor in the win was Isaiah Bradley . Smart did n't have the best night shooting , as he went 7 - for - 18 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 10 times , and converted on eight out of those attempts . Smart on the other hand shot 7 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while grabbing two rebounds . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Spurs , as he 's averaging only 16 points per game so far this season . Marcus Smart was one of the lone bright spots for the Celtics . He went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding two assists . He shot a combined 7 - for - 18 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves 119 - 105 at Target Center on Saturday . These are two teams headed in opposite directions and this result shows just where they 're headed . The Clippers were in control for the majority of the game , as there were only four ties and six lead changes . Los Angeles actually led for the entirety of the second half , as Minnesota never led by more than two points in the first half . The Clippers shot lights - out hitting 53 percent fro the field and 46 percent from three - point range . Los Angeles also took advantage of the whistle , going 28 - of - 37 from the free - throw line , with Minnesota taking just 21 free - throw attempts . The Clippers ( 9 - 1 ) are the hottest team in the NBA right now and they used a different recipe to win this one . All five starters were great , as they each scored 15 or more points in the win . Blake Griffin led the team , totaling 20 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . JJ Redick was n't far behind , as he tallied 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Zach LaVine was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 15 points and three rebounds . Luc Richard Crawford and Jamal Crawford were huge off the bench , as they dropped 15 points a piece . Minnesota will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Chicago Bulls .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Washington Wizards , 120 - 112 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Sixers ' first game after the All-Star break featured Dario Saric 's debut as the permanent starting power forward , and the 2014 first - round pick did not disappoint . Saric contributed a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . All five members of the Sixers ( 22 - 35 ) starting five posted double - digit scoring , and Philadelphia managed a 49 percent success rate from the floor in an explosive offensive showing overall . The impressive effort helped the home team overcome a spectacular 40 - point effort from the Wizards ' Bradley Beal . Beal added four rebounds , two assists and two steals to his game - high scoring total . John Wall was right behind with a 29 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included eight boards and a pair of blocks . Markieff Morris was a distant third for the Wizards ( 34 - 22 ) , generating 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . Marcin Gortat compiled an 11 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included one assist and one block . Robert Covington paced the Sixers with 25 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and four steals . Gerald Henderson tallied 20 points and five boards . Richaun Holmes , seeing an expanded role off the bench with the departures of Nerlens Noel and Ersan Ilyasova at the trade deadline , supplied 12 points , 10 rebounds , one assist , five blocks and two steals . Jahlik Okafor and Nik Stauskas produced matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding two rebounds and two assists , and the latter registering three boards , one assist and one block . T.J. McConnell amassed 10 points , eight assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . The Wizards head back home to tangle with the Utah Jazz on Sunday afternoon , while the Sixers head to New York to take on the Knicks on Saturday evening .

The Celtics were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 43 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Bulls 49 - 39 , they were forced into 19 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Celtics were led by the duo of Isaiah Thomas and Amir Johnson . Johnson went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding six assists and three steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Wade on the other hand went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 23 points . It was only the second time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . Coming off the bench , Nikola Mirotic added 17 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) and six rebounds in 35 minutes as well . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 104 - 101 , at Amway Center on Wednesday night . The Magic ( 5 - 6 ) embarked on their current road trip as losers of four in a row , and appeared like a team in disarray all the way around . However , they 've found a way to turn things around away from the confines of Amway Center , as they 've now managed to rattle off victories in four of their last five games , including three straight . The Timberwolves head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Magic remain home to face off with the Milwaukee Bucks on Sunday evening .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Los Angeles Lakers , 117 - 113 , at Staples Center on Sunday . In a game that was expected to be close , the Thunder gave it to the Lakers in this lopsided result . In fact , Oklahoma City won all of the first three quarters by at least six points , as they took a 22 - point lead into the fourth quarter . Aside from Los Angeles grabbing the lead , they never trailed after the first three minutes . Not only that , they won each individual quarter and scored at least 30 points in all four quarters . The starters were the difference in the game , with Oklahoma City 's starters outscoring Los Angeles ' starters , 89 - 49 . The Thunder ( 26 - 11 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Lou Williams carried the load for Los Angeles , as he collected 44 points , two rebounds and two steals on 12 - of - 25 shooting . Jordan Clarkson was second on the team , collecting 17 points , three rebounds , two assists and two steals off the bench . No other player on the roster had more than 11 points , five rebounds or three assists . Lou Williams led Los Angeles in scoring , as he provided 17 points , three rebounds and two assists off the bench . Kobe Bryant led the starters , as he accrued 17 points , three rebounds and two assists . Jordan Clarkson was second on the team , collecting 17 points , three rebounds and two assists .
The Kings trailed 89 - 71 with 7:58 remaining but clawed back for the upset win . The Clippers failed to score between the 5:16 and 3:3 marks of the fourth period and were ultimately outscored 24 - 24 in the quarter . Willie Cauley-Stein 's basket with three seconds remaining gave the Kings the 103 - 103 lead , and Chris Paul missed a would - be game - winning 24 - foot jumper at the buzzer . Jamal Crawford was the high - point man for the Clippers ( 26 - 17 ) , with 20 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , along with a pair of rebounds and one assist , in 31 minutes off the bench . Chris Paul posted a double - double with 13 points and 10 assists , along with seven rebounds and two steals , in 27 minutes . The Clippers shot 47 percent from the field and 52 percent from long range , as they cruised to victory . Jamal Crawford was huge in 52 minutes off the bench , with 20 points on 8 - 17 shooting , including 3 - 7 from long range . Jamal Crawford was solid in 31 minutes off the bench , as he finished with 20 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists , in 30 minutes off the bench . Meanwhile , the Clippers struggled from the field , shooting a combined 40 percent from the field . J.J. Redick led the way in scoring with 22 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , in 31 minutes . Omri Casspi followed up with 17 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting , including 5 - of - 8 from long range , to go along with four rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 30 minutes off the bench . The Clippers will look to build on this win , as they go on to host the Timberwolves on Monday .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the Sacramento Kings , 105 - 93 , at Moda Center on Wednesday . The Blazers were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Trail Blazers , as they led by 13 after the first quarter and by 29 headed into halftime . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with Portland recording 25 assists to 19 turnovers , while Sacramento matched their assists and turnovers at 20 a piece . The Blazers shot 48 percent from the field and 48 percent from three - point range , while the Kings shot just 42 percent from the field and 47 percent from long range . Allen Crabbe was the lone bright spot for the Kings , as he dropped 21 points on 8 - of - 10 shooting off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 13 points and 14 rebounds . Seth Curry was the player of the game , as he accumulated 21 points , four rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 17 shooting . Omri Casspi was a spark off the bench , providing 21 points and eight rebounds . The Blazers will be on the road for their next game on Tuesday against the Phoenix Suns . The Kings ( 29 - 45 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 14 tries . Seth Curry led the way for Sacramento , as he tallied 16 points , two rebounds , three assists and two steals off the bench . Al-Farouq Aminu was second on the team , providing 14 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Willie Cauley-Stein totaled 13 points and 14 rebounds .

Indiana also dominated the shooting , hitting 51 percent of their shots , while holding Memphis to 41 percent . The Pacers also won the rebounding differential , 50 - 39 . The Miami Heat defeated the host Utah Jazz on Thursday , 111 - 110 . It was a much - needed and narrow win for Miami ( 7 - 12 ) , as the team had been sitting at 13th in the Eastern Conference . Thursday 's win came in dramatic fashion , with the game remaining a matter of single digits until the very end . It was an off night for center Hassan Whiteside , who shot just 4 - of - 11 for nine points , but it was a strong showing for recently - returned point guard Goran Dragic . Dragic led the team with 27 points and had six assists on the night . The Heat have seen strong bench play recently , as was the case on Thursday . Bench forward James Johnson delivered 24 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting , while bench guard Wayne Ellington had 17 points on 6 - of - 9 . The Jazz ( 11 - 9 ) , meanwhile , had won four straight contests heading into Thursday , but have been decimated by injuries . Star forward Justise Winslow was the lone bright spot for the Jazz , leading the team with 24 points and six rebounds . Miami ( 11 - 9 ) , meanwhile , saw strong play from its own star . Point guard Goran Dragic led the team with 27 points , also pulling down four rebounds and dishing six assists . The rest of the Jazz , however , struggled , as the team shot over 51 percent on the night while allowing the opposition to hit 51 percent of their shots .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 110 - 106 , at TD Garden on Friday . Facing a Sixers ( 9 - 25 ) squad that had only tallied three road wins in 13 tries coming in , it may have been hard to blame the Celtics ( 22 - 14 ) if they were guilty of a little overconfidence Friday . A 39 - point second period by Philadelphia was therefore likely a rather sobering wake - up call , as was the 62 - 51 halftime deficit Boston found itself in . The Celtics were mostly a different team in the second half , as they outscored their visitors by a 59 - 44 margin over the final 24 minutes . However , the game was n't truly decided until the closing seconds , with Al Horford 's go - ahead three - pointer with 17 remaining and two key free throws by Isaiah Thomas with two seconds on the clock finally sealing the hard - fought home win . Philadelphia was led by Joel Embiid 's 23 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . However , he battled foul trouble in the second half , and ultimately was charged with his sixth infraction with six seconds remaining . McConnell was outstanding setting up his teammates for scoring opportunities , compiling 15 assists and supplementing them with nine points , four boards and a pair of steals . Ersan Ilyasova paced the reserves with 20 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Nerlens Noel contributed a 13 - point , 8 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , three steals and three blocks . Amir Johnson made the start for Al Horford ( knee ) and contributed 13 points , five rebounds , three assists , four blocks and a steal . The Washington Wizards ( 3 - 8 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 7 ) 119 - 112 on Wednesday at the Verizon Center in Washington D.C . The Wizards had a comfortable lead going into the fourth quarter of this game , but were out - scored 35 - 47 in the fourth quarter , leading to a 15 - point victory on the road . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this one , going 54 percent from the field and 60 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 48 percent from the floor and just 41 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , John Wall backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 23 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with two assists and three blocked shots . He 's had a nice two - game stretch , averaging 27 points and 7 rebounds over that span . Carmelo Wall did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 18 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , but he did have three rebounds , three assists and a steal . He 's now averaging 8 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Brandon Jennings had a strong showing , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) and 11 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . Kristaps Porzingis had a solid showing as well , posting 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , seven rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 17 points and 7 rebounds . The only other Knick in double figures was Marcin Gortat , who finished with 16 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 FT ) and eight rebounds . The Wizards ' next game will be on the road against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 30 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 30 - 32 ) 108 - 100 on Tuesday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 29 - 23 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Bulls used their three - point shooting to grab an advantage , going 43 percent from deep , while the Rockets went just 26 percent from deep . Back in the starting lineup , Pau Gasol led the way with 28 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 10 - 14 FT ) , 17 rebounds and two blocked shots , while Pau Gasol finished with a game - high of 28 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 10 - 14 FT ) , to go along with 17 rebounds and six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 25 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 22 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Derrick Rose was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and nine assists , while Rose had 17 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and three rebounds . Derrick Rose had the most production for the Rockets . He went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding nine assists . He 's now averaging 18 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Corey Brewer , who scored 12 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and two assists in 24 minutes off the bench . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Rockets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 28 - 35 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 32 - 31 ) 100 - 88 on Monday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a result like this and it was well out of hand early . In fact , the Hornets had a 21 - point lead headed into the fourth quarter . Charlotte was unconscious from the field , as they hit 43 percent of their shots and 36 percent of their three 's in double figures . Indiana shot 41 percent from the field , while holding Indiana to just 46 percent on their end . The rebounding was huge as well , as the Hornets snatched down 50 rebounds to the Hornets 41 . The shooting was a big difference as well , with the Hornets shooting 41 percent and scoring 56 points in the paint . The Hornets have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Paul George led the way for Indiana , as he tallied 36 points , 10 rebounds and four blocks in the win . Nicolas Batum was second on the team , as he accumulated 21 points , four rebounds and four assists . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist played well too , as he amassed 11 points and 13 rebounds on 4 - of - 8 shooting . Jeremy Lamb was the only other Pacers player in double figures , tallying 14 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Pacers will look to get out of this slide on Monday against the Atlanta Hawks .
The Houston Rockets ( 33 - 32 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 39 - 27 ) 102 - 98 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 19 - 23 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 37 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . The Celtics also out - rebounded the Celtics 50 - 45 , giving them a huge upperhand and contributing even further to the win . As he 's done all season long , James Harden continued to show himself as one of the best players in the league . He shot 9 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 32 points , while also handing out four assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 7 times , and converted on 5 - of - 15 free throw attempts . Michael Beasley was the only other Celtic to score in double figures for the Celtics . He went 9 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from beyond the arc to score 18 points . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 106 - 97 , at Phillips Arena on Sunday . The Trail Blazers ( 18 - 12 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Blazers ( 11 - 19 ) , who had a 48 percent success rate from the floor . The Trail Blazers were led by a pair of 12 - point efforts from Maurice Frazier and Dennis Schroder , with the former adding four rebounds , an assist and a steal , and the latter posting four rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Mike Scott managed 18 points , three assists , a rebound and a steal over 17 minutes . Mason Plumlee contributed a 11 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included six assists , one steal and one block . Thabo Sefolosha led the second unit with 13 points , six boards , one assist and one steal . The Trail Blazers head back home to tangle with the Golden State Warriors on Saturday night , while the Hawks remain home and await the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday evening as well .

This was tight throughout , as there were eight ties and 11 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . Miami took care of business in the fourth quarter , outscoring Charlotte , 27 - 15 . Rebounding was a huge factor , with the Heat winning that battle , 46 - 39 . They also dominated the assists differential , winning that , 22 - 14 . The Hornets ( 28 - 36 ) have just four wins in their last 11 games and losses like this are crucial to their pursuit of a playoff berth . The key for Utah was their shooting , as they shot 45 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range against a dominant Trail Blazers defense . The ball movement was huge as well , with Utah dishing out 18 assists to the Trail Blazers ' 12 . Portland has now won four of its last five games , with this loss being one of the worst of the season . Coming out of the third quarter , the Bulls had built a 73 - 60 lead and looked to be on the verge of coasting to an easy win . The Raptors made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Raptors 27 - 30 , but their comeback came up just short , as the Bulls secured the seven - point victory and ended the 11 - point victory on the road . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 46 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . He struggled with his shot in Sunday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 15 percent ( 2 - 12 FG ) from the field in Monday 's game against the Wizards , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . He 's on an absolute tear of late , scoring 15 or more points in three straight games .
