The Nets were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Kings 27 - 28 to seal the victory on the road . They shot 45 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings shot 49 percent from the field and only 45 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Kings into 21 turnovers , while only committing nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nets were led by Mason Plumlee , who went 6 - for - 7 from the field and 10 - for - 16 from the free throw line to score 22 points , while also adding four rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 75 points and 43 rebounds over his last two games . Darren Collison also had a solid all - around game . He went 5 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding eight assists . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Collison on the other hand went 4 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 16 points . He also had eight assists , giving him his eigth double - double in the last six games . Darren Jack and Mirza Teletovic added 16 points each . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 112 - 100 , at Staples Center on Monday . The Clippers ( 40 - 26 ) came into Saturday 's contest looking to keep their faint playoff hopes alive and to complete a season sweep of the 76ers ( 23 - 42 ) . Given that they 'd blasted Philadelphia by 38 points in their most recent meeting , it appeared the chances for another win were high . The Sixers ( 23 - 42 ) were the latest unit to learn that lesson the hard way , as they first saw the Clippers storm back from a 32 - 30 first - quarter deficit to forge a six - point halftime lead by outscoring Philadelphia , 24 - 27 , in the second quarter . They added to that advantage in the third before the Clippers staged a rally of their own in the fourth , coming back from a 94 - 87 deficit with 1:52 to play to tie the game at both 94 and 100 in the closing seconds . Taking the ball for a final possession with two seconds remaining , the Clippers saw Chris Paul back - to - back three - pointers of his own , which helped seal the victory for the Clippers . Paul followed with 15 points , six rebounds , six assists and three steals . Dario Saric was next with a bench - leading 24 points , nine rebounds , two assists and one block . Robert Covington totaled 13 points , six rebounds , four assists and three steals . T.J. McConnell supplied nine points and 10 assists . T.J. McConnell supplied nine points , 10 assists , one rebound and two steals . Marreese Speights led the bench with 11 points , two rebounds and one assist . J.J. Redick was next with 12 points , two assists , two rebounds and two steals . Timothe Luwawu-Cabarrot , another of several promising young Clippers players keying their current resurgence , supplied 12 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . T.J. McConnell filled out the stat sheet with nine points , 10 assists , two steals and two steals . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Saturday . Paul Paul led the way for the Sixers with a game - high 30 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals . Dario Saric was next with a bench - leading 24 points , five rebounds , two assists and a block . Dario Saric was next with a bench - leading 16 points , along with five assists and five rebounds . T.J. McConnell registered nine points , 10 assists , one rebound and two steals . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday night .
The Miami Heat ( 8 - 4 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 14 ) 96 - 91 on Sunday . This game was much closer than the final score would indicate , as the Heat had just a six - point lead with about eight minutes left . They pulled away late and made it look like the dominating victory that most anticipated . What had plagued this Philly team all year were turnovers and shooting , which was the key on Sunday . The Sixers shot just 38 percent from the field and 32 percent from long distance . The Heat won nearly every battle in the stat sheet , as they outassisted the Sixers by 16 and held them to under 38 percent shooting in the win . They also recorded 16 assists on 45 made baskets and were distributing the ball beautifully all night . A 16 - 0 run in the third quarter was the key difference , as Dwyane Wade was the only starter in double figures for the Sixers . Chris Bosh was the player of the game , as he accumulated 27 points , seven rebounds and four assists in the loss . Jahlil Okafor also had one of his best games of the season , as he amassed 16 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Isaiah Canaan also had a nice game off the bench , as he amassed six points , four assists and seven rebounds . Miami has a quick turnaround , as they play the Chicago Bulls on Friday in their next game . Miami has been playing some great ball recently , but this was a baffling loss . Chris Bosh went just 3 - for - 11 from the field , but still managed to contribute 21 points , 11 rebounds and four assists in the win . Chris Bosh had another good all - around game , as he accumulated 13 points , 11 rebounds and seven assists in the victory . Up next for the Heat is a matchup with the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 2 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 97 - 87 on Thursday at the Staples Center in New Orleans . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Warriors were able to out - score the Pelicans 26 - 16 in the fourth quarter , giving them their third straight win . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans finished at 38 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . It was a team - effort win for the Warriors , who had five players reach double figures in points . Anthony Davis led the way , going 9 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also grabbing 11 rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 13 rebounds . Davis went 9 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from beyond the arc to score 26 points , while also recording 11 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth on the year . Draymond Green added a double - double of his own , scoring 14 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) and grabbing 12 rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 13 rebounds . Davis went 9 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from deep to score 26 points , while also grabbing 11 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth on the year . Draymond Green added a double - double of his own , scoring 14 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) and grabbing 12 rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 13 rebounds . Davis went 9 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from beyond the arc to score 26 points , while also grabbing 11 rebounds . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Draymond Green also played well , recording 14 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and five assists . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Tyreke Evans , who contributed 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 12 FT ) and 10 rebounds . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 18 - 19 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 13 - 24 ) 99 - 94 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Thunder got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 53 - 27 in the first half alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 49 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder were also able to force the Jazz into 20 turnovers , while only committing 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who went 14 - for - 21 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding five rebounds and six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 14 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Trey Burke finished with 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds in 38 minutes as a starter . The Thunder ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 6 - 7 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 2 - 10 ) 95 - 87 on Monday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 38 percent compared to the Mavericks , who went 38 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 13 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jonathan Gibson came off the bench and went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding six rebounds and three assists . Gibson struggled to find his shot in this one , as he went only 5 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 1 from the three - point line , but still finished with just 13 points , giving him his second double - double in the last three games . Coming off the bench , Harrison Barnes shot 3 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 11 points , while adding six rebounds . The Mavericks ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards ( 23 - 27 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 23 - 32 ) 111 - 108 at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . Carmelo Anthony ( knee ) returned to the starting lineup after missing Friday’s game against the Memphis Grizzlies with knee soreness , but it was not enough to give the Knicks a needed spark , as they now own a five game losing streak . Anthony finished with 33 points , 13 rebounds and two assists on 12 - of - 22 shooting , while Bradley Beal led the way in scoring with 26 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting . Marcin Gortat grabbed a double - double with 10 rebounds and 10 rebounds , while Langston Galloway added 14 points and five rebounds in 29 minutes off the bench . The Knicks shot just 50 percent from the floor , while holding the Knicks to 53 percent shooting and 62 percent from the free throw line . Bradley Beal led the way scoring for New York , scoring 26 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting in 29 minutes . Marcin Gortat scored a double - double with 14 points and 10 rebounds , while Langston Galloway added 14 points and five rebounds . Arron Afflalo scored 11 points in 29 minutes . Jose Calderon shot just 0 - of - 4 from the field , finishing with 11 points . Arron Afflalo chipped in 11 points in 38 minutes . Up next , the Knicks host the West-leading Warriors on Saturday . Washington hits the road to take on the Wizards in Washington D.C. , also on Saturday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 32 - 14 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 28 - 20 ) 107 - 91 on Tuesday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got out to an extremely quick start , out - scoring the Thunder 21 - 24 in the first quarter , while grabbing a 65 - 57 lead by half . They came into the third quarter playing just as well and were able to use that momentum to coast to the 10 - point victory on the road in Oklahoma City . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters , going 45 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 37 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Thunder into 16 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who nearly recorded his first triple - double of the season . He finished with 20 points ( 7 - 26 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) , 12 rebounds and 10 assists , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his return from an ankle injury , Iman Shumpert had 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 5 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) in 34 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to Indiana to play the Pacers on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Boston Celtics , 113 - 103 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 1 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard Isaiah Thomas in the offseason , inking the 16 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 23 points and adding seven rebounds , six assists and a pair of steals . However , the high - scoring affair was a showcase for two of the game 's brightest stars , as Isaiah Thomas ( 25 points ) and DeMarre Carroll ( 21 points ) were the only other starters for the Celtics to score in double figures . Terrence Ross 's 21 points led the way , while DeMarre Carroll and Avery Bradley checked in with a 21 - point , 13 - rebound double - double . Avery Bradley compiled 13 points , while Amir Johnson 's 11 points led the bench . The Celtics were led by DeMarre Carroll 's 21 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Kyle Lowry tallied 14 points , nine assists , seven rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a modest six points but hauled in 10 rebounds and dished out two assists . Terrence Ross paced the Celtics with 21 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Kyle Lowry tallied 14 points , nine rebounds , nine assists , two steals and two blocks . Bradley Bradley was right behind with a 13 - point , nine - rebound , nine - assist triple - double that also included three steals . Avery Bradley provided 13 points , five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block . Kelly Olynyk led the second unit with 11 points , two rebounds and one block . The Celtics head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Celtics remain home to face off with the Orlando Magic on Friday evening as well .

The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , out - scoring the Celitcs 52 - 48 . They were able to finish the game shooting 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 38 percent from the floor and just 13 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Raptors into 12 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . DeMar DeRozan led the way with 17 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) , while also adding four rebounds and a blocked shot . Over his last five games , he 's now averaging 20 points , 5 rebounds and 3 assists . Notching a double - double of his own , Whiteside posted 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds in 33 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 38 rebounds over his last two games . As for the Raptors , Dion Waiters did n't have his best night shooting the ball . Powell went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 14 points , while also adding three rebounds and three assists . After shooting just 15 percent ( 3 - 14 FG ) from the field in Sunday 's game against the Rockets , it was good to see him get things turned back around and have a strong performance . The Heat ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Sergio Rodriguez , 113 - 96 , at American Airlines Center on Friday . In a battle between two struggling teams , there were numerous swings , as it was clear both squads were desperate for a win . In fact , Detroit pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 50 - plus minutes . Defense was key , as they held Philadelphia to 50 percent from the field and 18 percent from three - point range , while Detroit shot 42 percent from the field and 18 percent from three - point range on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as the Pistons recorded more assists than the 76ers , while committing five less turnovers . The Pistons ( 24 - 28 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Marcus Morris led the team in scoring , as he dropped 19 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Andre Drummond recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points , 17 rebounds and three steals . Dario Saric was a huge spark off the bench , providing 13 points , six rebounds and four assists . Marcus Morris was the player of the game , as he accumulated 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Marcus Morris was second on the team , collecting 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists .

Shooting was key , with the Cavaliers shooting 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The Cavaliers ( 4 - 2 ) continue to fly under the radar and they may have pulled out their biggest win of the season against the Cavaliers here . After a record - setting perfect free - throw night on Tuesday for Utah , the Jazz struggled as a team from the line on Friday against the Lakers . The Jazz shot just 70 percent as a unit from the line , while also converting on only 24 percent of their shots from three - point range . The night was particularly tough for young wing Rodney Hood , who missed nine field goal attempts , five three - point attempts , and went just three - for - five at the free - throw line . Poor shooting seemed to be a theme of the night for both sides , as the Lakers ' young stars struggled mightily on the offensive end . D'Angelo Russell went just 3 - of - 14 from the field , including hitting only 20 percent of his three - point attempts . Shelvin Mack , to play a day off , he struggled on both ends of the floor . In particular , he scored just nine points on 3 - of - 14 shooting from the field to go along with five rebounds and five assists . Los Angeles will look to keep their winning streak to preseason , as they host the Houston Rockets on Wednesday for their next game . The Lakers ( 1 - 1 ) got some great efforts from their stud players , but fell just short when it mattered the most . George Hill led the team in scoring , as he tallied 23 points , three rebounds and three assists in the defeat . Derrick Favors was second on the team , as he accumulated 15 points and 12 rebounds in the win . Nick Young was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 13 points on 3 - of - 7 shooting . Utah will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Denver Nuggets .

The Kings came out hot right in this game , out - scoring the Jazz 23 - 31 in the first quarter alone . The Kings were the superior shooters in this one , going 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 41 percent from the floor and just 18 percent from deep . The Kings also forced the Jazz into 13 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own . The Kings were led by the duo of Rudy Gay and Gordon Hayward . Gay went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 29 points , while also adding six rebounds and three steals . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Gay scored 29 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 9 - 10 FT ) and grabbed six rebounds in 33 minutes . It was the first time in his last six games that he 's scored under 32 points . He 's now averaging 32 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Darren Collison also had a solid all - around game . He went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also dishing out six assists . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Collison on the other hand went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while adding six assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Darren Collison was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 32 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Indiana Pacers , 90 - 85 , at United Center on Monday . The Bulls ( 15 - 16 ) jumped on their visitors early in a battle of division rivals , building a 28 - 19 advantage after one quarter . Save for a 20 - 12 edge by the Pacers ( 15 - 17 ) in the third quarter , Chicago had control of the contest for the most part , despite being outperformed on the offensive end by Indiana . The visitors posted a 42 percent success rate from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , which was notably superior to the Bulls ' respective 39 and 24 percent tallies . However , a pair of strong efforts from Dwyane Wade and Nikola Mirotic helped carry the Bulls to the hosts to their ninth home victory of the season . On a night when Jeff Teague significantly struggled with his shot , it was backup point guard Aaron Brooks who led the Pacers off the bench with 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and a block . Myles Turner was next with 16 points and eight boards , while Paul George turned in 14 points , eight assists , three rebounds and a steal . Thaddeus Young chipped in with 12 points , six boards and a trio of steals . Teague could only muster six points , along with five assists and two rebounds , on 2 - of - 8 shooting . Al Jefferson posted 10 points , six rebounds and three assists in 20 minutes off the bench . Wade 's 21 points paced the Bulls , a total he complemented with five assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Mirotic registered 20 points and seven boards in 30 minutes off the bench . Jimmy Butler filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , five assists , two rebounds and two steals . Taj Gibson and Jeremi Grant turned in matching 10 - point efforts , and Robin Lopez mustered eight points but hauled in 12 boards , recorded three steals and added a block . The Pacers continue on their road trip , with their next stop being the Nation 's Capital for a Wednesday night tussle with the Washington Wizards . The Bulls remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening as well .

The Hawks went just 44 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went 44 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were able to out - rebound the 76ers 44 - 44 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Hawks were led by Al Horford , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also grabbing 11 rebounds . The 23 points matched a season - high for Horford , while the double - double was his third in the last four games . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 20 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 20 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Bucks into 23 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Bucks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Denver Nuggets defeated the host Los Angeles Lakers , 117 - 107 , at Staples Center on Sunday . Los Angeles have been one of the best home teams in the NBA this season , but this was a tough task against a feisty Denver team . The Nuggets dominated from start to finish , as they led for over 42 minutes of this game and led by at least six points for the entirety of the second half . The second quarter is where they spread it out , outscoring the Lakers , 30 - 22 . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with Denver winning that battle , 42 - 31 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 11 more assists and committing three less turnovers . D.J . Augustin led Los Angeles in scoring , as he dropped 26 points on 7 - of - 11 shooting . Julius Randle went just 5 - of - 11 from the field , but finished with 17 points and seven rebounds . The Toronto Raptors ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the LA Clippers ( 6 - 7 ) 91 - 80 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Raptors were able to out - score the Clippers 20 - 20 in the final quarter to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this one , going 37 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 39 percent from the floor and just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were able to force the Clippers into 19 turnovers , while only committing nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Raptors were led by DeMarre Carroll , who went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding five rebounds and four steals . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 16 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 16 from deep to score 33 points . DeAndre Jordan chipped in with six points ( 3 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) , 14 rebounds and five blocked shots , while Bismack Biyombo was the only other Clipper ' player to reach double figures in points . He finished with just nine points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and four rebounds in 31 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday .

In fact , the Thunder led for the final 40 - plus minutes , as they pulled out a near wire - to - wire win . Rebounding was the biggest factor to the Thunder 's success , as they won that battle , 46 - 32 . Fastbreak points and points in the paint were also decisive , as Oklahoma City outscored Miami , 58 - 32 in the paint and 16 - 4 in fastbreak points . The Thunder finished the game shooting 51 percent from the field , while holding the Heat to just 44 percent . And while for the most part , the play behind starer Cody Zeller has been inconsistent at best , Kelly Olynyk is showing that he can be a legitimate reserve option for Boston with his play over the last three games . In Monday 's outing , Olynyk played 26 minutes off the bench and scored 15 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting from the field to go along with nine rebounds . Now , over the course of Boston 's current three - game win streak , Olynyk has averaged 27 points and 6 rebounds over 26 minutes per game while shooting an impressive 6 - of - 12 ( 67 percent ) from behind the arc and 15 - of - 34 ( 63 percent ) from the field overall . There have been trade rumors brewing all season surrounding Boston and another big man , but Olynyk is doing his best to put those to rest . The Hornets ' next game is on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Hornets will stay at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 103 - 86 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Tuesday . The two teams square off again Wednesday night in Memphis in the second game of a home - and - home series , so the Grizzlies ( 17 - 9 ) opted to rest Marc Gasol on Tuesday . That left them even more short - handed than usual , given that star point guard Mike Conley is also out for the foreseeable future . That played right into the Cavs ' hands , as they were able to put together a relatively comfortable home win despite sitting Kyrie Irving for rest purposes themselves . LeBron James and Kevin Love turned in their typical quality of performance , but the story was J.R. Smith , who 'd essentially been mired in a month - long slump . The veteran guard posted a season - high 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , including a stellar 6 - of - 10 tally from beyond the arc . Cleveland ( 18 - 5 ) shot 46 percent from the field overall , which helped them overcome 17 turnovers . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who started at center for Gasol . He posted 18 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Troy Williams and Andrew Harrison turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and an assist , and the latter posting four assists , three rebounds , three blocks and a steal . Jarell Martin supplied eight points , 10 rebounds and an assist . Love led the way for Cleveland with 29 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two steals . James registered 23 points , eight assists , six rebounds and three steals . DeAndre Liggins compiled three points , five rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block while drawing the start for Irving , while Channing Frye led the second unit with eight points , a rebound and an assist . The Grizzlies and Cavs meet again on Wednesday evening at FedEx Forum in Memphis .

The Cavaliers ( 32 - 30 ) learned earlier in the day that they would n't have Kevin Love at their disposal to attempt to help them stop a rare slide that had seen them lose three of their last four , as the star forward would be sidelined with his lower back ailment . However , the other two members of the Big Three , along with some help from trusty veteran Channing Frye , helped insure that the starting five was able to put together a relatively comfortable home win . The Phoenix Suns defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 120 - 103 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . Phoenix were expected to win this game easily , but Phoenix gave them a run for their money . While there were only two ties and two lead changes , neither team led by more than 18 points for the entirety of the second half . Phoenix were stifled by Charlotte 's defense , as they shot 60 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Suns , as it was a double - digit margin for the majority of the second half . Kemba Walker carried the load , as he tallied 26 points , four rebounds and eight assists . Marvin Williams finished with 19 points and four rebounds . T.J. Warren was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and eight rebounds . Leandro Barbosa led the bench in scoring , dropping 16 points and four rebounds . Nicolas Booker was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 15 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Leandro Barbosa led the bench in scoring , dropping 16 points and four rebounds .
It was another dominant shooting night for the victorious Golden State Warriors on Thursday . Since snapping his league - record three - point streak last week , Steph Curry has been lights out from beyond the arc , hitting 38 percent of his shots from the field in his last seven games . For the Clippers , trade rumors continue to swirl around shooting guard Klay Thompson and rightfully so , as the reserve has now scored double - digit points in all but one game so far in December and has scored at least 10 points in eight of those outings . Griffin shot a stellar 9 - of - 11 from the field and 3 - of - 4 from three - point range . He added four rebounds and six assists . For the Clippers , it was a season - best night for guard J.J. Thompson , who scored 16 points and hit three three - pointers . The team has now lost four straight games and looked lost on the offensive end on Monday . The Clippers were able to stay in the game and remain competitive despite stagnant offense . While point guard Klay Thompson scored 16 points and shot just 7 - of - 11 in 35 minutes , the rest of the team struggled , particularly on the defensive end . The Clippers will visit Los Angeles on Tuesday , while the Clippers will take on the Kings .
The Washington Wizards ( 45 - 33 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 61 ) 119 - 90 on Friday . The Wizards were unsuccessful in their bid to garner a playoff spot , but entered Sunday trying to finish the season off on a positive note . The Los Angeles Clippers ( 29 - 17 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 29 - 23 ) 100 - 93 in overtime on Wednesday at the American Airlines Center in Miami . Despite being down 72 - 35 going into the third quarter , the Heat were able to use a team - effort to outlast the Heat and steal the two - point victory on the road . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were led by the duo of Chris Paul and Jamal Crawford . Paul went an impressive 8 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding five assists . He 's been on fire the last two games , combining to go 15 - for - 34 from the field over his last two games . He 's now averaging 20 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Coming off the bench , Jamal Crawford shot 4 - for - 5 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 10 points in the game . Despite the loss , the Heat had six players reach double figures in points . Chris Paul led the way , going 8 - for - 23 from the floor and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 22 points . It was a new season - high for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Jamal Crawford was dialed in with his shot as well , going 7 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 20 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 31 rebounds over his last two games . Luol Deng was the only other starter in double figures , as he chipped in with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and eight rebounds . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Heat will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 13 ) 95 - 93 on Tuesday . Memphis ended their four - game losing streak with the win . Zach Randolph ( knee ) was still out , but the Grizzlies used their depth to get out to a comfortable lead early . Six players scored in double figures with Eric Bledsoe scoring a team - high 23 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting from the field . He also had six rebounds and six assists in 40 minutes of action . Brandon Knight had a second straight game with good across - the - board numbers , finishing with 17 points , four rebounds , and five assists in 37 minutes . Only one other player , Mirza Teletovic , scored in double figures , finishing with a team - high 14 points in 41 minutes . Off the bench , Mario Chalmers scored 11 points in 21 minutes , while PJ Tucker recorded his double - double with 10 points and 11 rebounds in 41 minutes . The Grizzlies will return home to host the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday . Phoenix has lost two straight and six of their last seven games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Suns ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Suns continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Brandon Knight scored a team - high 22 points and grabbed eight rebounds in 37 minutes . Courtney Lee was a lone bright spot off the bench , as he scored 18 points in 28 minutes . The Grizzlies will go on the road to play the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday . Phoenix will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 25 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 46 - 9 ) 132 - 110 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Nuggets 42 - 42 right away in the first quarter . The Nuggets made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Nuggets 25 - 25 , but their comeback came up just short and the Nuggets were able to secure a surprising victory in front of their home crowd . Denver shot very well in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors shot 49 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Kevin Durant backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 25 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and five assists . It marked his third double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 24 rebounds . Jokic , on the other hand , recorded 17 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) of his own , to go along with 21 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 47 points and 16 rebounds . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Andre Iguodala , who scored 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and grabbed one rebound in 18 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Warriors will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 106 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Cleveland leading for much of the first half , Atlanta came out strong in the second half and took a nine - point lead into halftime . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Atlanta winning that battle , 50 - 39 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 13 more assists and committing six less turnovers . Dennis Schroder was the player of the game , as he tallied 28 points , two rebounds and six assists . Paul Millsap finished with 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 7 points , 17 rebounds and three blocks . Channing Frye was the only other Cleveland player in double figures , scoring 13 points to go along with seven rebounds . Mike Muscala led the way for Cleveland , as he provided 28 points , two rebounds and six assists . Cleveland will host the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday for their next game . The Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 13 tries . LeBron James led the way , as he collected 23 points , nine rebounds , five assists and three steals . Paul Millsap was second on the team , with his 21 points and five rebounds . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 7 points , 17 rebounds and three assists . Channing Frye led the bench with 13 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Cleveland will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Chicago Bulls .

The Pistons were able to force the Lakers into 21 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 12 points and 10 rebounds on the year . The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 36 - 25 ) have put up valiant efforts thus far in the absence of All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry , with DeMar DeRozan particularly taking on an elevated role . However , when quality opponents come calling , the void felt by the absence of a player of Lowry 's caliber eventually rears its ugly head . Such was the case Wednesday , as the Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) leveraged superb efforts from trade - deadline acquisition Bojan Bogdanovic and trusted shooting guard Bradley Beal to pull out the tough road win . The pair combined for nearly half of Toronto 's point total , and the visitors made a game - changing statement in the second quarter by outscoring their hosts by a whopping 26 - 8 in the first 5:54 of the period . On the defensive end , the Wizards stymied Toronto to the tune of sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range overall . Bogdanovic paced the Raptors overall with 27 points , his best scoring haul since donning his new team 's uniform . His effort included a sensational 6 - for - 7 tally from behind the arc . Beal followed with 23 points , three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Markieff Morris was next with a productive stat line of 13 points , eight rebounds and five assists . John Wall generated a 12 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and one block . Marcin Gortat matched Wall 's scoring total and added eight boards and one assist . DeMarre Carroll supplied nine points , four rebounds and two assists . Norman Powell led the bench with 17 points , and Norman Powell led the second unit with 17 points .

The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 114 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 18 - 7 ) came in to Wednesday hoping to extend their recent stellar run in rather comfortable fashion against what would have seemed like an overmatched Sixers squad . However , Philadelphia ( 6 - 19 ) came ready to defend their home court , and rolled out Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor together as starters for the first time this season . While both big men played relatively well , it was Robert Covington who exploded for a season - high 26 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Sixers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Philadelphia actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 50 percent to 47 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 31 points , five boards and three assists . Lowry was next with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured an assist , two steals and a block . DeMarre Carroll supplied 10 points , three boards , an assist and a steal , while Terrence Ross and Cory Joseph tallied a pair of 13 - point efforts to lead the bench . Okafor was second behind Covington with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Sergio Rodriguez and Gerald Henderson put forth a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists and a rebound and the latter also posting two assists and a steal . Embiid had a quiet night by his standards , registering nine points , six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal . Ersan Ilyasova , who moved back to the bench with Okafor 's insertion into the starting lineup at power forward , went for 12 points , seven rebounds and an assist to lead the bench . The Raptors head back home to face off with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Sixers remain home to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday evening as well .

The Toronto Raptors defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 114 - 105 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . Throughout his first seven seasons , DeMar DeRozan had managed two performances of over 38 points . In what has already proven to be a stellar 2016 - 12 campaign , the All-Star shooting guard has already accomplished the feat on three occasions , with Tuesday night being one of those . DeRozan led all scorers with 31 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and two steals . The performance included a 11 - of - 19 tally from the field , and even a rather rare three - pointer on two attempts from beyond the arc . Toronto ( 38 - 18 ) was hot collectively from long range , and it proved to be the difference in the game . Both teams equaled the others ' solid 48 percent success rate from the field , yet the Raptors managed to drain their 19 three - point attempts on a 39 percent shooting rate . The Raptors were led by Andrew Wiggins , who tallied 26 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal . Ricky Rubio followed with 12 points , 13 assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jonas Valanciunas generated a 14 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Shabazz Muhammad matched Towns 's scoring total and added six rebounds and one block . Shabazz Muhammad matched Muhammad 's scoring total while leading the bench and added six rebounds . Shabazz Ross led the second unit with 10 points .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 35 - 32 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 28 - 37 ) 121 - 84 on Sunday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 31 - 24 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 56 percent from the field , 49 percent from the three - point line and 49 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic shot just 37 percent from the floor and a meager 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Blazers were also able to force the Magic into 15 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Aaron Gordon had a big game . He went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding four rebounds . The only other Hornet to reach double figures in points was Evan Fournier , who scored 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Trail Blazers ' six - game losing streak . McCollum on the other hand shot 8 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 18 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . Aaron Gordon was the third starter in double figures , as he posted 17 points ( 8 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds in 33 minutes . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe also continued his strong play , scoring 18 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 24 minutes . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 114 - 106 , at Palace at Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Pistons ( 33 - 12 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Cavaliers ( 25 - 12 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Detroit forced the visitors into a highly efficient 48 percent shooting from long range , while also boasting nine of their own . The Cavaliers ' starting five was decidedly top - heavy in terms of production , as Kevin Love led the way with 29 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds and three assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was next with 19 points , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Marcus Morris tallied 14 points , two assists , two rebounds and one steal . Tristan Thompson posted a 11 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Ersan Ilyasova went for 11 points , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Stanley Johnson led the bench with 15 points , four rebounds , five assists and one steal . LeBron James posted a 20 - point , nine - rebound , eight - assist triple - double that also included one steal . Reggie Jackson led Detroit with 15 points , six assists and two rebounds . Tristan Thompson provided a 11 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Timofey Mozgov went for 12 points , eight rebounds and three blocks . Reggie Smith led the bench with 15 points , six rebounds and six assists .
The Washington Wizards ( 24 - 20 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 23 - 22 ) 109 - 99 on Friday night . These are two teams going in opposite directions and that ended up playing out on the floor in this matchup . The key for the Wizards was their defense , as they held the Hornets to 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The rebounding was a big difference as well , with the Wizards snatching down 47 boards to the Hornets 43 . The Hornets were led by Markieff Morris in this game , as he tallied 23 points , eight rebounds and two assists in the defeat . Bradley Beal was second on the team , as he scored 18 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting . Marvin Williams was the only other Hornets player in double figures , accumulating 13 points , eight rebounds and four assists in the defeat . The Hornets will look to get out of this slump on Saturday against the Cleveland Cavaliers . The Hornets ( 23 - 22 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Kemba Walker led the way for Charlotte , as he tallied 21 points and five assists on 7 - of - 24 shooting . Otto Porter was second on the team , accruing 14 points , 12 rebounds and two assists . Marvin Williams amassed 13 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Marco Belinelli , Cody Zeller and Kelly Oubre each provided 10 points off the bench .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 112 - 86 , at Verizon Center on Monday evening . The Wizards ( 26 - 20 ) knew they 'd have to hit on all cylinders to insure that they could keep pace with John Wall and company , and they managed to do that and then some Monday . Washington posted outstanding 58 - and - 62 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively , while seeing six players tally double - digit scoring . Meanwhile , they did a superb defensive job on Wall , limiting him to a modest 19 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , and the Hawks ( 27 - 20 ) to 36 percent shooting overall , including one stretch of 30 consecutive missed shots . Wall led the way for the Wizards with 19 points , nine assists and six rebounds . Morris followed with 15 points , nine assists , one rebound and one steal . Dwight Howard totaled a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and one block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. paced the bench with 12 points and a steal . John Wall provided a 19 - point , 9 - assist double - double , while Markieff Morris ( 15 points ) and Bradley Beal ( 15 points ) were highly productive off the bench . The Wizards continue their road trip with a Saturday night showdown with the Miami Heat , while the Wizards remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening as well .
The Toronto Raptors ( 14 - 9 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 18 - 5 ) 97 - 94 on Tuesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors were able to win their fifth straight game on Monday , as they slipped away with a four - point victory over the Spurs . Despite out - rebounding Toronto 34 - 35 , the Raptors were forced into 20 turnovers , which may have been the difference in an otherwise evenly played game . The Raptors received a huge contribution from center DeMar DeRozan , who went 10 - for - 15 from the field and 8 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 28 points , while also adding four rebounds . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting just seven points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . Kyle Lowry had a strong showing as well . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding five rebounds . He 's now averaging 13 points and 4 rebounds on the year . LaMarcus Aldridge recorded a double - double with 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Spurs will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

After losing the first quarter , the Spurs bounced back in a big way , winning the next two periods 67 - 57 . They eventually pulled out what is their more impressive win in what has been a rather slow start to the regular season . Going against his former team , Kawhi Leonard shined for the Hornets . Leonard finished with a game - high 23 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , along with four rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block in 34 minutes . Patty Mills was the only other player to score in double digits for the Hornets , as he finished with 15 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and three assists off the bench . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Hornets will go on the road to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .

The New Orleans Pelicans ( 20 - 32 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 16 - 36 ) 111 - 106 on Saturday . The form of these two teams would have indicated a different result , but the Pelicans got a much needed win to keep slim hopes alive for the playoffs . The Pelicans outscored the Suns 30 - 32 in the fourth quarter for a comeback win . The turnovers were the key difference , as Phoenix committed 16 turnovers to the Suns 16 . This loss cracked a five - game winning streak for the Suns , so losing in the second end of a back - to - back is nothing to be upset about . Anthony Davis was fantastic , as he amassed 34 points and nine rebounds on 12 - of - 21 shooting . T.J. Warren was the only other Suns player in double figures , as he amassed 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . The Suns will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . This sort of game is a microcosm of the Suns season . The talent discrepancy on paper in this game was truly unfair , yet this game was close throughout and they trailed for the entirety of the second half . The sloppy play really killed this team , as they shot well but committed 16 turnovers . Jrue Holiday was one of the lone bright spots , as he tallied 14 points while four rebounds and five assists off the bench . The Suns will look to play better on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets shot 50 percent from the field and assisted on 28 of their 46 made baskets . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with Houston recording 28 assists to 20 turnovers , while Phoenix matched their assists and turnovers at 17 a piece . The Rockets took advantage of the whistle too , going 20 - of - 11 from the free - throw line . The New York Knicks ( 19 - 24 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 26 - 16 ) 117 - 106 on Friday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Knicks came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 31 - 34 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Knicks shot the ball well , going 51 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 39 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were also able to force the Celtics into 23 turnovers , while only committing three of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Knicks were led by Derrick Rose , who went 13 - for - 24 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 30 points in 33 minutes . He also chipped in nine rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocked shots , but it was n't enough to keep the Celtics in contention for the victory . Notching a double - double , center Willy Hernangomez posted 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 20 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 54 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . As for the Celtics , Carmelo Thomas did n't have his best game , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) , four rebounds and three assists . He should only continue to get better with the huge increase in minutes , as he did n't get much playing time with the Rockets . The Knicks ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Celtics will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .

The Utah Jazz defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 107 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . The Jazz ( 13 - 9 ) edged out a close victory down the stretch after the Lakers ( 10 - 13 ) found life late in the second half . The see - saw third and fourth quarters saw scoring runs in favor of Los Angeles in the third , while the Lakers bounced back in the fourth behind Lou William 's streaky scoring bursts and Julius Randle 's explosiveness under the rim . Williams dropped in a two point shot to close the Lakers lead to three point with 3:26 remaining in the final period , but Rodney Hoot responded for Utah with a 25 - foot three pointer . The Lakers only managed two points over a three minute stretch , while Los Angeles closed out the game . Williams finished with 38 points , six rebounds and seven assists on 13 - of - 27 shooting to lead all scorers in his 34 minutes off the bench . Worth noting was the Lakers starting lineup , which consisted of Brandon Ingram , Luol Deng , Metta World Peace , Julius Randle and Timofey Mozgov . Head coach Luke Walton was experimental with the lineup , and it seemed to funnel the Lakers into more isolation style basketball , which was the game plan as discussed in the post - game press conference . All five Utah starters finished in double figures scoring , led by Gordon Hayward and his 23 points . Rudy Gobert finished with 14 points , 17 rebounds and five blocks in 39 minutes . Next up , the Lakers play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Lakers visit the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Toronto Raptors , 102 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Friday . The Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard Goran Dragic in the offseason , inking the 20 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 24 points and adding six rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . It was an outstanding defensive performance for the dynamic duo of Jonas Valanciunas and Goran Dragic , who combined for 55 of the Heat 's 96 points on the night . The Raptors were also able to post a solid 45 percent success rate from the field overall while limiting the Raptors to just 45 percent shooting . Toronto was led by Dwyane Wade 's 22 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , four assists , three blocks and a steal . Joe Johnson followed with a near double - double consisting of 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Luol Deng and DeMarre Carroll turned in matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , and the latter providing four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Cory Joseph led the second unit with 10 points , two assists and three rebounds . Cory Joseph was productive as a reserve as well with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . Valanciunas paced the Raptors with 24 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . DeRozan was right behind him with 22 points , six boards , four assists and one steal . Kyle Lowry and Kyle Lowry registered matching seven - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds , six assists and three steals , and the latter providing four rebounds and two assists . Cory Joseph led the second unit with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists , while Cory Joseph led the bench with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) were spearheaded by Goran Dragic , who supplied 26 points , two assists and six rebounds . Joe Johnson and Joe Johnson produced matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , and the latter registering seven assists , four rebounds and a pair of steals . Cory Joseph led the second unit with 10 points , two assists and a rebound . The series now shifts back to Toronto , where the deadlocked teams will meet for Game 3 at the Air Canada Centre on Monday night .

The Denver Hawks defeated the Denver Nuggets , 109 - 108 , at Pepsi Center on Friday . The exciting back - and - forth affair fittingly came down to the final seconds , and the Hawks ' Paul Millsap played a pivotal role in the win . He drained two free throws with six ticks left that gave Denver ( 12 - 18 ) a 109 - 108 lead , and his defensive rebound at the buzzer off a Wilson Chandler miss put the finishing touches on the win . Neither team shot exceedingly well , but the Hawks took better care of the ball than the Nuggets ( 12 - 17 ) , who commited 15 turnovers . Dennis Schroder led the way for Denver with 27 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Millsap went for 20 points , eight rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Thabo Sefolosha was next with a full stat line of 12 points , four rebounds , three assists , four steals and a block . Mike Muscala paced the second unit with 13 points , three boards , two assists and a block . Chandler followed with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Emmanuel Mudiay provided 17 points , five assists and three rebounds , while Thabo Barton contributed 12 points , four rebounds , three assists and a block . Will Barton paced the reserves with 12 points , five boards , five assists , a block and a block . Mike Muscala paced the second unit with 13 points , three rebounds , two assists and a block . Denver remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is currently three games behind the eighth - seeded Chicago Bulls . They head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Monday night .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 14 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 13 - 30 ) 114 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Pelicans road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Timberwolves had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 17 - 4 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , New Orleans had managed a paltry three wins in 22 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 100 points over the first 18 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for New Orleans , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Pelicans roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Timberwolves ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 21 percent shooting from beyond the arc . Minnesota received a trio of 20 - point - plus efforts from their starting five , spearheaded by Andrew Wiggins 's 21 points . He added four rebounds , two assists and three steals . Andrew Wiggins was next with 21 points , two assists , four rebounds and three steals . Ricky Rubio followed with 15 points , four assists , a rebound and a steal . Kevin Garnett turned in a near double - double with 20 points , nine boards , two assists , a steal and a block . Tyreke Evans filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , three rebounds , five assists and a block . Dante Cunningham led the bench with 11 points , two assists , a rebound and two steals . Eric Gordon paced the Timberwolves ' reserves with 11 points , a rebound , an assist and a steal . Minnesota remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday night for a showdown with the Philadelphia 76ers .

Philadelphia has lost three straight as they wade through the middle of a seven - game road trip that started in Orlando on Dec. 21 . The Sixers gave up a gut - wrenching 42 easy ponts off of 18 turnovers , and even when they did get a shot up , they were n't falling . Kelly Olynyk was productive in a reserve role as well with 14 points , six rebounds and two blocks . Jae Crowder stepped up with a 17 - point , 4 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and a pair of blocks . Marcus Smart led the bench with 12 points , two rebounds , four assists and a steal . The Heat head back home to face off with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Heat remain home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night .
The Miami Heat defeated the Golden State Warriors 105 - 102 Monday at AmericanAirlines Arena . After Kevin Durant tied the game at 102 with just over 10 seconds left in the fourth quarter , Dion Waiters held the ball at the top of the key while the clock ticked down . With a little over two seconds on the clock , Waiters launched a shot from behind the arc . The shot hit nothing but net and the Heat pulled off one of the biggest upset victories in the NBA this season . Waiters was not only the hero , but he was also the star , as he finished with a game - high 33 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field and 6 - of - 8 from 3 - point land in 33 minutes . As a team , the Heat were scorching from behind the arc , hitting a ridiculous 43 percent of their shots from long range in the winning effort . The win gives Miami their fourth straight victory as they were perfect over their four - game home stand . Meanwhile , the loss ends the Warriors ' ( 38 - 7 ) seven - game win streak , as it ended up being too little too late in the closing moments for the NBA 's top team . Durant led the way in the scoring column , finishing with 27 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he did shoot just 1 - of - 8 from behind the arc . Additionally , Steph Curry almost put together a triple - double , as he recorded 21 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 22 of his own , but JaVale McGee 's 10 points made him the fourth and final Heat to score in double figures . Up next , the Heat will look to continue their winning ways in Brooklyn on Friday , while the Warriors will look to return to form against the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 16 - 46 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 27 - 34 ) 102 - 84 on Sunday at the US Airways Center in Orlando . The Suns got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 29 - 29 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 35 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns were also able to force the Magic into 14 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Alex Len had a big night . He went 10 - for - 22 from the field and 11 - for - 14 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 20 points and 15 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Vucevic posted 15 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 1 - 0 FT , 1 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds . He had only reached double figures in points twice this year , so the 27 points were a season - high . Devin Booker added 14 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) and four rebounds as well . Doing his best to keep the Magic in the game was Alex Len , who recorded a monster double - double . He finished with 15 points ( 7 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 46 points and 27 rebounds over his last two games . Ronnie Price had a big game as well . He went 7 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and two blocked shots . The 31 points were a season - high for Len , while the double - double was his third in a row . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday .
After scoffing at the notion of doubling his assist numbers under new coach Mike D'Antoni , guard James Harden is leading the league in assists through 17 games . Harden posted yet another double - double in Sunday 's win , scoring a team - high 33 points to go with nine assists . Harden 's increased assist totals have just been one statistical effect of D'Antoni 's run - and - gun offense , as the Rockets have upped their three - point shooting numbers significantly . A game after taking an NBA-record 0 three - pointers , the Rockets took 20 threes on the way . Philadelphia ( 1 - 9 ) , meanwhile , has been surging lately , pushing their way to the playoff picture after a dismal 16 - 33 start to the season . On Sunday , the Sixers showed the intensity that led them to their playoff push , out - rebounding the Sixers by seven and coming away with 17 forced turnovers . Center Joel Embiid led the team with 22 points and also pulled down 10 rebounds . Off the bench , big man Trevor Ariza scored 17 points and came away with eight rebounds , three steals , and two blocks . As a team , the Sixers shot a whopping 48 percent from the field and reached the free - throw line 35 times . The Sixers , meanwhile , saw strong play from their own starters . Shooting guard Trevor Ariza led the team with 17 points , while point guard Eric Gordon had 16 of his own . However , the rest of the team struggled , particularly on the defensive end . Philadelphia managed to hold just 12 from the field and only 29 percent from three - point range .

It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Hornets have the right guys to build a winning team around . They 'll face off against the Chicago Bulls in Los Angeles on Sunday . Charlotte had their two - game win streak snapped with the loss . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 53 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range , while New Orleans went 50 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range on their end .
