The Celtics built a strong lead early in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 31 - 25 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 31 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding six assists . He 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Jae Crowder was able to record a double - double of his own with 16 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Celtics will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 10 - 16 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 18 - 10 ) 96 - 92 on Sunday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Sacramento . The Kings got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 24 - 19 in the first quarter alone . The Kings were the superior shooters in this one , going 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 38 percent from the floor and 20 percent from deep . The Kings also forced the Grizzlies into 13 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own . DeMarcus Cousins led the charge , going 6 - for - 18 from the field and 8 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 28 rebounds over his last two games . Kosta Koufos was also a big factor in the win , posting a season - high of 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 6 FT ) , while also adding 13 rebounds and three blocked shots in 30 minutes . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 18 points and 11 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Garrett Temple added 13 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six assists . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 50 - 11 ) 94 - 87 on Sunday at the United Center in Chicago . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Warriors 19 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors went 39 percent from the floor and 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were led by the duo of Stephen Curry and Stephen Curry . Curry went 10 - for - 27 from the field and 2 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding five assists . The only other Rocket to reach double figures was Klay Thompson , who finished with 13 points ( 5 - 22 FG , 1 - 11 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and one rebound in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , Bobby Portis chipped in with 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds as well . Jimmy Curry did everything he could to keep the Warriors in this game , going 10 - for - 27 from the field and 2 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , to go along with five assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 0 - of - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from deep . Andre Lopez chipped in with 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight rebounds as well . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Warriors will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New York Knicks , 121 - 107 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday night . The Knicks ( 22 - 31 ) have been mired in controversy on and off the court in recent weeks , with rumors swirling about a possible trade of franchise cornerstone Carmelo Anthony and losses in three of their last four games . The Lakers ( 18 - 36 ) are n't in much better shape , however , and came into Monday 's contest with only five road wins in 28 games away from the Staples Center this season . However , a sterling effort from the Los Angeles bench that generated over half of the team 's scoring total helped lead the way to a relatively easy victory . The visitors were sharp from the jump , building a 29 - 19 lead after one and a 61 - 45 advantage by halftime . That edge was 97 - 73 after three quarters , and even with New York showing some signs of life in garbage time , the Lakers still coasted to a double - digit road victory . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who tallied 22 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal in 26 minutes . Nick Young was next and paced the starters with 17 points , which he complemented with five rebounds and one steal . Brandon Ingram and Julius Randle followed with matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also providing seven boards , two assists and one steal , and the latter offering two rebounds , two assists and one block . Tarik Black posted a modest nine points but hauled in 10 boards and recorded one steal . D'Angelo Russell ( four points , six assists , two rebounds ) was minimally involved , but Justin Holiday ( 14 points ) and emerging rookie Ivica Zubac ( 10 points ) were productive as reserves as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) used a late fourth - quarter surge to secure their first road victory on Monday , after dropping their first three away from home to start the season . They did so with yet another great performance from Vince Carter off the bench , as he continues to turn back the clock in his 19th NBA season . Carter had 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve - - his third straight game with at least 17 points . Zach Randolph added a great performance off the bench himself , scoring 18 points and grabbing 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes to notch his third double - double of the season . For the starters , it was Marc Gasol and Mike Conley who carried the load , scoring 22 and 18 points respectively . For the Jazz ( 7 - 5 ) , on top of losing Monday 's game , they also lost their starting power forward Derrick Favors , as he left the game with left knee soreness after 21 minutes of playing time . Favors has been bothered with knee issues since before the season even started , and it is possible the team is now extra cautious with their star forward , opening the door for second - year player Trey Lyles to play a bigger role . The power forward out of Kentucky was great in 32 minutes off the bench , scoring 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Gordon Hayward , who has been unstoppable as of late with five straight games of at least 20 points , struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to just 13 points . With Favors potentially out for an indefinite amount of time , the burden will be on Hayward to regain his scoring mojo and carry the load for a Utah team that is n't very prolific offensively . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to Los Angeles on Wednesday to take on the red - hot Clippers , while the Jazz will have off until Thursday when they take on Chicago at home .

The Jazz have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their second straight loss Wednesday . The Thunder were led by the duo of Gordon Hayward and Gordon Hayward . Hayward finished with 19 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , while also contributing three rebounds , four assists and two steals , but it was n't enough to keep the Jazz in contention for the victory . The Jazz received most of their production from the Kevin Durant , who had 27 points ( 10 - 13 FG , 4 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , with six rebounds , one assist , four steals and one block . The Jazz will head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Friday , while the Jazz will head home for a date with the Trail Blazers on Wednesday . Along with the dismal start , the Jazz also secured a victory on the road . As a team , the Jazz shot 55 percent from the field and 41 percent from behind the three - point line . Gordon Hayward played a game - high 30 minutes , going 5 - for - 11 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 19 points . It was a season - high in points for Hayward . Center Kevin Gobert had 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven rebounds and a pair of assists . The Jazz will now head to San Antonio to take on the Spurs on Wednesday night .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Miami Heat , 110 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows which way they 're heading . The second half is when Memphis really turned it on , as they outscored Miami , 62 - 42 in that 32 - minute stretch . Shooting was the difference in the game , with the Heat hitting 51 percent of their shots to Miami 's 49 percent . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 34 - 39 . Mike Waiters led the way for the Heat , as he tallied 28 points , five rebounds and six assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 15 points , 12 rebounds and two blocks . Troy Williams came off the bench to provide 18 points and three rebounds . Dion Waiters was the only bench player in double figures , providing 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Dion Waiters was the only starters with more than 11 points , as he totaled 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Marc Gasol did all he could for Miami , leading the team with 28 points , three rebounds and six assists . Josh Richardson was second on the team , as he accrued 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Tony Allen was the only other starter with more than four points , as he provided 11 points , two rebounds and two assists . Miami will look to keep rolling on Friday in a home matchup against the Indiana Pacers .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New York Knicks , 107 - 102 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday night . Although both teams entered the game with losing records , they engaged in an exciting and tightly - contested offensive affair through three quarters . Both defenses clamped down in the final 8 minutes , however , and the Hornets ( 8 - 8 ) were able to rally behind their starters and retake the lead midway through the third quarter after Kemba Walker drained a three pointer over the final seconds to seal the victory for the Hornets . The three - point shooting was the biggest part of the Hornets ' success , as Charlotte posted respective success rates of 37 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while also eliciting 8 turnovers from their hosts as well . Kemba Walker led the way with 28 points , a total he supplemented with three assists , two rebounds , three blocks and a steal . Jeremy Lamb followed with a full 14 - point , 2 - assist double - double that also included a rebound and a steal . Frank Kaminsky III was productive in a reserve role as well with 14 points ( 13 which came in the fourth quarter ) , five boards , three assists and a block . Frank Kaminsky III paced the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and three assists , while Frank Kaminsky III posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and a block . Brandon Jennings paced the second unit with 12 points , four assists and a rebound . Brandon Jennings was productive in a reserve role as well with 12 points , four assists and a rebound . The Knicks remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Tuesday . Walker added two rebounds , three assists , a steal and three blocks to his team - leading point total . Derrick Rose was next with 18 points , eight rebounds , eight assists , two steals and two blocks . Cody Zeller and Michael Kidd-Gilchrist were next with a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former also hauling in 10 rebounds , three assists , a steal and two blocks , and the latter supplying four rebounds , four assists and five steals . Courtney Lee chimed in with 14 points , while the emerging Mindauguas Kaminsky led the bench with 14 points .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 120 - 116 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday evening . The Cavs ( 28 - 8 ) narrowly escaped Phoenix with the win , as the Suns ( 12 - 26 ) used a strong second half to come within two points , with 3:20 left in the fourth . The Cavs started out with a huge 41 - point first quarter but the Suns retaliated in the third , winning the quarter 37 - 37 , to bring the score to 93 - 90 at the start of the fourth . However , the Cavs were able to hang on to escape with a four - point win . Cleveland 's big three earned their keep in this one , as they combined for 40 points in the first half , and another 40 in the second half , for a huge 80 - point contribution on the night . LeBron James was the high - point man for Phoenix , with 28 points on 11 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with eight assists , eight rebounds and one steal , in 40 minutes . T.J. Warren followed up with 15 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting , along with three rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 27 minutes off the bench . T.J. Warren added 15 points , while rookie T.J. Warren chipped in 15 points . The only other player to score in double digits for the Suns was Tyson Chandler , who finished with 10 points and 15 rebounds .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 87 - 75 , at Palace at Auburn Hills on Friday . Both teams ' defenses came out ultra - sharp , with only a combined 29 points scored in the first quarter . The game remained close throughout the second and third periods as well , and the Pistons ( 33 - 36 ) actually entered the fourth quarter with a 66 - 60 lead . That 's when the light went on for the Raptors ( 40 - 29 ) , who rattled off 27 points over the final 12 minutes while limiting Detroit to just nine points . Abysmal three - point shooting was part of the downfall for the Pistons , as they managed just a 15 percent success rate from behind the arc . The loss negated a mammoth 22 - rebound effort from Detroit 's Andre Drummond . Serge Ibaka paced Toronto with 17 points , nine rebounds and one assist . DeMar DeRozan followed with 14 points , eight boards and six assists . DeMarre Carroll supplied 12 points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 10 points , eight rebounds , one steal and one block . Cory Joseph was productive as well with a full stat line of nine points , seven rebounds , six assists and one block . Norman Powell led the second unit with 11 points and two rebounds . Reggie Jackson led Detroit with 20 points and six assists . Tobias Harris posted 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . DeMarre Carroll matched Carroll 's point total and added seven assists , one rebound and one steal . Jon Leuer led the second unit with 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . The Pistons head back home to tangle with the Indiana Pacers on Sunday evening , while the Pistons remain home to face off with the Phoenix Suns on Sunday evening .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 0 - 1 ) 101 - 100 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Mavericks have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their second straight loss Wednesday . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks finished at 49 percent from the floor and 38 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Mavericks , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Spurs got their biggest contribution from their bench , with both Devin Ginobili and Dirk Nowitzki reaching double figures in points . Ginobili finished with 20 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and six assists , while Harris added 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his fifth double - double of the season . Danny Green was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) . The Spurs were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Monta Ellis . Ellis went 11 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 4 times , and converted on 4 - of - 4 free throw attempts . Dirk Nowitzki was the only other Spurs ' player , as he had 18 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and grabbing six rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 10 rebounds . Nowitzki shot 7 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from deep to score 18 points , while also grabbing six rebounds . It was the most points he 's had in the last four games . In Nowitzki 's third game with the team , he finished with 5 points ( 2 - 10 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) , four rebounds and three assists . He should only continue to get better with the huge increase in minutes , as he did n't get much playing time with the Rockets . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Mavericks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

In fact , the Pacers took a 27 - 17 lead after the first quarter , as they never trailed after that . The Indiana offense was as efficient as ever , going 50 percent from the field , 41 percent from three - point range and 92 percent from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Pacers winning that battle , 38 - 32 . Orlando ( 15 - 20 ) have not been able to get a winning - streak going this season , as their defense continues to falter . They 're playing better than any expert expected , and that 's why Friday 's drubbing at the hands of the Raptors was more of a surprise than it would have been in the past . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 5 - 4 ) 102 - 93 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 39 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 18 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 16 turnovers between them , but the Trail Blazers managed to stay a step ahead of the Pelicans on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 24 points paced New Orleans , and he added four rebounds , seven assists and two steals . LaMarcus Aldridge was right behind with 22 points , nine rebounds , two assists and a steal . Wesley Matthews followed with 16 points , two rebounds and two assists . Matthews was next with 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . Ryan Anderson contributed 12 points , three rebounds and an assist . Ryan Anderson paced the New Orleans bench with 12 points , three rebounds and an assist . The Pelicans remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are just a game behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night . Portland was paced by Anthony Davis , who supplied 22 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . Wesley Matthews followed with 16 points , two assists and a rebound . Wesley Matthews contributed 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . Ryan Anderson was next with 12 points , three rebounds , an assist and a block . Ryan Anderson rounded out a productive night for the starting five with 12 points , three rebounds and an assist . The Pelicans remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed as well . They 're home again on Wednesday night to take on the Sacramento Kings .
The host Indiana Pacers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 115 - 108 on Tuesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse . Despite Los Angeles ( 2 - 2 ) leading for nearly the entirety of the game , the Lakers ( 1 - 3 ) kept it close all night long . The only leads for the Lakers were when they started up 40 and when they took a late lead in the fourth quarter at 106 - 104 . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , as both teams took 28 attempts , with the Pacers making four more than the Lakers . Rim protection was huge as well , as Indiana swatted away eight shots to the Lakers two . Los Angeles leaned on their bench in this game and nearly pulled out an upset win . Lou William was the leading scorer for the Lakers off the bench , dropping 19 points and five assists . Second on the team was Jordan Clarkson , who scored his 15 off the bench as well . Luol Deng and D'Angelo Russell were the only starters in double figures , as they combined for just 21 points . Larry Nance Jr. set a career - high in steals , as he recorded 11 points , five rebounds and six steals in the defeat . Paul George led the team in scoring , as he tallied 30 points , seven rebounds and four steals . In fact , George scored the final 12 points for the Pacers in their tight win . Monta Ellis was second on the team , with his 17 points , three assists and two blocks . Jeff Teague scored just nine points on 4 - for - 15 shooting , but provided six points and six rebounds as the starting point guard . C.J . Miles also scored 16 points off the bench . The Lakers road trip continues on Wednesday , as they play the Atlanta Hawks . The Lakers return to action on Friday , when they host the Memphis Grizzlies for their next game .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 33 - 28 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 25 - 37 ) 104 - 85 on Wednesday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 17 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a seven - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 11 turnovers between them , but the Knicks managed to stay a step ahead of the Knicks on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 30 points paced New York , and he added four rebounds and two assists . Meyers Leonard and Arron Afflalo were next with a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and an assist , and the latter posting six rebounds , an assist , and a steal and a block . Kyle O'Quinn led the bench with a 11 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . Kristaps Porzingis , who 'd been hospitalized in recent days with an illness , posted 11 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal . Meyers Leonard led the reserves with a 11 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . The Blazers are currently in second place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and in possession of the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Indiana for a Sunday evening showdown with the Pacers . The Knicks were led by a remarkable triple - double from Carmelo Anthony , who totaled 23 points , 10 rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . Meyers Leonard was the next highest scorer for the Knicks , collecting 11 points , adding a rebound , an assist and a block . Arron Afflalo was next with 13 points , six rebounds and an assist . Kyle O'Quinn led the bench with 11 points , nine rebounds and an assist . The Knicks remain in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday night for a showdown with the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 0 - 3 ) 102 - 90 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Detroit . The Pistons shot the ball well in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 42 percent from the floor and just 6 percent from deep . The Nets also out - rebounded the Pistons 48 - 41 , only furthering their advantage in this one . The Nets were led by Kevin Garnett , who went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 47 points and 10 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 14 rebounds on the year . Deron Smith was able to contribute a double - double of his own with 14 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and five assists . The only other Hornet to reach double - digit points was Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who scored 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the New York Knicks on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 10 - 2 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 12 ) 91 - 86 on Tuesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder came out on fire in this game , out - scoring the Thunder 28 - 20 in the first quarter alone , while eventually finishing the first half with a 33 - 20 lead . Adding to the strong start , the Warriors shot very well in this game , going 36 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 36 percent from the floor and just 18 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Reggie Jackson backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 22 points ( 10 - 26 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , to go along with eight rebounds and eight assists . Speights was able to get to the free throw line nine times and converted on six of those attempts . He 's now averaging 28 points and 18 rebounds on the season . Stephen Curry had a strong showing as well , finishing with 15 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and six assists . It was n't his best day shooting the ball , but he still did enough to help secure the victory , even with both Dwyane Wade ( hamstring ) and Luol Deng ( calf ) sitting out with injuries . Coming off the bench , Anthony Morrow finished with 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 33 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Thunder will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .

The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 30 - 16 in the first quarter alone . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 22 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Rockets also secured a 40 - 51 rebounding advantage , which may have been the difference in this one . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 64 points in his last two outings . Both Paul Millsap and Kyle Korver reached double figures in points as well . Korver finished with 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four assists , while Sefolosha had 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and four rebounds . Teague has been struggling at a high rate lately , averaging 39 points over his last four games . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Rockets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Utah Jazz defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 88 - 83 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Jazz ( 40 - 24 ) picked up their 40th win of the season and continue to rise in the Western Conference behind stellar play from Rudy Gobert . The elite center for Utah tipped in the buzzer beater for the win over the Kings on Sunday , and came up with another ridiculous stat line on Monday , as he finished with 15 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks across 36 minutes of action . The Pelicans simply could not find a rhythm shooting the ball , and finished with a season worst 36 percent as a unit . They allowed multiple Jazz scoring runs and did not have a single lead throughout the entirety of the game . The Pelicans picked up their first win with DeMarcus Cousins on Sunday , but were unable to do the same on the second game of a back - to - back . Cousins finished with 15 points , eight boards and three assists on 5 - of - 15 shooting , while Anthony Davis added 20 points and 12 rebounds across 37 minutes . The Jazz were led in scoring by Gordon Hayward , who finished with 23 points on 10 - of - 20 shooting . He was the only efficient scorer amongst the starters , as Utah finished just 36 percent shooting from the field as a team . Next up , the Pelicans visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Pelicans play the same day when they host the Toronto Raptors .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 104 - 99 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday . The Grizzlies ( 12 - 5 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Marc Gasol , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the 76ers ( 4 - 11 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Gasol 's triple - double troubles , collecting 27 points , four rebounds , four assists , three steals and three blocks on 10 - of - 20 shooting to be the difference in the game . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 11 rebounds per game . The Utah Jazz defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 107 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 26 - 16 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but they did a fine job lighting up the scoreboard on Saturday as well after falling behind early . All five members of their first unit tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Utah shot a stellar 49 percent from the field overall . The Magic ( 17 - 25 ) did a pretty good job of keeping pace , though , as they emerged from the first quarter with a 42 - 29 lead and managed a 49 percent success rate from the floor . However , Utah 's vaunted defense asserted its dominance following their disastrous first 12 minutes , limiting Orlando to just 65 points over the last three quarters . Elfrid Payton led all scorers with 28 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , nine assists , two steals and a block . Aaron Gordon went for 21 points , four boards , two assists and a steal . Nikola Vucevic could n't quite duplicate his standout effort from Friday night versus the Suns , but did contribute a solid 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Serge Ibaka overcame a questionable designation due to a shoulder injury to take the floor and tally 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Jodie Meeks notched a spot start in place of Evan Fournier ( foot ) and collected 12 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jeff Green led the bench with 11 points and five rebounds . Gordon Hayward paced the Magic with 23 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Rudy Gobert was next with a monster 19 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors registered 17 points , six rebounds and an assist . George Hill and Rodney Hood turned in matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out seven assists and recording two steals , and the latter posting four rebounds and two assists . While the Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 43 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns were also able to force the Suns into 20 turnovers , while committing only 17 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nets were led by Mirza Teletovic , who went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 5 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 30 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 52 points and 10 assists over his last two games . The Houston Rockets ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 1 - 1 ) 115 - 109 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Houston . Despite out - scoring the Rockets 24 - 32 in the final quarter , the Rockets were able to hold off the late comeback , and secure a victory in front of their home fans . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this one , going 43 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 45 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , James Harden backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 32 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 15 - 15 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and three blocked shots . He struggled to just six points on Sunday , so it was a nice bounce back game for him . Notching a double - double , DeAndre Jordan posted 16 points ( 6 - 6 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 16 rebounds and four blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 41 points and 27 rebounds over his last two games . Trevor Ariza was dialed in with his shot , going 4 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 15 points . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Thursday , while the Clippers will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls ( 42 - 28 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 41 - 28 ) in a wild Eastern Conference first - round playoff series Wednesday at United Center , 108 - 92 . The shorthanded Bulls led wire - to - wire as they built up a 9 - point lead in the first quarter , a lead they extended to 17 at one point before halftime . The Raptors turned it on in the third quarter , beginning the period on a 25 - 24 run and extending the lead to 17 points entering the fourth . Lowry’s 21 led the way for Chicago , and the point guard was serenaded with “MVP” chants from fans while at the free throw line in the fourth quarter . Pau Noah added 29 points , 11 rebounds , one assist and one blocked shot , while Noah DeRozan added 27 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting . Mike Dunleavy added 21 points off the bench , and Patrick Patterson had 17 ( 7 - 11 FG ) . Patrick Patterson led the reserves with 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3PT ) . The Raptors shot lights out from beyond the arc , nailing 13 of their 42 three - point attempts ( 40 percent ) . DeRozan led the Bulls , with 27 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) along with seven rebounds and three assists , in 32 minutes off the bench . Mike Dunleavy added 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , along with two assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes . Patrick Patterson was solid off the bench , with 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , five rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , in 25 minutes . Toronto shot 53 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range and gave up 20 turnovers in the game . Nikola Mirotic was the high - point man for the Raptors , with 29 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt ) , along with 11 rebounds and four blocked shots , in 32 minutes . Mike Dunleavy added 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , three rebounds and two assists , while Patrick Snell was also productive in 25 minutes off the bench , finishing with 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , five rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , in 64 minutes . The Raptors will play the second night of a back - to - back as they host Charlotte on Saturday , in Chicago .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 119 - 108 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 4 - 3 ) notched their third straight win and remain undefeated at home after another strong performance by their young , talented core . Los Angeles built upon an eight - point first quarter lead in the second period , where a series of scoring runs capped off the first half . The Suns made the game a heated contest in the fourth quarter . Devin Booker buried a 10 - foot jump shot with 6:39 left in the final period and drew a foul , sinking a free throw to pull the game within one point . The Lakers were able to outlast the Phoenix comeback attempt and did not let up their lead , even after it dwindled to just one possession . Nick Young and D'Angelo Russell nailed much needed back - to - back three pointers to put the game out of reach and secure the rest of the victory from the charity stripe . Devin Booker had a standout performance , as his sophomore season continues where he left off from his rookie year . Booker finished with 39 points , seven assists and three rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . T.J. Warren added 22 points , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points , two assists and two boards . Nick Young provided his best game of the young season with 22 points and seven rebounds , in addition to three buckets from behind the arc . Jordan Clarkson and Lou Williams were impressive off the bench , adding a combined 32 points on 13 - of - 28 shooting in 26 minutes and 30 minutes , respectively . Julius Randle had the most well - rounded game for the Lakers on his way to 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Suns host the Portland Trail Blazers , while the Lakers host the San Antonio Spurs .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 53 - 9 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 36 ) 104 - 94 on Sunday at the AT & T Center in San Antonio . The Spurs got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 29 - 22 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 46 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were able to force the Kings into 19 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this game . The Spurs were led by DeMarcus Cousins who went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 10 - for - 15 from the free throw line to finish with a game - high of 31 points , while also adding nine rebounds and three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 21 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Manu Ginobili finished with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven assists and three rebounds . In a surprise performance off the bench , both Quincy Acy and Quincy Acy reached double figures in points as well . Collison finished with 16 points ( 7 - 7 FG , 2 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven assists , while Diaw had 11 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) and three rebounds . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) may sport the worst record in the league , but they may be one of the feistiest cellar dwellers in the history of the NBA . Philadelphia has kept their competitive spirit thriving despite the disappointing season , and has often played as if they 're capable of beating virtually any team in the NBA on the right night . The Houston Rockets dominated the Los Angeles Lakers 134 - 95 Wednesday at Target Center . This game appeared to be over after the first quarter , as the Lakers ' ( 10 - 14 ) leaky defense had no answered for the Rockets ' ( 15 - 7 ) high - powered offensive attack , as Houston won the quarter 43 - 27 . And while Los Angeles managed to pull closer before halftime , the Rockets absolutely poured it on in the second half . Houston was led by shooting guard Eric Gordon , who has really adjusted to his new role off the bench , as he scored a game - high 26 points in just 24 minutes on a scorching 9 - of - 13 from the field . Early MVP-candidate James Harden was not too far behind , scoring 25 points on top of eight rebounds , six assists and four steals . To round off a terrific performance from the Rockets ' backcourt players , Patrick Beverley put together his best performance since returning from injury , recording 10 points , 12 assists , seven rebounds and three steals in 32 minutes . As a team , the Rockets made a living at the 3 - point line , shooting an impressive 27 - of - 36 from long range . For the Lakers , it was a night to forget , as the team shot a dreadful 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from behind the arc . Julius Randle led the way with a double - double of 21 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes , while Lou Williams continued to campaign for a Sixth Man of the Year award , posting an efficient 24 points in 25 minutes . Meanwhile , Jordan Clarkson made his first start at point guard this season and posted a lowly seven points on just 3 - of - 13 shooting from the field . Up next , the Rockets will head to Oklahoma City on Friday to take on the Thunder , while the Lakers will head home Wednesday to play the Suns .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 113 - 107 , at TD Garden on Friday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Lakers were able to pull ahead of the Lakers with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Los Angeles , 33 - 21 . Defense was also key for the Celtics , as they held the Lakers to 39 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . Boston shot 48 percent on their end and recorded 28 assists on their 39 made baskets . The Lakers ( 17 - 36 ) have now lost 10 of their last 12 games , as they ca n't get out of their own way . Lou Williams led Los Angeles in scoring , as he provided 21 points , four rebounds and four assists off the bench . D'Angelo Russell led the starters , collecting 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Nick Young was the only other starter with more than four points , as he dropped 17 points to add to his three rebounds and three assists . Larry Nance Jr. recorded an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double off the bench . The Celtics ( 32 - 18 ) have rode Isaiah Thomas ' absurd fourth quarter numbers all season and he was at it yet again here . Thomas scored 17 of his 38 points in the fourth quarter , to go along with two rebounds and four assists . Al Horford flirted with a triple - double , accumulating 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Jae Crowder was second on the team in scoring , totaling 18 points , six rebounds and two steals . Marcus Smart was a spark plug off the bench , accruing nine points , seven assists and five steals .

Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Warriors were able to out - score the Clippers 33 - 26 in the final quarter to secure the six - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 42 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Clippers into 26 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Jordan finished with 32 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 5 - 10 FT ) and 20 rebounds , while Jordan finished with 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 5 - 10 FT ) , 20 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . Leonard finished with a game - high 31 points in 11 - of - 22 shooting to go along with 11 rebounds and two assists in 34 minutes . And it was Leonard and the other four starters that managed to carry the team , as those five ended up scoring 78 of the team 's 100 points . The team finished shooting just 30 percent from behind the arc , with the starting five going just 3 - of - 6 from deep . The Boston Celtics defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 117 - 108 , at TD Garden on Friday . The Celtics ( 23 - 14 ) learned earlier in the afternoon that they 'd play without Avery Bradley , who 'd tallied a team - high 26 points on Friday versus the Sixers . Marcus Smart entered the starting five in his stead and did n't disappoint , producing 22 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block . However , the high - scoring affair was a showcase for two of the game 's brightest stars , as Isaiah Thomas ( 38 points ) and Anthony Davis ( 36 points , 15 rebounds , two assists , two blocks ) put on a spectacular show on opposite ends of the court . Ultimately , a 36 - point third quarter by Boston did in the Pelicans ( 14 - 24 ) , which suffered their 13th road loss in 17 games this season . Langston Galloway was actually the second leading scorer on New Orleans in a bench role , posting 20 points , four rebounds and an assist over 22 minutes . Jrue Holiday was next with 13 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . In a game with 11 ties and 16 lead changes in total , neither team led by more than eight points in this overtime thriller . Denver also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 46 - 36 and the points in the paint differential , 48 - 29 . The Los Angeles Thunder ( 1 - 2 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 1 - 0 ) 90 - 93 on Sunday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Clippers were able to out - score the Clippers 24 - 24 in the first quarter to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were also able to force the Thunder into 22 turnovers , while only committing 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Thunder had all five starters reach double figures in points in this one . Blake Jones led the way , going 10 - for - 17 from the field and 9 - for - 11 from the free throw line to score 32 points , while also adding seven rebounds and a blocked shot . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaged 24 points and 18 rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line 11 times and converted on seven of those attempts . He 's now averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds on the year . He 's now averaging 18 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Jamal Crawford shot 5 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 16 points . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Boston Celtics ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 0 - 1 ) 112 - 95 on Wednesday at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia . This was a battle of current Eastern Conference bottom feeders , as both teams came in looking for their first victory of the 2014 - 32 season . In a sloppy game , both teams committed over 17 turnovers , but the Celtics were able to shoot an outstanding 46 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line . The Celtics also forced the 76ers into 22 turnovers , while committing just 17 of their own . The Celtics were led by the duo of Jahlil Okafor and Isaiah Thomas . Okafor was a force , scoring 26 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 6 - 6 FT ) and grabbing seven rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 6 rebounds . Okafor shot 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 26 points , to go along with seven rebounds . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . Coming off the bench , Jakarr Sampson had a very efficient showing . In just 32 minutes , he posted 13 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five assists and two steals . He had gone a combined 11 - for - 21 from the field over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction . Getting the start at shooting guard , Jae Crowder was able to record 14 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds in 31 minutes . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .

The Toronto Raptors ( 46 - 21 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 36 - 32 ) 101 - 94 , Saturday evening at Bankers Life Fieldhouse . It was a much - needed victory for the Raptors as they came into this game tied with Dallas for the eighth seed and only a half - game behind seventh place Houston . Their opponent , the Pacers , despite their record , have been a formidable foe over their last seven games , winning won four - of - seven , as well as their last two in a row . Indiana started out terribly slow , with a 25 - point first quarter , but managed to cut the deficit to one by half time . The teams matched each other in the third quarter , leaving the fourth to decide the game . Toronto used a 90 run , culminating at the 8:30 mark in the fourth quarter , in order to create some separation , which they were then able to maintain until the final buzzer . The Raptors used a balanced team effort to emerge victorious , as four players scored 13 or more points , while the team played solid defense and rebounded well . Paul George was the high - point man for the Pacers , with 28 points ( 9 - 26 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 10 - 12 FT ) , along with five rebounds and three assists , in 44 minutes . George Hill followed up with 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , two assists , two rebounds and one block , in 41 minutes , while George Hill chipped in 18 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , six assists , two rebounds and one block , in 41 minutes . George George followed up with 28 points ( 8 - 21 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists , in 42 minutes . No other player scored in double figures for the Pacers , who struggled on both ends of the floor . The series now heads back to Toronto for Game 9 on Sunday . The winner will go on to face the Cleveland Cavaliers in the Eastern Conference Finals .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Spurs road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Nuggets had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , San Antonio had managed a paltry three wins in 16 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 75 points over the first 26 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for San Antonio , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Spurs roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed 42 of their points off 38 Denver turnovers . That helped them overcome 13 turnovers , as did their defense , which forced the same amount from the Nuggets . The Nuggets were led by Arron Afflalo , who tallied 21 points , two assists , four rebounds and three steals . Tim Duncan followed with 16 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic and Wilson Chandler followed with matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , and the latter furnishing five rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic pitched in with 10 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Denver remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday night .

These are two teams who will battle to sneak into the playoffs , but the Bucks looked like the far superior team in this game . They nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as the Knicks never led by more than one and failed to tie or recapture the lead after the first quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , as the Bucks recorded 18 assists to nine turnovers , while the Knicks committed 24 turnovers to 18 assists . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Bucks finished the game on a 32 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Houston 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Milwaukee shooting 52 percent from the field and 73 percent from the free - throw line . Milwaukee also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 42 - 41 . Khris Middleton led Houston in scoring , as he tallied 30 points , three rebounds , four assists and five steals . The Toronto Raptors ( 19 - 8 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 12 - 17 ) 109 - 79 on Monday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 23 - 30 in the first quarter alone . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this one , going 49 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 41 percent from the floor and just 14 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were also able to force the Magic into 19 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who went 13 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding five rebounds and four assists . He 's on a nice two - game stretch where he 's combined for 54 points and 10 assists . Jonas Valanciunas also posted a double - double , scoring 16 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 0 - 0 FT ) and grabbing 13 rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 10 rebounds . DeRozan shot 13 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 31 points , while also adding four assists . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Terrence Ross , who came off the bench for 11 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

Charlotte has now lost seven of its last seven games , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Hornets will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Knicks have the right guys to build a winning team around . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 95 - 69 , at United Center on Friday . Fresh off a double - digit home victory over the Bulls ( 13 - 13 ) on Thursday night , the Bucks ( 13 - 12 ) bounced back with an even more dominating effort Friday . Chicago 's offense had no answer for a stifling Milwaukee defense that held them to a season - low scoring total , while also limiting them to a 30 percent success rate from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo once again proved to be a thorn in the side of the visitors , leading the way with a 22 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven boards , three steals and a block . Jabari Parker could n't come close to his 26 - point effort from Thursday , but he managed 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal . John Henson and Tony Snell posted a pair of 10 - point efforts , supplemented by four rebounds , a steal and a pair of blocks by Henson , to go along with five rebounds and a pair of dimes from Snell . Greg Monroe came off the bench to tally a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double over 23 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic compiled 13 points for the second straight night in a reserve role , and also hauled in eight boards . A nightmarish outing for the Bulls saw Dwyane Wade pace them in scoring with a modest 12 points , which he complemented with five boards , an assist and a steal . Taj Gibson and Robin Lopez posted a pair of eight - point efforts on a combined 7 - of - 20 shooting , although they at least managed 11 boards between them . Jimmy Butler and Rajon Rondo had matching seven - point contributions as well , with the former also supplying seven boards , six assists and a steal , and the latter dishing out four dimes and recording four rebounds . Bobby Portis actually served as the second - leading scorer on the team despite coming off the bench , posting 10 points and eight rebounds in 19 minutes . The Bucks are now off until Tuesday night , when the Cleveland Cavaliers will come calling to the Bradley Center . The Bulls are home again Monday night , when the Detroit Pistons come to town .
