'The Quadruple Capital ' added six rebounds and four steals on the defensive end . The Jazz ( 18 - 13 ) appear to be in a bit of a slump , having now lost three straight games . The team lost its second straight on a fourth quarter collapse , as the team once again led heading into the game 's final quarter . Center Rudy Gobert once again played strong basketball , scoring 13 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting and pulling down 14 rebounds . Forward Gordon Hayward led the team with 23 points and also had five assists . The Jazz as a whole shot over 53 percent from the field , but could not find the three - point shooting to match up with the win . The Jazz will visit the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will see the Lakers on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 119 - 115 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 10 - 41 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Lakers ( 14 - 41 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Los Angeles forced the visitors to an underwhelming 50 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range . Los Angeles was led by Andrew Wiggins , who managed a game - high 30 points , along with four rebounds , one assist , two blocks and a steal . Lou Williams was next with a bench - leading 20 points , which he supplemented with one assist , one steal and two steals . Julius Randle followed with a 15 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a block . Ricky Rubio tallied 10 points , two assists , two rebounds and a steal . Roy Hibbert led the bench with 19 points , six rebounds , five assists and one steal . Ricky Rubio tallied a 10 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds and one steal . Zach LaVine led the second unit with 14 points , and the Lakers shot 50 percent overall .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 109 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 1 - 7 ) had taken the Pacers ( 4 - 5 ) to the limit just two nights prior before succumbing in overtime , 122 - 115 . However , their second consecutive foray into an extra period against Indiana went much better , culminating in Philadelphia 's first victory of the season . Joel Embiid led the way by playing a game - high 26 minutes and posting 25 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a block . While he shot just 33 percent ( 6 - of - 18 ) from the field , he successfully parlayed 12 of 14 visits to the free - throw line into points . The impressive third - year man helped spearhead a sizable advantage for the Sixers down low , as they outrebounded the Pacers by a 54 - 40 margin . Indiana was led by Paul George , who despite leaving the game in the first half temporarily with a left thumb sprain , totaled 26 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Monta Ellis was actually second in line despite coming off the bench , amassing 19 points , six rebounds , five assists and four steals over 36 minutes . C.J . Miles , who drew the start at shooting guard , turned in 12 points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . Jeff Teague was modestly involved on offense over 35 minutes , supplying 13 points , four assists , a rebound and three steals . Thaddeus Young was the only other member of the starting five with double - digit scoring , supplying 10 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday night to face off with the New York Knicks .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 12 - 8 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 11 - 7 ) 106 - 100 on Tuesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Atlanta . The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 31 - 21 in the first quarter alone . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also out - rebounded the Thunder 51 - 48 , giving them an even greater advantage in the victory . Kevin Durant led the way , going 9 - for - 18 from the field and 5 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also adding six rebounds and six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , Jeff Teague was able to record a double - double of his own with 11 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) , five rebounds and 1 assists . Kyle Korver had a solid game as well , going 4 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 11 points . It was a season - high in points for Korver , who had n't reached the 7 - point mark yet this season . Serge Ibaka also had a solid showing , posting 17 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and five rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line at will , converting on 9 - of - 5 free throw attempts . Kyle Korver was dialed in with his shot , going 10 - for - 17 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 11 points per game on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Anthony Morrow , who scored 10 points ( 3 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three assists off the bench . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Thunder will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Denver Nuggets , 123 - 113 , at Verizon Center on Monday . Despite there being just five ties and six lead changes , this game was close throughout . In fact , neither team grabbed a double - digit lead , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Wizards going 16 - of - 24 and the Nuggets hitting just 4 - of - 26 from long distance . Washington also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Denver , while committing six less turnovers . The Wizards also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 43 - 39 . Gary Harris led Denver with 26 points , while Marcin Plumlee provided 19 points and eight rebounds . Bradley Beal led the team in scoring , as he dropped 26 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting . John Wall went just 12 - of - 19 from the field , but finished with 30 points , three rebounds and 10 assists . John Wall led the Nuggets , as he accumulated 30 points , three rebounds and 10 assists . Bradley Beal was second on the team , as he dropped 26 points to go along with five assists . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris each recorded a double - double , combining for 33 points and 31 rebounds . Wilson Chandler led the starters in scoring , dropping 21 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 15 rebounds .
The Boston Celtics ( 15 - 26 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 25 ) 100 - 99 on Sunday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 20 - 28 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 43 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 42 percent from the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were led by the duo of Jameer Nelson and Brandon Afflalo . Bass went 9 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now combined for 37 points in his last two outings , as he 's been dialed in with his shot . Jared Sullinger was the only other Celtic in double figures , as he finished with 14 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 29 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday as well . For the Nuggets , it 's a sigh of relief getting to put one in the win column . They had a well - rounded team effort in this game , with four players scoring in double figures , but five players reaching double figures in points . Jameer Nelson led the way , going 9 - for - 20 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's now averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , J.J. Hickson was able to provide a nice boost with the second unit . Hickson went 6 - for - 8 from the field to record 10 points , while also recording six assists . The Nuggets ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 111 - 98 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday evening . The Pacers ( 29 - 28 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Wizards ( 34 - 21 ) built a 62 - 52 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Washington eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Wizards managed to shoot 52 percent from the field overall , as well as a superb 52 percent on their 29 shots from behind the arc . Otto Porter , Jr. led the way with 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists and one block . Markieff Morris managed 21 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . John Wall followed with a trademark double - double , posting 20 points , 12 assists , two rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Bradley Beal was right behind with 19 points , four assists , three rebounds and one steal . Marcin Gorat contributed 12 points seven rebounds and one steal . Matching 17 - point efforts from Myles Turner and Paul George led the Pacers , with the former adding nine rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , and the latter providing seven boards , three assists and two steals . Al Jefferson and Rodney Stuckey were next with a pair of 12 - point tallies off the bench . Jefferson added three rebounds and Stuckey dished out a pair of assists and recorded a steal . Glenn Robinson III went for 10 points , while Kevin Seraphin drew the start at power forward and supplied nine points , five rebounds and one assist . The Wizards resume post - All - Star - break play in Philadelphia against the Sixers on Friday , February 24th , while the Pacers kick off the second half of their season on the same night at home against the Memphis Grizzlies .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) 128 - 95 on Tuesday . The Clippers pulled off an impressive upset over a struggling Rockets team thanks to some depth and good defense . The biggest discrepancy in the game were the bench points , as the Clippers bench outscored the Rockets bench 44 - 33 in the victory , which was a much more lopsided number until a late hot - streak from Jason Terry . Los Angeles also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 51 boards to the Rockets 47 . The Rockets were unconscious from long distance tonight as well , as they went 8 - for - 18 in the win . The Rockets have lost four of their last five coming into this game and things just keep rolling downhill . They did a good job of competing , but they simply allowed the Clippers to go on too many lopsided runs . In fact , they allowed Los Angeles to shoot over 41 percent from the field and committed 18 turnovers in the loss . The bench was spectacular , as four players scored in double figures with Trevor Ariza leading the team with 16 points . Trevor Ariza was the only other player in double figures , as he collected 18 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Jamal Crawford continued his good play off the bench , as he amassed 13 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Clippers will look to play better in their next game on Sunday against the Denver Nuggets .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 13 - 10 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 12 - 11 ) 93 - 92 on Tuesday . The game was an entertaining offensive display that was befitting of both teams ' high - octane attacks . Both clubs managed to top the 50 percent mark from the field , and drained a total of 17 three - pointers between them . The two teams also saw all five members of their respective starting fives manage double - digit point totals , and the Grizzlies received another standout performance from reserve forward Zach Randolph , who managed 21 points and hauled in 16 rebounds , dished out an assist and recorded a block . Marcus Morris followed closely behind with 16 points , two rebounds and a block . Marcus Morris was next with 16 points and two rebounds . Mike Conley managed a near double - double , supplying 11 points and dishing out eight assists , while adding a rebound and a block . Matt Barnes paced the Memphis bench with 11 points , two rebounds and an assist . The Grizzlies remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Milwaukee to take on the Bucks on Saturday night . Jackson led the way for Memphis with a season - high 18 points , seven assists , three rebounds and two steals over 32 minutes . Marcus Morris was next with 16 points , two rebounds and a block . Marcus Morris managed 16 points , two rebounds and a steal , while Courtney Lee went for 14 points , two rebounds , an assist and a block . Detroit remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and is currently the fifth seed in the conference . They 're home again on Wednesday night versus the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Lakers benefited from balanced production across their roster , as all five starters , and two reserves , hit double digits in the scoring column . The offensive proficiency led to a 41 percent success rate from the field , and their defense managed to elicit 10 turnovers from the Pistons . Andre Drummond and Jordan Clarkson led the Pistons with matching 17 - point efforts . Roy Hibbert and Roy Hibbert turned in matching 12 - point efforts , with the former adding seven boards , three assists and two blocks , and the latter supplying seven boards , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Spencer Dinwiddie led the first unit with 17 points , four boards , four assists and one block . Roy Hibbert tallied 12 points , seven rebounds , one assist and two blocks in 28 minutes before exiting . Nick Young tallied 13 points , two rebounds , three blocks and one steal . Nick Young had one of his best games of the season with 13 points , two rebounds , one assist and one steal . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope paced the second unit with 17 points , six rebounds and three assists . Spencer Dinwiddie was productive as a reserve as well with 17 points , four rebounds and four assists . Andre Drummond posted a 17 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included three assists . D.J . Williams ( 17 points , four rebounds ) was the only other starter with double - digit scoring . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope ( seven points , three rebounds , two assists and a steal ) and Ersan Ilyasova ( six points , six rebounds , two assists , two steals ) were highly productive in reserve roles .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 128 - 96 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Detroit leading for the first 60 minutes , this game was close throughout , as there were eight ties and eight lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 13 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Cleveland winning that battle , 41 - 45 . They also stifled Detroit with their defense , holding the Pistons to 37 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . Detroit also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Detroit , while committing six less turnovers . The Cavaliers ( 44 - 22 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Cavaliers . Kyrie Irving carried the load , as he tallied 26 points , one rebound and six assists . Richard Jefferson was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points , two rebounds and two assists . Iman Shumpert was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 18 points , two rebounds and two assists . LeBron James led the way for Cleveland , as he accumulated 16 points , 11 rebounds and 12 assists . Deron Williams finished with 13 points , two assists and two steals . Iman Shumpert also had one of his best games of the season , totaling 18 points and five rebounds .
The host Los Angeles Lakers took down the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , 130 - 119 . Friday also marked the unveiling of Los Angeles 's new Shaquille O'Neal statue . Los Angeles ( 21 - 51 ) snapped a six - game losing streak on Friday , though it may not have been in their best interest . LA will lose its draft pick if it falls outside of the top three , and the Phoenix Suns remain on the Lakers ' tail for the second - worst record in the NBA . Still , there was a lot to like on Friday for Lakers fans . Guard Jordan Clarkson had a career - high 35 points while shooting 8 - of - 10 from three - point range . It was the team 's first overtime game of the season , and they seemed to respond well to the extra period . LA outscored Minnesota 29 - 10 in overtime , immediately establishing an eight - point advantage at the start of the OT . The team finished with staggering shooting splits of 52 percent from the field , 61 percent from three - point range , and 86 percent form the line . Minnesota ( 28 - 43 ) , meanwhile , extended its own losing streak to four games . While production from the starting five was solid , the Timberwolves struggled once again with finding points off the bench . The team saw just 23 bench points versus 39 from LA . There was no issue for Minny 's starters , though , as third - year forward Andrew Wiggins exploded for an efficient 36 points . Reigning Rookie of the Year Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double with 25 points and 13 rebounds , and point guard Ricky Rubio had 19 points while dishing out a whopping 15 assists . The Timberwolves will visit Portland on Sunday , while LA will host the Blazers on Sunday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 8 - 7 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 11 ) Monday 98 - 86 at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . After losing the first quarter , the Bucks bounced back in a big way , winning the next two periods 50 - 50 . They eventually pulled out what is their more impressive win in what has been a rather slow start to the regular season . Going against his former team , Andre Drummond put in another stellar performance , shooting 11 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 23 points and eight rebounds , while also recording an assist , a steal and two blocks . Brandon Knight also had a big night , posting 20 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , nine rebounds , two assists and one steal in 34 minutes . He continues to be one of the most consistent scorers for this team , as he 's now averaging 10 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Josh Smith was able to record a double - double of his own , as he finished with 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 34 minutes . For the Pistons , Brandon Knight did the bulk of the work offensively . He shot 7 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding eight assists over 32 minutes . He continues to be the team 's most consistent player , as he 's averaging 21 points and 10 rebounds on the year . Jabari Parker also had a solid showing , posting 14 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , nine rebounds and two steals . Like Drummond , he 's playing at a very high rate , averaging 18 points over his last three games . Both Josh Smith and Ersan Ilyasova reached double figures in points as well , scoring 13 and 11 points respectively . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Chicago Bulls on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Bulls also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 48 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went 46 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . Gasol was able to get to the free throw line seven times and converted on seven of those attempts . He 's now averaging 27 points and 10 rebounds on the season . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Rockets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Heat 28 - 16 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 36 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were also able to force the Heat into 14 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . The Chicago Bulls ( 22 - 12 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 19 - 17 ) 101 - 92 on Friday at the United Center in Boston . The Bulls got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Bulls also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 42 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 36 percent from the floor and a meager 20 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Bulls forced the Celtics into 11 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own . Continuing his dominance of late , Pau Gasol had another huge game , finishing with 17 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) , 18 rebounds and four assists . Over his last three games he 's averaging 21 points and 19 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , Jimmy Butler came just shy of recording his first triple - double of the season . He finished with 19 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , five rebounds and 10 assists . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get back on track . The only other Celtic to reach double figures in points was Evan Turner , who came off the bench to score 10 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 30 minutes . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Wednesday .
The New York Knicks defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 94 - 90 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The recent form of these teams would indicate an easy Spurs win , but the Knicks had other ideas . This game was close throughout , as there were nine ties and seven lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with New York winning that battle , 44 - 46 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 10 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Derrick Rose was the player of the game , as he collected 36 points , nine rebounds , four assists and four steals . Derrick Rose finished second on the team with 18 points , four rebounds and two assists . LaMarcus Aldridge was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 15 points and 10 rebounds . David Lee led the bench with 10 points and seven rebounds . San Antonio will be in action again on Monday in a road matchup against the Indiana Pacers . The Knicks ( 24 - 33 ) have been one of the most dysfunctional teams over recent weeks , but wins like this will surely quiet the skeptics for the time being . Carmelo Anthony led the team in scoring , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Derrick Rose was second on the team , accruing 18 points , four rebounds and two assists . Kristaps Porzingis shot just 4 - of - 10 from the field , but still collected 16 points , seven rebounds and four blocks . Willy Hernangomez got the start at center and amassed 12 points , nine rebounds and three steals . New York will be off until Wednesday , when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road for their next fixture .

The game was an entertaining back - and - forth affair , with both teams playing at superior levels at different points throughout the contest . Chicago looked prepared to dominate in the first 12 minutes , jumping out to a 27 - 27 lead after the first quarter . However , the Spurs came back with a vengeance in the second , more than doubling up their hosts , 27 - 20 . The big period served them well in the second half , as they were able to withstand some solid play by the Bulls in the third and fourth quarters to hold on for a much - needed win . The Bulls jumped out to a 27 - 27 lead after one quarter , a foundation that ultimately helped them hold on for the hard - fought win . Pau Gasol led the way for Chicago with 21 points , 12 rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Rose was right behind him with 21 points , six assists and three rebounds . The Warriors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 29 - 18 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 47 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Knicks 47 - 35 , the Warriors turned the ball over 15 times , which allowed them to finish with the victory . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Curry went a ridiculous 8 - for - 24 from the field and 5 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score 31 points , while adding eight rebounds and six assists as well . He had shot over 43 percent in each of his last two games , so it was good to see him get things turned back around and have a strong showing off the bench . Carmelo Anthony also had a strong showing , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and two assists in 35 minutes . Like Green , it was good to see him get things turned around , shooting a solid 9 - of - 24 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from deep to score 15 points , so it was good to see him get back on track . The Denver Nuggets ( 5 - 4 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 4 - 5 ) 107 - 98 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Houston . The Rockets were able to get off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Rockets 30 - 23 in the first quarter alone . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went 43 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also secured a 46 - 40 rebounding advantage . For the Rockets , Danilo Gallinari was one of the few bright spots . He went 7 - for - 9 from the field and 10 - for - 10 from the free throw line to score 27 points , while also contributing a rebound , three assists and a steal . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Terrence Jones had one of his better games of the year . He went 9 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , to go along with seven rebounds in 21 minutes . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 6 points and seven rebounds on the season . The Boston Celtics defeated the New York Knicks , 115 - 87 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Boston blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 26 - 1 run spanning between the second and third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Knicks into a 10 - point lead for the Celtics . Despite there being just six ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 13 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 40 minutes . Defense was key for the Celtics , as they held the Knicks to 35 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed New York as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Celtics hanging around , as they committed 24 turnovers to 19 assists , while the Knicks committed 17 turnovers to their 19 assists . The Celtics ( 4 - 5 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . The Pelicans shot just 40 percent from the field as a unit and flashed their brilliant ball movement to continuously open up the floor , a staple of Gregg Popovich’s supreme coaching and unselfish basketball . The Warriors host the Phoenix Suns ( 15 - 0 ) on Monday , while the Pelicans host the Dallas Mavericks ( 11 - 19 ) on Tuesday . The Pelicans were lead by Stephen Curry , who finished with 40 points , five rebounds and nine assists on 10 - of - 29 shooting , including 7 - of - 12 from behind the arc . Ryan Anderson was next in line with 26 points , five rebounds and two assists , while Tyreke Evans added 19 points , six rebounds and three assists . Harrison Barnes contributed 11 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks in 37 minutes off the bench . Norris Cole ( 16 ) , Shaun Livingston ( 12 ) , Shaun Livingston ( 12 ) and Harrison Barnes ( 11 ) round out the Pelicans players who scored in double figures , while Shaun Livingston scored 16 points in 26 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back on the road against the Dallas Mavericks , while the Pelicans remain home with a date in Toronto .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 44 - 38 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 33 - 49 ) 107 - 99 on Tuesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 27 - 31 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 43 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were also able to force the Nuggets into 20 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Jokic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 7 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding 13 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 70 points and 33 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe added 16 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and three rebounds in 25 minutes as well . The Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 7 - 5 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 4 ) 103 - 88 on Sunday . This game was much closer than most people would have anticipated , as the Kings had their worst shooting night of the season . The still ended up prevailing with the victory despite shooting 11 - for - 37 from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Kings recorded 26 assists and 13 turnovers , while the Kings committed 14 turnovers to their 26 assists . It 's rare to see a team win a game when your turnovers and assists are nearly identical , but that was the case here . The Kings won the rebounding total 40 to 42 and that very well may have been the decisive factor . The Bulls were outscored by 12 in the fourth quarter and just couldn’t hold off the Kings in overtime for a devastating loss . Jimmy Butler wasn’t the hero , as he hit the game - winner . He went 11 - for - 18 from the field to accumulate 17 points , eight rebounds and three steals in the win . Rudy Gay also stuffed the stat sheet , accumulating 20 points , seven rebounds and three assists . The Bulls have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next game . The Kings continue to surprise and these sort of wins are a credit to their resiliency and grittiness . DeMarcus Cousins had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 22 points , 14 rebounds and four assists in the win . Darren Collison also had a nice game , as he tallied 17 points , six assists and six rebounds in the defeat . The Bulls will look to exact revenge on Thursday in a rematch with the Kings for their next game .

He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 8 rebounds per game . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his Sixers debut , Elfrid Payton had arguably his best game of the season . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding 4 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth on the year . Dwight Howard chipped in with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and 13 rebounds as well . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) 110 - 103 on Monday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 37 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Trail Blazers went just 47 percent . The Raptors also out - rebounded the Trail Blazers 45 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . In only his second game of the season though , DeMar DeRozan finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and four assists . He 's had two impressive games in a row , combining for 53 points , 14 rebounds and 10 assists over that span . It was also his tenth straight double - double . Jonas Valanciunas came one rebound short of a double - double and finished with 14 points and 11 rebounds . He struggled with his shot , converting only 5 - of - 10 from the field and 4 - of - 4 from the three - point line , but he did convert on all six of his free throws , so that was where the majority of his 21 points came from . Crabbe was also a perfect 6 - for - 18 from the field , including 4 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 29 points . Jonas Valanciunas had a strong showing as well , finishing with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . Cory Joseph was the only other Blazer to score in double figures , finishing with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 26 minutes . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 79 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Sixers ( 6 - 18 ) came in to the contest short - handed , as Joel Embiid was given the night off to tend to elbow inflammation , while starting point guard Sergio Rodriguez sat out with an illness . That opened the door for Jahlil Okafor and T.J. McConnell to enter the starting five , and both parlayed their opportunities into highly productive performances . McConnell came within an assist of a triple - double , tallying 12 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while also adding three steals . Meanwhile , Okafor stepped up with 14 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . The two players combined to go 12 - of - 18 from the field , and the Sixers shot an outstanding 56 percent from the field overall , keying what was only their second road win of the season . Robert Covington actually led Philadelphia in scoring , posting 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind with 15 points , eight boards and a pair of steals . Nik Stauskas received some extra run off the bench as a residual effect of Rodriguez 's absence , and he turned in 10 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal to lead the second unit . Nerlens Noel , making his season debut after recovering from a knee injury , was only able to log 10 minutes off the bench before being held to just eight points on 3 - of - 5 shooting .
The Miami Heat ( 26 - 32 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) 108 - 90 on Tuesday at Philips Arena in Miami . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 25 - 24 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 40 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks went 38 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Hawks into 10 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Heat were led by Tyler Johnson , who went 9 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding five rebounds and five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 38 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 19 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Goran Dragic was another player who had a strong showing . He went 5 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding three assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Waiters had n't hit a lot of his shots , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Heat should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Goran Dragic did all he could to keep the Hawks in this game . He went 5 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also handing out three assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 14 times , and converted on nine out of those attempts . Dragic on the other hand shot 5 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 17 points . He also got to the line 14 times and converted on nine of those attempts . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Hawks will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los Angeles Lakers 129 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . Denver ( 32 - 35 ) inches closer to a .500 record for the season and more importantly , show cased their ability to blow out the bottom tier teams while also staving off the Portland Trail Blazers for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference playoffs picture . Depth was on display for the Nuggets in the rout , as they went up 67 - 43 at the half and handed over much of the work to the bench , who also flexed their scoring prowess in the win . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) were unable to match the shooting efficiency the Nuggets had going , and finished 30 percent from three point range and 43 percent from the field , compared to the lights out 54 percent effort by Denver . Nikola Jokic and Danilo Gallinari each scored 18 points , and combined for 12 rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored 15 points and added 10 rebounds across 36 minutes . Jamal Murray and Will Barton each pitched in 22 points and each played 30 minutes , and combined for nine three - pointers . Lakers Ivan Zubac drew the start at center and offered a bright spot in the box score . Zubac scored 25 points , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished out an assist in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , while Brandon Ingram pitched in 14 points , one rebound and two assists . Next up , the Lakers visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Minnesota Suns ( 25 - 54 ) 121 - 121 on Friday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Despite a fierce comeback by the Timberwolves , who out - scored the Timberwolves 58 - 48 in the second half , the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Timberwolves were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 41 - 36 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who went 10 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 30 points , while also adding five rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Teletovic and a nice surprise performance of the season . Alex Len recorded a double - double of his own , as he finished with 14 points ( 7 - 12 FG ) and 13 rebounds , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his return from an ankle injury , Mirza Teletovic had 19 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds . He shot a combined 7 - for - 37 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Shabazz Teletovic added 19 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 112 - 94 Monday at Smoothie King Center . The Trail Blazers ( 1 - 0 ) came into this game off a disappointing opening loss and put it to the Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) in this game . The second quarter was especially decisive , as Portland scored 27 points , while holding New Orleans to just 11 in the second half . Defense was key for the Trail Blazers , as they held the Pelicans to 40 percent from the field , 61 percent from the free - throw line and 33 percent from three - point range . Portland also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than New Orleans , while committing three less turnovers . The Trail Blazers ( 1 - 2 ) had a tough task against the Pelicans and they did n't disappoint . Damian Lillard was the star , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Ryan Anderson was second on the team , as he scored 21 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting . Jrue Holiday was n't far behind , tallying 20 points , three assists and a steal . Damian Lillard carried the load for New Orleans , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Jrue Holiday recorded a 12 - point , 3 - assist double - double . Ryan Anderson had one of his best games of the season as well , accumulating 21 points , nine rebounds and four steals . The Trail Blazers will look to get out of this slide on Monday against the scorching - hot Miami Heat .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Warriors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 15 in the first quarter alone . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 36 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Jazz were also able to force the Jazz into 23 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Curry went a ridiculous 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding four assists and three steals . He shot a combined 8 - for - 27 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Joe Johnson added 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds in 22 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Golden State Warriors , 128 - 119 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a closer game , but Memphis took care of business in this wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Grizzlies led by at least seven points for the entirety of the second half , as the final 11 - point margin was their largest lead of the game . Memphis was very efficient on offense , shooting 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The Grizzlies also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than 16 turnovers , while committing three less turnovers . The Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) had to play this game without Kevin Green and they did just that , as he finished with a season - high 40 points on 15 - of - 27 shooting . Stephen Curry was the only other starter with more than 10 points , as he tallied 27 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Draymond Green went just 3 - of - 16 from the field , but still finished with 11 points and eight rebounds . Kevin Durant led the team in scoring , totaling 27 points , 13 rebounds and four assists on 7 - of - 17 shooting . Klay Thompson had one of his best games of the season , accumulating 17 points , six rebounds and two assists on 7 - of - 17 shooting . Mike Thompson finished second on the team , accruing 17 points , six rebounds and two assists .
